2017 
2018 /**
2019  * Determines the appropriate level of native full screen support we can get
2020  * from the browser.
2021  * @name $.supportsFullScreen
2022  */
2023 (function( $ ) {
2024     var fullScreenApi = {
2025             supportsFullScreen: false,
2026             isFullScreen: function() { return false; },
2027             requestFullScreen: function() {},
2028             cancelFullScreen: function() {},
2029             fullScreenEventName: '',
2030             prefix: ''
2031         },
2032         browserPrefixes = 'webkit moz o ms khtml'.split(' ');
2033 
2034     // check for native support
2035     if (typeof document.cancelFullScreen != 'undefined') {
2036         fullScreenApi.supportsFullScreen = true;
2037     } else {
2038         // check for fullscreen support by vendor prefix
2039         for (var i = 0, il = browserPrefixes.length; i < il; i++ ) {
2040             fullScreenApi.prefix = browserPrefixes[i];
2041 
2042             if (typeof document[fullScreenApi.prefix + 'CancelFullScreen' ] != 'undefined' ) {
2043                 fullScreenApi.supportsFullScreen = true;
2044 
2045                 break;
2046             }
2047         }
2048     }
2049 
2050     // update methods to do something useful
2051     if (fullScreenApi.supportsFullScreen) {
2052         fullScreenApi.fullScreenEventName = fullScreenApi.prefix + 'fullscreenchange';
2053 
2054         fullScreenApi.isFullScreen = function() {
2055             switch (this.prefix) {
2056                 case '':
2057                     return document.fullScreen;
2058                 case 'webkit':
2059                     return document.webkitIsFullScreen;
2060                 default:
2061                     return document[this.prefix + 'FullScreen'];
2062             }
2063         };
2064         fullScreenApi.requestFullScreen = function( element ) {
2065             return (this.prefix === '') ?
2066                 element.requestFullScreen() :
2067                 element[this.prefix + 'RequestFullScreen']();
2068 
2069         };
2070         fullScreenApi.cancelFullScreen = function() {
2071             return (this.prefix === '') ?
2072                 document.cancelFullScreen() :
2073                 document[this.prefix + 'CancelFullScreen']();
2074         };
2075     } else if ( typeof window.ActiveXObject !== "undefined" ){
2076         // Older IE.  Support based on:
2077         // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1125084/how-to-make-in-javascript-full-screen-windows-stretching-all-over-the-screen/7525760
2078         fullScreenApi.requestFullScreen = function(){
2079             /* global ActiveXObject:true */
2080             var wscript = new ActiveXObject("WScript.Shell");
2081             if ( wscript !== null ) {
2082                 wscript.SendKeys("{F11}");
2083             }
2084             return false;
2085         };
2086         fullScreenApi.cancelFullScreen = fullScreenApi.requestFullScreen;
2087     }
2088 
2089     // export api
2090     $.extend( $, fullScreenApi );
2091 
2092 })( OpenSeadragon );
2093 
2094 /*
2095  * OpenSeadragon - EventHandler
2096  *
2097  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
2098  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
2099  *
2100  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
2101  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
2102  * met:
2103  *
2104  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
2105  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
2106  *
2107  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
2108  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
2109  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
2110  *
2111  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
2112  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
2113  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
2114  *
2115  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
2116  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
2117  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
2118  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
2119  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
2120  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
2121  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
2122  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
2123  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
2124  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
2125  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
2126  */
2127 
2128 (function($){
2129 
2130 /**
2131  * For use by classes which want to support custom, non-browser events.
2132  * TODO: This is an awful name!  This thing represents an "event source",
2133  *       not an "event handler".  PLEASE change the to EventSource. Also please
2134  *       change 'addHandler', 'removeHandler' and 'raiseEvent' to 'bind',
2135  *       'unbind', and 'trigger' respectively.  Finally add a method 'one' which
2136  *       automatically unbinds a listener after the first triggered event that
2137  *       matches.
2138  * @class
2139  */
2140 $.EventHandler = function() {
2141     this.events = {};
2142 };
2143 
2144 $.EventHandler.prototype = {
2145 
2146     /**
2147      * Add an event handler for a given event.
2148      * @function
2149      * @param {String} eventName - Name of event to register.
2150      * @param {Function} handler - Function to call when event is triggered.
2151      * @param {Object} optional userData - Arbitrary object to be passed to the handler.
2152      */
2153     addHandler: function ( eventName, handler, userData ) {
2154         var events = this.events[ eventName ];
2155         if ( !events ) {
2156             this.events[ eventName ] = events = [];
2157         }
2158         if ( handler && $.isFunction( handler ) ) {
2159             events[ events.length ] = { handler: handler, userData: userData || null };
2160         }
2161     },
2162 
2163     /**
2164      * Remove a specific event handler for a given event.
2165      * @function
2166      * @param {String} eventName - Name of event for which the handler is to be removed.
2167      * @param {Function} handler - Function to be removed.
2168      */
2169     removeHandler: function ( eventName, handler ) {
2170         var events = this.events[ eventName ],
2171             handlers = [],
2172             i;
2173         if ( !events ) {
2174             return;
2175         }
2176         if ( $.isArray( events ) ) {
2177             for ( i = 0; i < events.length; i++ ) {
2178                 if ( events[i].handler !== handler ) {
2179                     handlers.push( events[ i ] );
2180                 }
2181             }
2182             this.events[ eventName ] = handlers;
2183         }
2184     },
2185 
2186 
2187     /**
2188      * Remove all event handlers for a given event type. If no type is given all
2189      * event handlers for every event type are removed.
2190      * @function
2191      * @param {String} eventName - Name of event for which all handlers are to be removed.
2192      */
2193     removeAllHandlers: function( eventName ) {
2194         if ( eventName ){
2195             this.events[ eventName ] = [];
2196         } else{
2197             for ( var eventType in this.events ) {
2198                 this.events[ eventType ] = [];
2199             }
2200         }
2201     },
2202 
2203     /**
2204      * Retrive the list of all handlers registered for a given event.
2205      * @function
2206      * @param {String} eventName - Name of event to get handlers for.
2207      */
2208     getHandler: function ( eventName ) {
2209         var events = this.events[ eventName ];
2210         if ( !events || !events.length ) {
2211             return null;
2212         }
2213         events = events.length === 1 ?
2214             [ events[ 0 ] ] :
2215             Array.apply( null, events );
2216         return function ( source, args ) {
2217             var i,
2218                 length = events.length;
2219             for ( i = 0; i < length; i++ ) {
2220                 if ( events[ i ] ) {
2221                     args.userData = events[ i ].userData;
2222                     events[ i ].handler( source, args );
2223                 }
2224             }
2225         };
2226     },
2227 
2228     /**
2229      * Trigger an event, optionally passing additional information.
2230      * @function
2231      * @param {String} eventName - Name of event to register.
2232      * @param {Function} handler - Function to call when event is triggered.
2233      */
2234     raiseEvent: function( eventName, eventArgs ) {
2235         //uncomment if you want to get a log of all events
2236         //$.console.log( eventName );
2237         var handler = this.getHandler( eventName );
2238 
2239         if ( handler ) {
2240             if ( !eventArgs ) {
2241                 eventArgs = {};
2242             }
2243 
2244             handler( this, eventArgs );
2245         }
2246     }
2247 };
2248 
2249 }( OpenSeadragon ));
2250 
2251 /*
2252  * OpenSeadragon - MouseTracker
2253  *
2254  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
2255  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
2256  *
2257  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
2258  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
2259  * met:
2260  *
2261  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
2262  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
2263  *
2264  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
2265  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
2266  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
2267  *
2268  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
2269  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
2270  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
2271  *
2272  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
2273  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
2274  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
2275  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
2276  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
2277  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
2278  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
2279  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
2280  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
2281  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
2282  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
2283  */
2284 
2285 (function( $ ){
2286 
2287         // is any button currently being pressed while mouse events occur
2288     var IS_BUTTON_DOWN  = false,
2289         // is any tracker currently capturing?
2290         IS_CAPTURING    = false,
2291         // dictionary from hash to MouseTracker
2292         ACTIVE          = {},
2293         // list of trackers interested in capture
2294         CAPTURING       = [],
2295         // dictionary from hash to private properties
2296         THIS            = {};
2297 
2298     /**
2299      * The MouseTracker allows other classes to set handlers for common mouse
2300      * events on a specific element like, 'enter', 'exit', 'press', 'release',
2301      * 'scroll', 'click', and 'drag'.
2302      * @class
2303      * @param {Object} options
2304      *      Allows configurable properties to be entirely specified by passing
2305      *      an options object to the constructor.  The constructor also supports
2306      *      the original positional arguments 'elements', 'clickTimeThreshold',
2307      *      and 'clickDistThreshold' in that order.
2308      * @param {Element|String} options.element
2309      *      A reference to an element or an element id for which the mouse
2310      *      events will be monitored.
2311      * @param {Number} options.clickTimeThreshold
2312      *      The number of milliseconds within which mutliple mouse clicks
2313      *      will be treated as a single event.
2314      * @param {Number} options.clickDistThreshold
2315      *      The distance between mouse click within multiple mouse clicks
2316      *      will be treated as a single event.
2317      * @param {Function} options.enterHandler
2318      *      An optional handler for mouse enter.
2319      * @param {Function} options.exitHandler
2320      *      An optional handler for mouse exit.
2321      * @param {Function} options.pressHandler
2322      *      An optional handler for mouse press.
2323      * @param {Function} options.releaseHandler
2324      *      An optional handler for mouse release.
2325      * @param {Function} options.scrollHandler
2326      *      An optional handler for mouse scroll.
2327      * @param {Function} options.clickHandler
2328      *      An optional handler for mouse click.
2329      * @param {Function} options.dragHandler
2330      *      An optional handler for mouse drag.
2331      * @property {Number} hash
2332      *      An unique hash for this tracker.
2333      * @property {Element} element
2334      *      The element for which mouse event are being monitored.
2335      * @property {Number} clickTimeThreshold
2336      *      The number of milliseconds within which mutliple mouse clicks
2337      *      will be treated as a single event.
2338      * @property {Number} clickDistThreshold
2339      *      The distance between mouse click within multiple mouse clicks
2340      *      will be treated as a single event.
2341      */
2342     $.MouseTracker = function ( options ) {
2343 
2344         var args  = arguments;
2345 
2346         if( !$.isPlainObject( options ) ){
2347             options = {
2348                 element:            args[ 0 ],
2349                 clickTimeThreshold: args[ 1 ],
2350                 clickDistThreshold: args[ 2 ]
2351             };
2352         }
2353 
2354         this.hash               = Math.random();
2355         this.element            = $.getElement( options.element );
2356         this.clickTimeThreshold = options.clickTimeThreshold;
2357         this.clickDistThreshold = options.clickDistThreshold;
2358 
2359 
2360         this.enterHandler       = options.enterHandler   || null;
2361         this.exitHandler        = options.exitHandler    || null;
2362         this.pressHandler       = options.pressHandler   || null;
2363         this.releaseHandler     = options.releaseHandler || null;
2364         this.scrollHandler      = options.scrollHandler  || null;
2365         this.clickHandler       = options.clickHandler   || null;
2366         this.dragHandler        = options.dragHandler    || null;
2367         this.keyHandler         = options.keyHandler     || null;
2368         this.focusHandler       = options.focusHandler   || null;
2369         this.blurHandler        = options.blurHandler    || null;
2370 
2371         //Store private properties in a scope sealed hash map
2372         var _this = this;
2373 
2374         /**
2375          * @private
2376          * @property {Boolean} tracking
2377          *      Are we currently tracking mouse events.
2378          * @property {Boolean} capturing
2379          *      Are we curruently capturing mouse events.
2380          * @property {Boolean} buttonDown
2381          *      True if the left mouse button is currently being pressed and was
2382          *      initiated inside the tracked element, otherwise false.
2383          * @property {Boolean} insideElement
2384          *      Are we currently inside the screen area of the tracked element.
2385          * @property {OpenSeadragon.Point} lastPoint
2386          *      Position of last mouse down/move
2387          * @property {Number} lastMouseDownTime
2388          *      Time of last mouse down.
2389          * @property {OpenSeadragon.Point} lastMouseDownPoint
2390          *      Position of last mouse down
2391          */
2392         THIS[ this.hash ] = {
2393             mouseover:          function( event ){ onMouseOver( _this, event ); },
2394             mouseout:           function( event ){ onMouseOut( _this, event ); },
2395             mousedown:          function( event ){ onMouseDown( _this, event ); },
2396             mouseup:            function( event ){ onMouseUp( _this, event ); },
2397             click:              function( event ){ onMouseClick( _this, event ); },
2398             DOMMouseScroll:     function( event ){ onMouseWheelSpin( _this, event ); },
2399             mousewheel:         function( event ){ onMouseWheelSpin( _this, event ); },
2400             mouseupie:          function( event ){ onMouseUpIE( _this, event ); },
2401             mousemoveie:        function( event ){ onMouseMoveIE( _this, event ); },
2402             mouseupwindow:      function( event ){ onMouseUpWindow( _this, event ); },
2403             mousemove:          function( event ){ onMouseMove( _this, event ); },
2404             touchstart:         function( event ){ onTouchStart( _this, event ); },
2405             touchmove:          function( event ){ onTouchMove( _this, event ); },
2406             touchend:           function( event ){ onTouchEnd( _this, event ); },
2407             keypress:           function( event ){ onKeyPress( _this, event ); },
2408             focus:              function( event ){ onFocus( _this, event ); },
2409             blur:               function( event ){ onBlur( _this, event ); },
2410             tracking:           false,
2411             capturing:          false,
2412             buttonDown:         false,
2413             insideElement:      false,
2414             lastPoint:          null,
2415             lastMouseDownTime:  null,
2416             lastMouseDownPoint: null,
2417             lastPinchDelta:     0
2418         };
2419 
2420     };
2421 
2422     $.MouseTracker.prototype = {
2423 
2424         /**
2425          * Clean up any events or objects created by the mouse tracker.
2426          * @function
2427          */
2428         destroy: function() {
2429             stopTracking( this );
2430             this.element = null;
2431         },
2432 
2433         /**
2434          * Are we currently tracking events on this element.
2435          * @deprecated Just use this.tracking
2436          * @function
2437          * @returns {Boolean} Are we currently tracking events on this element.
2438          */
2439         isTracking: function () {
2440             return THIS[ this.hash ].tracking;
2441         },
2442 
2443         /**
2444          * Enable or disable whether or not we are tracking events on this element.
2445          * @function
2446          * @param {Boolean} track True to start tracking, false to stop tracking.
2447          * @returns {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} Chainable.
2448          */
2449         setTracking: function ( track ) {
2450             if ( track ) {
2451                 startTracking( this );
2452             } else {
2453                 stopTracking( this );
2454             }
2455             //chain
2456             return this;
2457         },
2458 
2459         /**
2460          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2461          * calling the constructor.
2462          * @function
2463          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2464          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2465          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} position
2466          *      The poistion of the event on the screen.
2467          * @param {Boolean} buttonDown
2468          *      True if the left mouse button is currently being pressed and was
2469          *      initiated inside the tracked element, otherwise false.
2470          * @param {Boolean} buttonDownAny
2471          *      Was the button down anywhere in the screen during the event.
2472          */
2473         enterHandler: function(){},
2474 
2475         /**
2476          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2477          * calling the constructor.
2478          * @function
2479          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2480          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2481          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} position
2482          *      The poistion of the event on the screen.
2483          * @param {Boolean} buttonDown
2484          *      True if the left mouse button is currently being pressed and was
2485          *      initiated inside the tracked element, otherwise false.
2486          * @param {Boolean} buttonDownAny
2487          *      Was the button down anywhere in the screen during the event.
2488          */
2489         exitHandler: function(){},
2490 
2491         /**
2492          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2493          * calling the constructor.
2494          * @function
2495          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2496          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2497          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} position
2498          *      The poistion of the event on the screen.
2499          */
2500         pressHandler: function(){},
2501 
2502         /**
2503          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2504          * calling the constructor.
2505          * @function
2506          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2507          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2508          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} position
2509          *      The poistion of the event on the screen.
2510          * @param {Boolean} buttonDown
2511          *      True if the left mouse button is currently being pressed and was
2512          *      initiated inside the tracked element, otherwise false.
2513          * @param {Boolean} insideElementRelease
2514          *      Was the mouse still inside the tracked element when the button
2515          *      was released.
2516          */
2517         releaseHandler: function(){},
2518 
2519         /**
2520          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2521          * calling the constructor.
2522          * @function
2523          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2524          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2525          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} position
2526          *      The poistion of the event on the screen.
2527          * @param {Number} scroll
2528          *      The scroll delta for the event.
2529          * @param {Boolean} shift
2530          *      Was the shift key being pressed during this event?
2531          */
2532         scrollHandler: function(){},
2533 
2534         /**
2535          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2536          * calling the constructor.
2537          * @function
2538          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2539          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2540          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} position
2541          *      The poistion of the event on the screen.
2542          * @param {Boolean} quick
2543          *      True only if the clickDistThreshold and clickDeltaThreshold are
2544          *      both pased. Useful for ignoring events.
2545          * @param {Boolean} shift
2546          *      Was the shift key being pressed during this event?
2547          */
2548         clickHandler: function(){},
2549 
2550         /**
2551          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2552          * calling the constructor.
2553          * @function
2554          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2555          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2556          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} position
2557          *      The poistion of the event on the screen.
2558          * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} delta
2559          *      The x,y components of the difference between start drag and
2560          *      end drag.  Usefule for ignoring or weighting the events.
2561          * @param {Boolean} shift
2562          *      Was the shift key being pressed during this event?
2563          */
2564         dragHandler: function(){},
2565 
2566         /**
2567          * Implement or assign implmentation to these handlers during or after
2568          * calling the constructor.
2569          * @function
2570          * @param {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker
2571          *      A reference to the tracker instance.
2572          * @param {Number} keyCode
2573          *      The key code that was pressed.
2574          * @param {Boolean} shift
2575          *      Was the shift key being pressed during this event?
2576          */
2577         keyHandler: function(){},
2578 
2579         focusHandler: function(){},
2580 
2581         blurHandler: function(){}
2582     };
2583 
2584     /**
2585      * Starts tracking mouse events on this element.
2586      * @private
2587      * @inner
2588      */
2589     function startTracking( tracker ) {
2590         var events = [
2591                 "mouseover", "mouseout", "mousedown", "mouseup",
2592                 "click",
2593                 "DOMMouseScroll", "mousewheel",
2594                 "touchstart", "touchmove", "touchend",
2595                 "keypress",
2596                 "focus", "blur"
2597             ],
2598             delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
2599             event,
2600             i;
2601 
2602         if ( !delegate.tracking ) {
2603             for( i = 0; i < events.length; i++ ){
2604                 event = events[ i ];
2605                 $.addEvent(
2606                     tracker.element,
2607                     event,
2608                     delegate[ event ],
2609                     false
2610                 );
2611             }
2612             delegate.tracking = true;
2613             ACTIVE[ tracker.hash ] = tracker;
2614         }
2615     }
2616 
2617     /**
2618      * Stops tracking mouse events on this element.
2619      * @private
2620      * @inner
2621      */
2622     function stopTracking( tracker ) {
2623         var events = [
2624                 "mouseover", "mouseout", "mousedown", "mouseup",
2625                 "click",
2626                 "DOMMouseScroll", "mousewheel",
2627                 "touchstart", "touchmove", "touchend",
2628                 "keypress",
2629                 "focus", "blur"
2630             ],
2631             delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
2632             event,
2633             i;
2634 
2635         if ( delegate.tracking ) {
2636             for( i = 0; i < events.length; i++ ){
2637                 event = events[ i ];
2638                 $.removeEvent(
2639                     tracker.element,
2640                     event,
2641                     delegate[ event ],
2642                     false
2643                 );
2644             }
2645 
2646             releaseMouse( tracker );
2647             delegate.tracking = false;
2648             delete ACTIVE[ tracker.hash ];
2649         }
2650     }
2651 
2652     /**
2653      * @private
2654      * @inner
2655      */
2656     function hasMouse( tracker ) {
2657         return THIS[ tracker.hash ].insideElement;
2658     }
2659 
2660     /**
2661      * Begin capturing mouse events on this element.
2662      * @private
2663      * @inner
2664      */
2665     function captureMouse( tracker ) {
2666         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ];
2667         if ( !delegate.capturing ) {
2668 
2669             if ( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE && $.Browser.version < 9 ) {
2670                 $.removeEvent(
2671                     tracker.element,
2672                     "mouseup",
2673                     delegate.mouseup,
2674                     false
2675                 );
2676                 $.addEvent(
2677                     tracker.element,
2678                     "mouseup",
2679                     delegate.mouseupie,
2680                     true
2681                 );
2682                 $.addEvent(
2683                     tracker.element,
2684                     "mousemove",
2685                     delegate.mousemoveie,
2686                     true
2687                 );
2688             } else {
2689                 $.addEvent(
2690                     window,
2691                     "mouseup",
2692                     delegate.mouseupwindow,
2693                     true
2694                 );
2695                 $.addEvent(
2696                     window,
2697                     "mousemove",
2698                     delegate.mousemove,
2699                     true
2700                 );
2701             }
2702             delegate.capturing = true;
2703         }
2704     }
2705 
2706 
2707     /**
2708      * Stop capturing mouse events on this element.
2709      * @private
2710      * @inner
2711      */
2712     function releaseMouse( tracker ) {
2713         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ];
2714         if ( delegate.capturing ) {
2715 
2716             if ( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE && $.Browser.version < 9 ) {
2717                 $.removeEvent(
2718                     tracker.element,
2719                     "mousemove",
2720                     delegate.mousemoveie,
2721                     true
2722                 );
2723                 $.removeEvent(
2724                     tracker.element,
2725                     "mouseup",
2726                     delegate.mouseupie,
2727                     true
2728                 );
2729                 $.addEvent(
2730                     tracker.element,
2731                     "mouseup",
2732                     delegate.mouseup,
2733                     false
2734                 );
2735             } else {
2736                 $.removeEvent(
2737                     window,
2738                     "mousemove",
2739                     delegate.mousemove,
2740                     true
2741                 );
2742                 $.removeEvent(
2743                     window,
2744                     "mouseup",
2745                     delegate.mouseupwindow,
2746                     true
2747                 );
2748             }
2749             delegate.capturing = false;
2750         }
2751     }
2752 
2753 
2754     /**
2755      * @private
2756      * @inner
2757      */
2758     function triggerOthers( tracker, handler, event ) {
2759         var otherHash;
2760         for ( otherHash in ACTIVE ) {
2761             if ( ACTIVE.hasOwnProperty( otherHash ) && tracker.hash != otherHash ) {
2762                 handler( ACTIVE[ otherHash ], event );
2763             }
2764         }
2765     }
2766 
2767 
2768     /**
2769      * @private
2770      * @inner
2771      */
2772     function onFocus( tracker, event ){
2773         //console.log( "focus %s", event );
2774         var propagate;
2775         if ( tracker.focusHandler ) {
2776             propagate = tracker.focusHandler(
2777                 tracker,
2778                 event
2779             );
2780             if( propagate === false ){
2781                 $.cancelEvent( event );
2782             }
2783         }
2784     }
2785 
2786 
2787     /**
2788      * @private
2789      * @inner
2790      */
2791     function onBlur( tracker, event ){
2792         //console.log( "blur %s", event );
2793         var propagate;
2794         if ( tracker.blurHandler ) {
2795             propagate = tracker.blurHandler(
2796                 tracker,
2797                 event
2798             );
2799             if( propagate === false ){
2800                 $.cancelEvent( event );
2801             }
2802         }
2803     }
2804 
2805 
2806     /**
2807      * @private
2808      * @inner
2809      */
2810     function onKeyPress( tracker, event ){
2811         //console.log( "keypress %s %s %s %s %s", event.keyCode, event.charCode, event.ctrlKey, event.shiftKey, event.altKey );
2812         var propagate;
2813         if ( tracker.keyHandler ) {
2814             propagate = tracker.keyHandler(
2815                 tracker,
2816                 event.keyCode ? event.keyCode : event.charCode,
2817                 event.shiftKey
2818             );
2819             if( !propagate ){
2820                 $.cancelEvent( event );
2821             }
2822         }
2823     }
2824 
2825 
2826     /**
2827      * @private
2828      * @inner
2829      */
2830     function onMouseOver( tracker, event ) {
2831 
2832         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
2833             propagate;
2834 
2835         event = $.getEvent( event );
2836 
2837         if ( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE &&
2838              $.Browser.version < 9 &&
2839              delegate.capturing &&
2840              !isChild( event.srcElement, tracker.element ) ) {
2841 
2842             triggerOthers( tracker, onMouseOver, event );
2843         }
2844 
2845         var to = event.target ?
2846                 event.target :
2847                 event.srcElement,
2848             from = event.relatedTarget ?
2849                 event.relatedTarget :
2850                 event.fromElement;
2851 
2852         if ( !isChild( tracker.element, to ) ||
2853               isChild( tracker.element, from ) ) {
2854             return;
2855         }
2856 
2857         delegate.insideElement = true;
2858 
2859         if ( tracker.enterHandler ) {
2860             propagate = tracker.enterHandler(
2861                 tracker,
2862                 getMouseRelative( event, tracker.element ),
2863                 delegate.buttonDown,
2864                 IS_BUTTON_DOWN
2865             );
2866             if( propagate === false ){
2867                 $.cancelEvent( event );
2868             }
2869         }
2870     }
2871 
2872 
2873     /**
2874      * @private
2875      * @inner
2876      */
2877     function onMouseOut( tracker, event ) {
2878         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
2879             propagate;
2880 
2881         event = $.getEvent( event );
2882 
2883         if ( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE &&
2884              $.Browser.version < 9 &&
2885              delegate.capturing &&
2886              !isChild( event.srcElement, tracker.element ) ) {
2887 
2888             triggerOthers( tracker, onMouseOut, event );
2889 
2890         }
2891 
2892         var from = event.target ?
2893                 event.target :
2894                 event.srcElement,
2895             to = event.relatedTarget ?
2896                 event.relatedTarget :
2897                 event.toElement;
2898 
2899         if ( !isChild( tracker.element, from ) ||
2900               isChild( tracker.element, to ) ) {
2901             return;
2902         }
2903 
2904         delegate.insideElement = false;
2905 
2906         if ( tracker.exitHandler ) {
2907             propagate = tracker.exitHandler(
2908                 tracker,
2909                 getMouseRelative( event, tracker.element ),
2910                 delegate.buttonDown,
2911                 IS_BUTTON_DOWN
2912             );
2913 
2914             if( propagate === false ){
2915                 $.cancelEvent( event );
2916             }
2917         }
2918     }
2919 
2920 
2921     /**
2922      * @private
2923      * @inner
2924      */
2925     function onMouseDown( tracker, event, noCapture ) {
2926         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
2927             propagate;
2928 
2929         event = $.getEvent( event );
2930 
2931         if ( event.button == 2 ) {
2932             return;
2933         }
2934 
2935         delegate.buttonDown = true;
2936 
2937         delegate.lastPoint = getMouseAbsolute( event );
2938         delegate.lastMouseDownPoint = delegate.lastPoint;
2939         delegate.lastMouseDownTime = $.now();
2940 
2941         if ( tracker.pressHandler ) {
2942             propagate = tracker.pressHandler(
2943                 tracker,
2944                 getMouseRelative( event, tracker.element )
2945             );
2946             if( propagate === false ){
2947                 $.cancelEvent( event );
2948             }
2949         }
2950 
2951         if ( tracker.pressHandler || tracker.dragHandler ) {
2952             $.cancelEvent( event );
2953         }
2954 
2955         if ( noCapture ) {
2956             return;
2957         }
2958             
2959         if ( !( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE && $.Browser.version < 9 ) ||
2960              !IS_CAPTURING ) {
2961             captureMouse( tracker );
2962             IS_CAPTURING = true;
2963             // reset to empty & add us
2964             CAPTURING = [ tracker ];
2965         } else if ( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE  && $.Browser.version < 9 ) {
2966             // add us to the list
2967             CAPTURING.push( tracker );
2968         }
2969     }
2970 
2971     /**
2972      * @private
2973      * @inner
2974      */
2975     function onTouchStart( tracker, event ) {
2976         var touchA,
2977             touchB;
2978 
2979         if( event.touches.length == 1 &&
2980             event.targetTouches.length == 1 &&
2981             event.changedTouches.length == 1 ){
2982 
2983             THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastTouch = event.touches[ 0 ];
2984             onMouseOver( tracker, event.changedTouches[ 0 ] );
2985             // call with no capture as the onMouseMove will 
2986             // be triggered by onTouchMove
2987             onMouseDown( tracker, event.touches[ 0 ], true );
2988         }
2989 
2990         if( event.touches.length == 2 ){
2991 
2992             touchA = getMouseAbsolute( event.touches[ 0 ] );
2993             touchB = getMouseAbsolute( event.touches[ 1 ] );
2994             THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastPinchDelta =
2995                 Math.abs( touchA.x - touchB.x ) +
2996                 Math.abs( touchA.y - touchB.y );
2997             THIS[ tracker.hash ].pinchMidpoint = new $.Point(
2998                 ( touchA.x + touchB.x ) / 2 ,
2999                 ( touchA.y + touchB.y ) / 2
3000             );
3001             //$.console.debug("pinch start : "+THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastPinchDelta);
3002         }
3003 
3004         event.preventDefault();
3005     }
3006 
3007 
3008     /**
3009      * @private
3010      * @inner
3011      */
3012     function onMouseUp( tracker, event ) {
3013         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
3014             //were we inside the tracked element when we were pressed
3015             insideElementPress = delegate.buttonDown,
3016             //are we still inside the tracked element when we released
3017             insideElementRelease = delegate.insideElement,
3018             propagate;
3019 
3020         event = $.getEvent( event );
3021 
3022         if ( event.button == 2 ) {
3023             return;
3024         }
3025 
3026         delegate.buttonDown = false;
3027 
3028         if ( tracker.releaseHandler ) {
3029             propagate = tracker.releaseHandler(
3030                 tracker,
3031                 getMouseRelative( event, tracker.element ),
3032                 insideElementPress,
3033                 insideElementRelease
3034             );
3035             if( propagate === false ){
3036                 $.cancelEvent( event );
3037             }
3038         }
3039 
3040         if ( insideElementPress && insideElementRelease ) {
3041             handleMouseClick( tracker, event );
3042         }
3043     }
3044 
3045 
3046     /**
3047      * @private
3048      * @inner
3049      */
3050     function onTouchEnd( tracker, event ) {
3051 
3052         if( event.touches.length === 0 &&
3053             event.targetTouches.length === 0 &&
3054             event.changedTouches.length == 1 ){
3055 
3056             THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastTouch = null;
3057             
3058             // call with no release, as the mouse events are 
3059             // not registered in onTouchStart
3060             onMouseUpWindow( tracker, event.changedTouches[ 0 ], true );
3061             onMouseOut( tracker, event.changedTouches[ 0 ] );
3062         }
3063         if( event.touches.length + event.changedTouches.length == 2 ){
3064             THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastPinchDelta = null;
3065             THIS[ tracker.hash ].pinchMidpoint  = null;
3066             //$.console.debug("pinch end");
3067         }
3068         event.preventDefault();
3069     }
3070 
3071 
3072     /**
3073      * Only triggered once by the deepest element that initially received
3074      * the mouse down event. We want to make sure THIS event doesn't bubble.
3075      * Instead, we want to trigger the elements that initially received the
3076      * mouse down event (including this one) only if the mouse is no longer
3077      * inside them. Then, we want to release capture, and emulate a regular
3078      * mouseup on the event that this event was meant for.
3079      * @private
3080      * @inner
3081      */
3082     function onMouseUpIE( tracker, event ) {
3083         var othertracker,
3084             i;
3085 
3086         event = $.getEvent( event );
3087 
3088         if ( event.button == 2 ) {
3089             return;
3090         }
3091 
3092         for ( i = 0; i < CAPTURING.length; i++ ) {
3093             othertracker = CAPTURING[ i ];
3094             if ( !hasMouse( othertracker ) ) {
3095                 onMouseUp( othertracker, event );
3096             }
3097         }
3098 
3099         releaseMouse( tracker );
3100         IS_CAPTURING = false;
3101         event.srcElement.fireEvent(
3102             "on" + event.type,
3103             document.createEventObject( event )
3104         );
3105 
3106         $.stopEvent( event );
3107     }
3108 
3109 
3110     /**
3111      * Only triggered in W3C browsers by elements within which the mouse was
3112      * initially pressed, since they are now listening to the window for
3113      * mouseup during the capture phase. We shouldn't handle the mouseup
3114      * here if the mouse is still inside this element, since the regular
3115      * mouseup handler will still fire.
3116      * @private
3117      * @inner
3118      */
3119     function onMouseUpWindow( tracker, event, noRelease ) {
3120         if ( ! THIS[ tracker.hash ].insideElement ) {
3121             onMouseUp( tracker, event );
3122         }
3123 
3124         if (noRelease) {
3125             return;
3126         }
3127 
3128         releaseMouse( tracker );
3129     }
3130 
3131 
3132     /**
3133      * @private
3134      * @inner
3135      */
3136     function onMouseClick( tracker, event ) {
3137         if ( tracker.clickHandler ) {
3138             $.cancelEvent( event );
3139         }
3140     }
3141 
3142 
3143     /**
3144      * @private
3145      * @inner
3146      */
3147     function onMouseWheelSpin( tracker, event ) {
3148         var nDelta = 0,
3149             propagate;
3150 
3151         if ( !event ) { // For IE, access the global (window) event object
3152             event = window.event;
3153         }
3154 
3155         if ( event.wheelDelta ) { // IE and Opera
3156             nDelta = event.wheelDelta;
3157             if ( window.opera ) {  // Opera has the values reversed
3158                 nDelta = -nDelta;
3159             }
3160         } else if (event.detail) { // Mozilla FireFox
3161             nDelta = -event.detail;
3162         }
3163         //The nDelta variable is gated to provide smooth z-index scrolling
3164         //since the mouse wheel allows for substantial deltas meant for rapid
3165         //y-index scrolling.
3166         nDelta = nDelta > 0 ? 1 : -1;
3167 
3168         if ( tracker.scrollHandler ) {
3169             propagate = tracker.scrollHandler(
3170                 tracker,
3171                 getMouseRelative( event, tracker.element ),
3172                 nDelta,
3173                 event.shiftKey
3174             );
3175             if( propagate === false ){
3176                 $.cancelEvent( event );
3177             }
3178         }
3179     }
3180 
3181 
3182     /**
3183      * @private
3184      * @inner
3185      */
3186     function handleMouseClick( tracker, event ) {
3187         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
3188             propagate;
3189 
3190         event = $.getEvent( event );
3191 
3192         if ( event.button == 2 ) {
3193             return;
3194         }
3195 
3196         var time     = $.now() - delegate.lastMouseDownTime,
3197             point    = getMouseAbsolute( event ),
3198             distance = delegate.lastMouseDownPoint.distanceTo( point ),
3199             quick    = time     <= tracker.clickTimeThreshold &&
3200                        distance <= tracker.clickDistThreshold;
3201 
3202         if ( tracker.clickHandler ) {
3203             propagate = tracker.clickHandler(
3204                 tracker,
3205                 getMouseRelative( event, tracker.element ),
3206                 quick,
3207                 event.shiftKey
3208             );
3209             if( propagate === false ){
3210                 $.cancelEvent( event );
3211             }
3212         }
3213     }
3214 
3215 
3216     /**
3217      * @private
3218      * @inner
3219      */
3220     function onMouseMove( tracker, event ) {
3221         var delegate = THIS[ tracker.hash ],
3222             delta,
3223             propagate,
3224             point;
3225 
3226         event = $.getEvent( event );
3227         point = getMouseAbsolute( event );
3228         delta = point.minus( delegate.lastPoint );
3229 
3230         delegate.lastPoint = point;
3231 
3232         if ( tracker.dragHandler ) {
3233             propagate = tracker.dragHandler(
3234                 tracker,
3235                 getMouseRelative( event, tracker.element ),
3236                 delta,
3237                 event.shiftKey
3238             );
3239             if( propagate === false ){
3240                 $.cancelEvent( event );
3241             }
3242         }
3243     }
3244 
3245 
3246     /**
3247      * @private
3248      * @inner
3249      */
3250     function onTouchMove( tracker, event ) {
3251         var touchA,
3252             touchB,
3253             pinchDelta;
3254 
3255         if ( !THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastTouch ) {
3256           return;
3257         }
3258 
3259         if( event.touches.length === 1 &&
3260             event.targetTouches.length === 1 &&
3261             event.changedTouches.length === 1 &&
3262             THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastTouch.identifier === event.touches[ 0 ].identifier){
3263 
3264             onMouseMove( tracker, event.touches[ 0 ] );
3265 
3266         } else if (  event.touches.length === 2 ){
3267 
3268             touchA = getMouseAbsolute( event.touches[ 0 ] );
3269             touchB = getMouseAbsolute( event.touches[ 1 ] );
3270             pinchDelta =
3271                 Math.abs( touchA.x - touchB.x ) +
3272                 Math.abs( touchA.y - touchB.y );
3273 
3274             //TODO: make the 75px pinch threshold configurable
3275             if( Math.abs( THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastPinchDelta - pinchDelta ) > 75 ){
3276                 //$.console.debug( "pinch delta : " + pinchDelta + " | previous : " + THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastPinchDelta);
3277 
3278                 onMouseWheelSpin( tracker, {
3279                     shift: false,
3280                     pageX: THIS[ tracker.hash ].pinchMidpoint.x,
3281                     pageY: THIS[ tracker.hash ].pinchMidpoint.y,
3282                     detail:(
3283                         THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastPinchDelta > pinchDelta
3284                     ) ? 1 : -1
3285                 });
3286 
3287                 THIS[ tracker.hash ].lastPinchDelta = pinchDelta;
3288             }
3289         }
3290         event.preventDefault();
3291     }
3292 
3293     /**
3294      * Only triggered once by the deepest element that initially received
3295      * the mouse down event. Since no other element has captured the mouse,
3296      * we want to trigger the elements that initially received the mouse
3297      * down event (including this one). The the param tracker isn't used
3298      * but for consistency with the other event handlers we include it.
3299      * @private
3300      * @inner
3301      */
3302     function onMouseMoveIE( tracker, event ) {
3303         var i;
3304         for ( i = 0; i < CAPTURING.length; i++ ) {
3305             onMouseMove( CAPTURING[ i ], event );
3306         }
3307 
3308         $.stopEvent( event );
3309     }
3310 
3311     /**
3312      * @private
3313      * @inner
3314      */
3315     function getMouseAbsolute( event ) {
3316         return $.getMousePosition( event );
3317     }
3318 
3319     /**
3320     * @private
3321     * @inner
3322     */
3323     function getMouseRelative( event, element ) {
3324         var mouse   = $.getMousePosition( event ),
3325             offset  = $.getElementPosition( element );
3326 
3327         return mouse.minus( offset );
3328     }
3329 
3330     /**
3331     * @private
3332     * @inner
3333     * Returns true if elementB is a child node of elementA, or if they're equal.
3334     */
3335     function isChild( elementA, elementB ) {
3336         var body = document.body;
3337         while ( elementB && elementA != elementB && body != elementB ) {
3338             try {
3339                 elementB = elementB.parentNode;
3340             } catch (e) {
3341                 return false;
3342             }
3343         }
3344         return elementA == elementB;
3345     }
3346 
3347     /**
3348     * @private
3349     * @inner
3350     */
3351     function onGlobalMouseDown() {
3352         IS_BUTTON_DOWN = true;
3353     }
3354 
3355     /**
3356     * @private
3357     * @inner
3358     */
3359     function onGlobalMouseUp() {
3360         IS_BUTTON_DOWN = false;
3361     }
3362 
3363 
3364     (function () {
3365         if ( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE && $.Browser.version < 9 ) {
3366             $.addEvent( document, "mousedown", onGlobalMouseDown, false );
3367             $.addEvent( document, "mouseup", onGlobalMouseUp, false );
3368         } else {
3369             $.addEvent( window, "mousedown", onGlobalMouseDown, true );
3370             $.addEvent( window, "mouseup", onGlobalMouseUp, true );
3371         }
3372     })();
3373 
3374 }( OpenSeadragon ));
3375 
3376 /*
3377  * OpenSeadragon - Control
3378  *

3380  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
3381  *

3383  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
3384  * met:
3385  *
3386  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
3387  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
3388  *
3389  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
3390  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
3391  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
3392  *
3393  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
3394  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
3395  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
3396  *
3397  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
3398  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
3399  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
3400  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
3401  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
3402  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
3403  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
3404  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
3405  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
3406  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
3407  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
3408  */
3409 
3410 (function( $ ){
3411 
3412 /**
3413  * An enumeration of supported locations where controls can be anchored,
3414  * including NONE, TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_RIGHT, and BOTTOM_LEFT.
3415  * The anchoring is always relative to the container
3416  * @static
3417  */
3418 $.ControlAnchor = {
3419     NONE: 0,
3420     TOP_LEFT: 1,
3421     TOP_RIGHT: 2,
3422     BOTTOM_RIGHT: 3,
3423     BOTTOM_LEFT: 4
3424 };
3425 
3426 /**
3427  * A Control represents any interface element which is meant to allow the user
3428  * to interact with the zoomable interface. Any control can be anchored to any
3429  * element.
3430  * @class
3431  * @param {Element} element - the control element to be anchored in the container.
3432  * @param {Object } options - All required and optional settings for configuring a control element.
3433  * @param {OpenSeadragon.ControlAnchor} [options.anchor=OpenSeadragon.ControlAnchor.NONE] - the position of the control
3434  *  relative to the container.
3435  * @param {Boolean} [options.attachToViewer=true] - Whether the control should be added directly to the viewer, or
3436  *  directly to the container
3437  * @param {Boolean} [options.autoFade=true] - Whether the control should have the autofade behavior
3438  * @param {Element} container - the element to control will be anchored too.
3439  *
3440  * @property {Element} element - the element providing the user interface with
3441  *  some type of control. Eg a zoom-in button
3442  * @property {OpenSeadragon.ControlAnchor} anchor - the position of the control
3443  *  relative to the container.
3444  * @property {Boolean} autoFade - Whether the control should have the autofade behavior
3445  * @property {Element} container - the element within with the control is
3446  *  positioned.
3447  * @property {Element} wrapper - a neutral element surrounding the control
3448  *  element.
3449  */
3450 $.Control = function ( element, options, container ) {
3451     var parent = element.parentNode;
3452     if (typeof options === 'number')
3453     {
3454         $.console.error("Passing an anchor directly into the OpenSeadragon.Control constructor is deprecated; " +
3455                         "please use an options object instead.  " +
3456                         "Support for this deprecated variant is scheduled for removal in December 2013");
3457          options = {anchor: options};
3458     }
3459     options.attachToViewer = (typeof options.attachToViewer === 'undefined') ? true : options.attachToViewer;
3460     this.autoFade = (typeof options.autoFade === 'undefined') ? true : options.autoFade;
3461     this.element    = element;
3462     this.anchor     = options.anchor;
3463     this.container  = container;
3464     this.wrapper    = $.makeNeutralElement( "span" );
3465     this.wrapper.style.display = "inline-block";
3466     this.wrapper.appendChild( this.element );
3467 
3468     if ( this.anchor == $.ControlAnchor.NONE ) {
3469         // IE6 fix
3470         this.wrapper.style.width = this.wrapper.style.height = "100%";
3471     }
3472 
3473     if (options.attachToViewer ) {
3474         if ( this.anchor == $.ControlAnchor.TOP_RIGHT ||
3475              this.anchor == $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_RIGHT ) {
3476             this.container.insertBefore(
3477                 this.wrapper,
3478                 this.container.firstChild
3479             );
3480         } else {
3481             this.container.appendChild( this.wrapper );
3482         }
3483     } else {
3484         parent.appendChild( this.wrapper );
3485     }
3486 };
3487 
3488 $.Control.prototype = {
3489 
3490     /**
3491      * Removes the control from the container.
3492      * @function
3493      */
3494     destroy: function() {
3495         this.wrapper.removeChild( this.element );
3496         this.container.removeChild( this.wrapper );
3497     },
3498 
3499     /**
3500      * Determines if the control is currently visible.
3501      * @function
3502      * @return {Boolean} true if currenly visible, false otherwise.
3503      */
3504     isVisible: function() {
3505         return this.wrapper.style.display != "none";
3506     },
3507 
3508     /**
3509      * Toggles the visibility of the control.
3510      * @function
3511      * @param {Boolean} visible - true to make visible, false to hide.
3512      */
3513     setVisible: function( visible ) {
3514         this.wrapper.style.display = visible ?
3515             "inline-block" :
3516             "none";
3517     },
3518 
3519     /**
3520      * Sets the opacity level for the control.
3521      * @function
3522      * @param {Number} opactiy - a value between 1 and 0 inclusively.
3523      */
3524     setOpacity: function( opacity ) {
3525         if ( this.element[ $.SIGNAL ] && $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.IE ) {
3526             $.setElementOpacity( this.element, opacity, true );
3527         } else {
3528             $.setElementOpacity( this.wrapper, opacity, true );
3529         }
3530     }
3531 };
3532 
3533 }( OpenSeadragon ));
3534 
3535 /*
3536  * OpenSeadragon - ControlDock
3537  *
3538  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
3539  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
3540  *
3541  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
3542  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
3543  * met:
3544  *
3545  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
3546  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
3547  *
3548  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
3549  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
3550  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
3551  *
3552  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
3553  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
3554  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
3555  *
3556  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
3557  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
3558  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
3559  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
3560  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
3561  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
3562  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
3563  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
3564  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
3565  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
3566  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
3567  */
3568 
3569 (function( $ ){
3570     /**
3571      * @class
3572      */
3573     $.ControlDock = function( options ){
3574         var layouts = [ 'topleft', 'topright', 'bottomright', 'bottomleft'],
3575             layout,
3576             i;
3577 
3578         $.extend( true, this, {
3579             id: 'controldock-'+$.now()+'-'+Math.floor(Math.random()*1000000),
3580             container: $.makeNeutralElement('form'),
3581             controls: []
3582         }, options );
3583 
3584         // Disable the form's submit; otherwise button clicks and return keys
3585         // can trigger it.
3586         this.container.onsubmit = function() {
3587             return false;
3588         };
3589 
3590         if( this.element ){
3591             this.element = $.getElement( this.element );
3592             this.element.appendChild( this.container );
3593             this.element.style.position = 'relative';
3594             this.container.style.width = '100%';
3595             this.container.style.height = '100%';
3596         }
3597 
3598         for( i = 0; i < layouts.length; i++ ){
3599             layout = layouts[ i ];
3600             this.controls[ layout ] = $.makeNeutralElement( "div" );
3601             this.controls[ layout ].style.position = 'absolute';
3602             if ( layout.match( 'left' ) ){
3603                 this.controls[ layout ].style.left = '0px';
3604             }
3605             if ( layout.match( 'right' ) ){
3606                 this.controls[ layout ].style.right = '0px';
3607             }
3608             if ( layout.match( 'top' ) ){
3609                 this.controls[ layout ].style.top = '0px';
3610             }
3611             if ( layout.match( 'bottom' ) ){
3612                 this.controls[ layout ].style.bottom = '0px';
3613             }
3614         }
3615 
3616         this.container.appendChild( this.controls.topleft );
3617         this.container.appendChild( this.controls.topright );
3618         this.container.appendChild( this.controls.bottomright );
3619         this.container.appendChild( this.controls.bottomleft );
3620     };
3621 
3622     $.ControlDock.prototype = {
3623 
3624         /**
3625          * @function
3626          */
3627         addControl: function ( element, controlOptions ) {
3628             element = $.getElement( element );
3629             var div = null;
3630 
3631             if ( getControlIndex( this, element ) >= 0 ) {
3632                 return;     // they're trying to add a duplicate control
3633             }
3634 
3635             switch ( controlOptions.anchor ) {
3636                 case $.ControlAnchor.TOP_RIGHT:
3637                     div = this.controls.topright;
3638                     element.style.position = "relative";
3639                     element.style.paddingRight = "0px";
3640                     element.style.paddingTop = "0px";
3641                     break;
3642                 case $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_RIGHT:
3643                     div = this.controls.bottomright;
3644                     element.style.position = "relative";
3645                     element.style.paddingRight = "0px";
3646                     element.style.paddingBottom = "0px";
3647                     break;
3648                 case $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_LEFT:
3649                     div = this.controls.bottomleft;
3650                     element.style.position = "relative";
3651                     element.style.paddingLeft = "0px";
3652                     element.style.paddingBottom = "0px";
3653                     break;
3654                 case $.ControlAnchor.TOP_LEFT:
3655                     div = this.controls.topleft;
3656                     element.style.position = "relative";
3657                     element.style.paddingLeft = "0px";
3658                     element.style.paddingTop = "0px";
3659                     break;
3660                 default:
3661                 case $.ControlAnchor.NONE:
3662                     div = this.container;
3663                     element.style.margin = "0px";
3664                     element.style.padding = "0px";
3665                     break;
3666             }
3667 
3668             this.controls.push(
3669                 new $.Control( element, controlOptions, div )
3670             );
3671             element.style.display = "inline-block";
3672         },
3673 
3674 
3675         /**
3676          * @function
3677          * @return {OpenSeadragon.ControlDock} Chainable.
3678          */
3679         removeControl: function ( element ) {
3680             element = $.getElement( element );
3681             var i = getControlIndex( this, element );
3682 
3683             if ( i >= 0 ) {
3684                 this.controls[ i ].destroy();
3685                 this.controls.splice( i, 1 );
3686             }
3687 
3688             return this;
3689         },
3690 
3691         /**
3692          * @function
3693          * @return {OpenSeadragon.ControlDock} Chainable.
3694          */
3695         clearControls: function () {
3696             while ( this.controls.length > 0 ) {
3697                 this.controls.pop().destroy();
3698             }
3699 
3700             return this;
3701         },
3702 
3703 
3704         /**
3705          * @function
3706          * @return {Boolean}
3707          */
3708         areControlsEnabled: function () {
3709             var i;
3710 
3711             for ( i = this.controls.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
3712                 if ( this.controls[ i ].isVisible() ) {
3713                     return true;
3714                 }
3715             }
3716 
3717             return false;
3718         },
3719 
3720 
3721         /**
3722          * @function
3723          * @return {OpenSeadragon.ControlDock} Chainable.
3724          */
3725         setControlsEnabled: function( enabled ) {
3726             var i;
3727 
3728             for ( i = this.controls.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
3729                 this.controls[ i ].setVisible( enabled );
3730             }
3731 
3732             return this;
3733         }
3734 
3735     };
3736 
3737 
3738     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3739     // Utility methods
3740     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3741     function getControlIndex( dock, element ) {
3742         var controls = dock.controls,
3743             i;
3744 
3745         for ( i = controls.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
3746             if ( controls[ i ].element == element ) {
3747                 return i;
3748             }
3749         }
3750 
3751         return -1;
3752     }
3753 
3754 }( OpenSeadragon ));
3755 
3756 /*
3757  * OpenSeadragon - Viewer
3758  *
3759  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
3760  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
3761  *
3762  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
3763  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
3764  * met:
3765  *
3766  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
3767  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
3768  *
3769  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
3770  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
3771  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
3772  *
3773  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
3774  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
3775  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
3776  *
3777  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
3778  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
3779  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
3780  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
3781  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
3782  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
3783  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
3784  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
3785  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
3786  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
3787  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
3788  */
3789 
3790 (function( $ ){
3791 
3792 // dictionary from hash to private properties
3793 var THIS = {},
3794 // We keep a list of viewers so we can 'wake-up' each viewer on
3795 // a page after toggling between fullpage modes
3796     VIEWERS = {};
3797 
3798 /**
3799  *
3800  * The main point of entry into creating a zoomable image on the page.
3801  *
3802  * We have provided an idiomatic javascript constructor which takes
3803  * a single object, but still support the legacy positional arguments.
3804  *
3805  * The options below are given in order that they appeared in the constructor
3806  * as arguments and we translate a positional call into an idiomatic call.
3807  *
3808  * @class
3809  * @extends OpenSeadragon.EventHandler
3810  * @extends OpenSeadragon.ControlDock
3811  * @param {Object} options
3812  * @param {String} options.element Id of Element to attach to,
3813  * @param {String} options.xmlPath  Xpath ( TODO: not sure! ),
3814  * @param {String} options.prefixUrl  Url used to prepend to paths, eg button
3815  *  images, etc.
3816  * @param {OpenSeadragon.Control[]} options.controls Array of OpenSeadragon.Control,
3817  * @param {OpenSeadragon.Overlay[]} options.overlays Array of OpenSeadragon.Overlay,
3818  * @param {OpenSeadragon.Control[]} options.overlayControls An Array of ( TODO:
3819  *  not sure! )
3820  * @property {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} viewport The viewer's viewport, where you
3821  *  can access zoom, pan, etc.
3822  *
3823  **/
3824 $.Viewer = function( options ) {
3825 
3826     var args  = arguments,
3827         _this = this,
3828         i;
3829 
3830 
3831     //backward compatibility for positional args while prefering more
3832     //idiomatic javascript options object as the only argument
3833     if( !$.isPlainObject( options ) ){
3834         options = {
3835             id:                 args[ 0 ],
3836             xmlPath:            args.length > 1 ? args[ 1 ] : undefined,
3837             prefixUrl:          args.length > 2 ? args[ 2 ] : undefined,
3838             controls:           args.length > 3 ? args[ 3 ] : undefined,
3839             overlays:           args.length > 4 ? args[ 4 ] : undefined,
3840             overlayControls:    args.length > 5 ? args[ 5 ] : undefined
3841         };
3842     }
3843 
3844     //options.config and the general config argument are deprecated
3845     //in favor of the more direct specification of optional settings
3846     //being pass directly on the options object
3847     if ( options.config ){
3848         $.extend( true, options, options.config );
3849         delete options.config;
3850     }
3851 
3852     //Public properties
3853     //Allow the options object to override global defaults
3854     $.extend( true, this, {
3855 
3856         //internal state and dom identifiers
3857         id:             options.id,
3858         hash:           options.id,
3859 
3860         //dom nodes
3861         element:        null,
3862         canvas:         null,
3863         container:      null,
3864 
3865         //TODO: not sure how to best describe these
3866         overlays:       [],
3867         overlayControls:[],
3868 
3869         //private state properties
3870         previousBody:   [],
3871 
3872         //This was originally initialized in the constructor and so could never
3873         //have anything in it.  now it can because we allow it to be specified
3874         //in the options and is only empty by default if not specified. Also
3875         //this array was returned from get_controls which I find confusing
3876         //since this object has a controls property which is treated in other
3877         //functions like clearControls.  I'm removing the accessors.
3878         customControls: [],
3879 
3880         //These are originally not part options but declared as members
3881         //in initialize.  Its still considered idiomatic to put them here
3882         source:         null,
3883         drawer:         null,
3884         drawers:        [],
3885         viewport:       null,
3886         navigator:      null,
3887 
3888         //A collection viewport is a seperate viewport used to provide
3889         //simultanious rendering of sets of tiless
3890         collectionViewport:     null,
3891         collectionDrawer:       null,
3892 
3893         //UI image resources
3894         //TODO: rename navImages to uiImages
3895         navImages:      null,
3896 
3897         //interface button controls
3898         buttons:        null,
3899 
3900         //TODO: this is defunct so safely remove it
3901         profiler:       null
3902 
3903     }, $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS, options );
3904 
3905     //Private state properties
3906     THIS[ this.hash ] = {
3907         "fsBoundsDelta":     new $.Point( 1, 1 ),
3908         "prevContainerSize": null,
3909         "animating":         false,
3910         "forceRedraw":       false,
3911         "mouseInside":       false,
3912         "group":             null,
3913         // whether we should be continuously zooming
3914         "zooming":           false,
3915         // how much we should be continuously zooming by
3916         "zoomFactor":        null,
3917         "lastZoomTime":      null,
3918         // did we decide this viewer has a sequence of tile sources
3919         "sequenced":         false,
3920         "sequence":          0,
3921         "fullPage":          false,
3922         "onfullscreenchange": null
3923     };
3924 
3925     this._updateRequestId = null;
3926 
3927     //Inherit some behaviors and properties
3928     $.EventHandler.call( this );
3929 
3930     this.addHandler( 'open-failed', function (source, args) {
3931         var msg = $.getString( "Errors.Open-Failed", args.source, args.message);
3932         _this._showMessage( msg );
3933     });
3934 
3935     $.ControlDock.call( this, options );
3936 
3937     //Deal with tile sources
3938     var initialTileSource;
3939 
3940     if ( this.xmlPath  ){
3941         //Deprecated option.  Now it is preferred to use the tileSources option
3942         this.tileSources = [ this.xmlPath ];
3943     }
3944 
3945     if ( this.tileSources  ){
3946         // tileSources is a complex option...
3947         //
3948         // It can be a string, object, or an array of any of strings and objects.
3949         // At this point we only care about if it is an Array or not.
3950         //
3951         if( $.isArray( this.tileSources ) ){
3952 
3953             //must be a sequence of tileSource since the first item
3954             //is a legacy tile source
3955             if( this.tileSources.length > 1 ){
3956                 THIS[ this.hash ].sequenced = true;
3957             }
3958             initialTileSource = this.tileSources[ 0 ];
3959         } else {
3960             initialTileSource = this.tileSources;
3961         }
3962 
3963         this.open( initialTileSource );
3964     }
3965 
3966     this.element              = this.element || document.getElementById( this.id );
3967     this.canvas               = $.makeNeutralElement( "div" );
3968     this.keyboardCommandArea  = $.makeNeutralElement( "textarea" );
3969 
3970     this.canvas.className = "openseadragon-canvas";
3971     (function( style ){
3972         style.width    = "100%";
3973         style.height   = "100%";
3974         style.overflow = "hidden";
3975         style.position = "absolute";
3976         style.top      = "0px";
3977         style.left     = "0px";
3978     }(  this.canvas.style ));
3979 
3980     //the container is created through applying the ControlDock constructor above
3981     this.container.className = "openseadragon-container";
3982     (function( style ){
3983         style.width     = "100%";
3984         style.height    = "100%";
3985         style.position  = "relative";
3986         style.overflow  = "hidden";
3987         style.left      = "0px";
3988         style.top       = "0px";
3989         style.textAlign = "left";  // needed to protect against
3990     }( this.container.style ));
3991 
3992     this.keyboardCommandArea.className = "keyboard-command-area";
3993     (function( style ){
3994         style.width    = "100%";
3995         style.height   = "100%";
3996         style.overflow = "hidden";
3997         style.position = "absolute";
3998         style.top      = "0px";
3999         style.left     = "0px";
4000         style.resize   = "none";
4001     }(  this.keyboardCommandArea.style ));
4002 
4003     this.container.insertBefore( this.canvas, this.container.firstChild );
4004     this.container.insertBefore( this.keyboardCommandArea, this.container.firstChild );
4005     this.element.appendChild( this.container );
4006 
4007     //Used for toggling between fullscreen and default container size
4008     //TODO: these can be closure private and shared across Viewer
4009     //      instances.
4010     this.bodyWidth      = document.body.style.width;
4011     this.bodyHeight     = document.body.style.height;
4012     this.bodyOverflow   = document.body.style.overflow;
4013     this.docOverflow    = document.documentElement.style.overflow;
4014 
4015     this.keyboardCommandArea.innerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
4016             _this : this,
4017             element:            this.keyboardCommandArea,
4018             focusHandler:       function(){
4019                 var point    = $.getElementPosition( this.element );
4020                 window.scrollTo( 0, point.y );
4021             },
4022 
4023             keyHandler:         function(tracker, keyCode, shiftKey){
4024                 switch( keyCode ){
4025                     case 61://=|+
4026                         _this.viewport.zoomBy(1.1);
4027                         _this.viewport.applyConstraints();
4028                         return false;
4029                     case 45://-|_
4030                         _this.viewport.zoomBy(0.9);
4031                         _this.viewport.applyConstraints();
4032                         return false;
4033                     case 48://0|)
4034                         _this.viewport.goHome();
4035                         _this.viewport.applyConstraints();
4036                         return false;
4037                     case 119://w
4038                     case 87://W
4039                     case 38://up arrow
4040                         if (shiftKey) {
4041                             _this.viewport.zoomBy(1.1);
4042                         } else {
4043                             _this.viewport.panBy(new $.Point(0, -0.05));
4044                         }
4045                         _this.viewport.applyConstraints();
4046                         return false;
4047                     case 115://s
4048                     case 83://S
4049                     case 40://down arrow
4050                         if (shiftKey) {
4051                             _this.viewport.zoomBy(0.9);
4052                         } else {
4053                             _this.viewport.panBy(new $.Point(0, 0.05));
4054                         }
4055                         _this.viewport.applyConstraints();
4056                         return false;
4057                     case 97://a
4058                     case 37://left arrow
4059                         _this.viewport.panBy(new $.Point(-0.05, 0));
4060                         _this.viewport.applyConstraints();
4061                         return false;
4062                     case 100://d
4063                     case 39://right arrow
4064                         _this.viewport.panBy(new $.Point(0.05, 0));
