4065                         _this.viewport.applyConstraints();
4066                         return false;
4067                     default:
4068                         //console.log( 'navigator keycode %s', keyCode );
4069                         return true;
4070                 }
4071             }
4072         }).setTracking( true ); // default state
4073 
4074 
4075     this.innerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
4076         element:            this.canvas,
4077         clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4078         clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4079         clickHandler:       $.delegate( this, onCanvasClick ),
4080         dragHandler:        $.delegate( this, onCanvasDrag ),
4081         releaseHandler:     $.delegate( this, onCanvasRelease ),
4082         scrollHandler:      $.delegate( this, onCanvasScroll )
4083     }).setTracking( this.mouseNavEnabled ? true : false ); // default state
4084 
4085     this.outerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
4086         element:            this.container,
4087         clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4088         clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4089         enterHandler:       $.delegate( this, onContainerEnter ),
4090         exitHandler:        $.delegate( this, onContainerExit ),
4091         releaseHandler:     $.delegate( this, onContainerRelease )
4092     }).setTracking( this.mouseNavEnabled ? true : false ); // always tracking
4093 
4094     if( this.toolbar ){
4095         this.toolbar = new $.ControlDock({ element: this.toolbar });
4096     }
4097 
4098     this.bindStandardControls();
4099     this.bindSequenceControls();
4100 
4101     for ( i = 0; i < this.customControls.length; i++ ) {
4102         this.addControl(
4103             this.customControls[ i ].id,
4104             {anchor: this.customControls[ i ].anchor}
4105         );
4106     }
4107 
4108     $.requestAnimationFrame( function(){
4109         beginControlsAutoHide( _this );
4110     } );    // initial fade out
4111 
4112 };
4113 
4114 $.extend( $.Viewer.prototype, $.EventHandler.prototype, $.ControlDock.prototype, {
4115 
4116 
4117     /**
4118      * @function
4119      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.isOpen
4120      * @return {Boolean}
4121      */
4122     isOpen: function () {
4123         return !!this.source;
4124     },
4125 
4126     /**
4127      * A deprecated function, renamed to 'open' to match event name and
4128      * match current 'close' method.
4129      * @function
4130      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.openDzi
4131      * @param {String} dzi xml string or the url to a DZI xml document.
4132      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4133      *
4134      * @deprecated - use 'open' instead.
4135      */
4136     openDzi: function ( dzi ) {
4137         return this.open( dzi );
4138     },
4139 
4140     /**
4141      * A deprecated function, renamed to 'open' to match event name and
4142      * match current 'close' method.
4143      * @function
4144      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.openTileSource
4145      * @param {String|Object|Function} See OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.open
4146      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4147      *
4148      * @deprecated - use 'open' instead.
4149      */
4150     openTileSource: function ( tileSource ) {
4151         return this.open( tileSource );
4152     },
4153 
4154     /**
4155      * Open a TileSource object into the viewer.
4156      *
4157      * tileSources is a complex option...
4158      *
4159      * It can be a string, object, function, or an array of any of these:
4160      *
4161      * - A String implies a url used to determine the tileSource implementation
4162      *      based on the file extension of url. JSONP is implied by *.js,
4163      *      otherwise the url is retrieved as text and the resulting text is
4164      *      introspected to determine if its json, xml, or text and parsed.
4165      * - An Object implies an inline configuration which has a single
4166      *      property sufficient for being able to determine tileSource
4167      *      implementation. If the object has a property which is a function
4168      *      named 'getTileUrl', it is treated as a custom TileSource.
4169      * @function
4170      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.open
4171      * @param {String|Object|Function}
4172      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4173      */
4174     open: function ( tileSource ) {
4175         var _this = this,
4176             customTileSource,
4177             readySource,
4178             $TileSource,
4179             options;
4180 
4181         _this._hideMessage();
4182 
4183         //allow plain xml strings or json strings to be parsed here
4184         if( $.type( tileSource ) == 'string' ){
4185             if( tileSource.match(/\s*<.*/) ){
4186                 tileSource = $.parseXml( tileSource );
4187             }else if( tileSource.match(/\s*[\{\[].*/) ){
4188                 /*jshint evil:true*/
4189                 tileSource = eval( '('+tileSource+')' );
4190             }
4191         }
4192 
4193         setTimeout(function(){
4194             if ( $.type( tileSource ) == 'string') {
4195                 //If its still a string it means it must be a url at this point
4196                 tileSource = new $.TileSource( tileSource, function( readySource ){
4197                     openTileSource( _this, readySource );
4198                 });
4199                 tileSource.addHandler( 'open-failed', function ( name, args ) {
4200                     _this.raiseEvent( 'open-failed', args );
4201                 });
4202 
4203             } else if ( $.isPlainObject( tileSource ) || tileSource.nodeType ){
4204                 if( $.isFunction( tileSource.getTileUrl ) ){
4205                     //Custom tile source
4206                     customTileSource = new $.TileSource(tileSource);
4207                     customTileSource.getTileUrl = tileSource.getTileUrl;
4208                     openTileSource( _this, customTileSource );
4209                 } else {
4210                     //inline configuration
4211                     $TileSource = $.TileSource.determineType( _this, tileSource );
4212                     if ( !$TileSource ) {
4213                         _this.raiseEvent( 'open-failed', {
4214                             message: "Unable to load TileSource",
4215                             source: tileSource
4216                         });
4217                         return;
4218                     }
4219                     options = $TileSource.prototype.configure.apply( _this, [ tileSource ]);
4220                     readySource = new $TileSource( options );
4221                     openTileSource( _this, readySource );
4222                 }
4223             } else {
4224                 //can assume it's already a tile source implementation
4225                 openTileSource( _this, tileSource );
4226             }
4227         }, 1);
4228 
4229         return this;
4230     },
4231 
4232 
4233     /**
4234      * @function
4235      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.close
4236      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4237      */
4238     close: function ( ) {
4239         if ( this._updateRequestId !== null ) {
4240             $.cancelAnimationFrame( this._updateRequestId );
4241             this._updateRequestId = null;
4242         }
4243 
4244         if ( this.navigator ) {
4245             this.navigator.close();
4246         }
4247 
4248         if ( this.drawer ) {
4249             this.drawer.clearOverlays();
4250         }
4251 
4252         this.source     = null;
4253         this.drawer     = null;
4254 
4255         this.viewport   = this.preserveViewport ? this.viewport : null;
4256         //this.profiler   = null;
4257         if (this.canvas){
4258             this.canvas.innerHTML = "";
4259         }
4260 
4261         VIEWERS[ this.hash ] = null;
4262         delete VIEWERS[ this.hash ];
4263 
4264         this.raiseEvent( 'close', { viewer: this } );
4265 
4266         return this;
4267     },
4268 
4269 
4270     /**
4271      * Function to destroy the viewer and clean up everything created by
4272      * OpenSeadragon.
4273      * @function
4274      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.destroy
4275      */
4276     destroy: function( ) {
4277         this.close();
4278 
4279         this.removeAllHandlers();
4280 
4281         // Go through top element (passed to us) and remove all children
4282         // Use removeChild to make sure it handles SVG or any non-html
4283         // also it performs better - http://jsperf.com/innerhtml-vs-removechild/15
4284         if (this.element){
4285             while (this.element.firstChild) {
4286                 this.element.removeChild(this.element.firstChild);
4287             }
4288         }
4289 
4290         // destroy the mouse trackers
4291         if (this.keyboardCommandArea){
4292             this.keyboardCommandArea.innerTracker.destroy();
4293         }
4294         if (this.innerTracker){
4295             this.innerTracker.destroy();
4296         }
4297         if (this.outerTracker){
4298             this.outerTracker.destroy();
4299         }
4300 
4301         // clear all our references to dom objects
4302         this.canvas = null;
4303         this.keyboardCommandArea = null;
4304         this.container = null;
4305 
4306         // clear our reference to the main element - they will need to pass it in again, creating a new viewer
4307         this.element = null;
4308     },
4309 
4310 
4311     /**
4312      * @function
4313      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.isMouseNavEnabled
4314      * @return {Boolean}
4315      */
4316     isMouseNavEnabled: function () {
4317         return this.innerTracker.isTracking();
4318     },
4319 
4320     /**
4321      * @function
4322      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.setMouseNavEnabled
4323      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4324      */
4325     setMouseNavEnabled: function( enabled ){
4326         this.innerTracker.setTracking( enabled );
4327         this.raiseEvent( 'mouse-enabled', { enabled: enabled, viewer: this } );
4328         return this;
4329     },
4330 
4331 
4332     /**
4333      * @function
4334      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.areControlsEnabled
4335      * @return {Boolean}
4336      */
4337     areControlsEnabled: function () {
4338         var enabled = this.controls.length,
4339             i;
4340         for( i = 0; i < this.controls.length; i++ ){
4341             enabled = enabled && this.controls[ i ].isVisibile();
4342         }
4343         return enabled;
4344     },
4345 
4346 
4347     /**
4348      * Shows or hides the controls (e.g. the default navigation buttons).
4349      *
4350      * @function
4351      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.setControlsEnabled
4352      * @param {Boolean} true to show, false to hide.
4353      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4354      */
4355     setControlsEnabled: function( enabled ) {
4356         if( enabled ){
4357             abortControlsAutoHide( this );
4358         } else {
4359             beginControlsAutoHide( this );
4360         }
4361         this.raiseEvent( 'controls-enabled', { enabled: enabled, viewer: this } );
4362         return this;
4363     },
4364 
4365 
4366     /**
4367      * @function
4368      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.isFullPage
4369      * @return {Boolean}
4370      */
4371     isFullPage: function () {
4372         return THIS[ this.hash ].fullPage;
4373     },
4374 
4375 
4376     /**
4377      * Toggle full page mode.
4378      * @function
4379      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.setFullPage
4380      * @param {Boolean} fullPage
4381      *      If true, enter full page mode.  If false, exit full page mode.
4382      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4383      */
4384     setFullPage: function( fullPage ) {
4385 
4386         var body            = document.body,
4387             bodyStyle       = body.style,
4388             docStyle        = document.documentElement.style,
4389             canvasStyle     = this.canvas.style,
4390             _this           = this,
4391             oldBounds,
4392             newBounds,
4393             viewer,
4394             hash,
4395             nodes,
4396             i;
4397 
4398         //dont bother modifying the DOM if we are already in full page mode.
4399         if ( fullPage == this.isFullPage() ) {
4400             return;
4401         }
4402 
4403 
4404         if ( fullPage ) {
4405 
4406             this.bodyOverflow   = bodyStyle.overflow;
4407             this.docOverflow    = docStyle.overflow;
4408             bodyStyle.overflow  = "hidden";
4409             docStyle.overflow   = "hidden";
4410 
4411             this.bodyWidth      = bodyStyle.width;
4412             this.bodyHeight     = bodyStyle.height;
4413             bodyStyle.width     = "100%";
4414             bodyStyle.height    = "100%";
4415 
4416             //when entering full screen on the ipad it wasnt sufficient to leave
4417             //the body intact as only only the top half of the screen would
4418             //respond to touch events on the canvas, while the bottom half treated
4419             //them as touch events on the document body.  Thus we remove and store
4420             //the bodies elements and replace them when we leave full screen.
4421             this.previousBody = [];
4422             THIS[ this.hash ].prevElementParent = this.element.parentNode;
4423             THIS[ this.hash ].prevNextSibling = this.element.nextSibling;
4424             THIS[ this.hash ].prevElementWidth = this.element.style.width;
4425             THIS[ this.hash ].prevElementHeight = this.element.style.height;
4426             nodes = body.childNodes.length;
4427             for ( i = 0; i < nodes; i ++ ){
4428                 this.previousBody.push( body.childNodes[ 0 ] );
4429                 body.removeChild( body.childNodes[ 0 ] );
4430             }
4431 
4432             //If we've got a toolbar, we need to enable the user to use css to
4433             //preserve it in fullpage mode
4434             if( this.toolbar && this.toolbar.element ){
4435                 //save a reference to the parent so we can put it back
4436                 //in the long run we need a better strategy
4437                 this.toolbar.parentNode = this.toolbar.element.parentNode;
4438                 this.toolbar.nextSibling = this.toolbar.element.nextSibling;
4439                 body.appendChild( this.toolbar.element );
4440 
4441                 //Make sure the user has some ability to style the toolbar based
4442                 //on the mode
4443                 $.addClass( this.toolbar.element, 'fullpage' );
4444             }
4445 
4446             $.addClass( this.element, 'fullpage' );
4447             body.appendChild( this.element );
4448 
4449             if( $.supportsFullScreen ){
4450                 THIS[ this.hash ].onfullscreenchange = function() {
4451                     /*
4452                         fullscreenchange events don't include the new fullscreen status so we need to
4453                         retrieve the current status from the fullscreen API. See:
4454                         https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Reference/Events/fullscreenchange
4455                     */
4456 
4457                     if( $.isFullScreen() ){
4458                         _this.setFullPage( true );
4459                     } else {
4460                         _this.setFullPage( false );
4461                     }
4462                 };
4463 
4464                 $.requestFullScreen( document.body );
4465 
4466                 // The target of the event is always the document,
4467                 // but it is possible to retrieve the fullscreen element through the API
4468                 // Note that the API is still vendor-prefixed in browsers implementing it
4469                 document.addEventListener(
4470                     $.fullScreenEventName,
4471                     THIS[ this.hash ].onfullscreenchange
4472                 );
4473                 this.element.style.height = '100%';
4474                 this.element.style.width = '100%';
4475             }else{
4476                 this.element.style.height = $.getWindowSize().y + 'px';
4477                 this.element.style.width = $.getWindowSize().x + 'px';
4478             }
4479 
4480             if( this.toolbar && this.toolbar.element ){
4481                 this.element.style.height = (
4482                     $.getElementSize( this.element ).y - $.getElementSize( this.toolbar.element ).y
4483                 ) + 'px';
4484             }
4485 
4486             THIS[ this.hash ].fullPage = true;
4487 
4488             // mouse will be inside container now
4489             $.delegate( this, onContainerEnter )();
4490 
4491 
4492         } else {
4493 
4494             if( $.supportsFullScreen ){
4495                 document.removeEventListener(
4496                     $.fullScreenEventName,
4497                     THIS[ this.hash ].onfullscreenchange
4498                 );
4499                 $.cancelFullScreen( document );
4500             }
4501 
4502             bodyStyle.overflow  = this.bodyOverflow;
4503             docStyle.overflow   = this.docOverflow;
4504 
4505             bodyStyle.width     = this.bodyWidth;
4506             bodyStyle.height    = this.bodyHeight;
4507 
4508             canvasStyle.backgroundColor = "";
4509             canvasStyle.color           = "";
4510 
4511             body.removeChild( this.element );
4512             nodes = this.previousBody.length;
4513             for ( i = 0; i < nodes; i++ ){
4514                 body.appendChild( this.previousBody.shift() );
4515             }
4516 
4517             $.removeClass( this.element, 'fullpage' );
4518             THIS[ this.hash ].prevElementParent.insertBefore(
4519                 this.element,
4520                 THIS[ this.hash ].prevNextSibling
4521             );
4522 
4523             //If we've got a toolbar, we need to enable the user to use css to
4524             //reset it to its original state
4525             if( this.toolbar && this.toolbar.element ){
4526                 body.removeChild( this.toolbar.element );
4527 
4528                 //Make sure the user has some ability to style the toolbar based
4529                 //on the mode
4530                 $.removeClass( this.toolbar.element, 'fullpage' );
4531                 //this.toolbar.element.style.position = 'relative';
4532                 this.toolbar.parentNode.insertBefore(
4533                     this.toolbar.element,
4534                     this.toolbar.nextSibling
4535                 );
4536                 delete this.toolbar.parentNode;
4537                 delete this.toolbar.nextSibling;
4538 
4539                 //this.container.style.top = 'auto';
4540             }
4541 
4542             this.element.style.width = THIS[ this.hash ].prevElementWidth;
4543             this.element.style.height = THIS[ this.hash ].prevElementHeight;
4544 
4545             THIS[ this.hash ].fullPage = false;
4546 
4547             // mouse will likely be outside now
4548             $.delegate( this, onContainerExit )();
4549 
4550 
4551         }
4552         this.raiseEvent( 'fullpage', { fullpage: fullPage, viewer: this } );
4553 
4554         if ( this.viewport ) {
4555             oldBounds = this.viewport.getBounds();
4556             this.viewport.resize( THIS[ this.hash ].prevContainerSize );
4557             newBounds = this.viewport.getBounds();
4558 
4559             if ( fullPage ) {
4560                 THIS[ this.hash ].fsBoundsDelta = new $.Point(
4561                     newBounds.width  / oldBounds.width,
4562                     newBounds.height / oldBounds.height
4563                 );
4564             } else {
4565                 this.viewport.update();
4566                 this.viewport.zoomBy(
4567                     Math.max(
4568                         THIS[ this.hash ].fsBoundsDelta.x,
4569                         THIS[ this.hash ].fsBoundsDelta.y
4570                     ),
4571                     null,
4572                     true
4573                 );
4574                 //Ensures that if multiple viewers are on a page, the viewers that
4575                 //were hidden during fullpage are 'reopened'
4576                 for( hash in VIEWERS ){
4577                     viewer = VIEWERS[ hash ];
4578                     if( viewer !== this && viewer != this.navigator ){
4579                         viewer.open( viewer.source );
4580                         if( viewer.navigator ){
4581                             viewer.navigator.open( viewer.source );
4582                         }
4583                     }
4584                 }
4585             }
4586 
4587             THIS[ this.hash ].forceRedraw = true;
4588             updateOnce( this );
4589 
4590         }
4591         return this;
4592     },
4593 
4594 
4595     /**
4596      * @function
4597      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.isVisible
4598      * @return {Boolean}
4599      */
4600     isVisible: function () {
4601         return this.container.style.visibility != "hidden";
4602     },
4603 
4604 
4605     /**
4606      * @function
4607      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.setVisible
4608      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4609      */
4610     setVisible: function( visible ){
4611         this.container.style.visibility = visible ? "" : "hidden";
4612         this.raiseEvent( 'visible', { visible: visible, viewer: this } );
4613         return this;
4614     },
4615 
4616 
4617     /**
4618      * @function
4619      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.bindSequenceControls
4620      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4621      */
4622     bindSequenceControls: function(){
4623 
4624         //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4625         // Image Sequence Controls
4626         //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4627         var onFocusHandler          = $.delegate( this, onFocus ),
4628             onBlurHandler           = $.delegate( this, onBlur ),
4629             onNextHandler           = $.delegate( this, onNext ),
4630             onPreviousHandler       = $.delegate( this, onPrevious ),
4631             navImages               = this.navImages,
4632             useGroup                = true ;
4633 
4634         if( this.showSequenceControl && THIS[ this.hash ].sequenced ){
4635 
4636             if( this.previousButton || this.nextButton ){
4637                 //if we are binding to custom buttons then layout and
4638                 //grouping is the responsibility of the page author
4639                 useGroup = false;
4640             }
4641 
4642             this.previousButton = new $.Button({
4643                 element:    this.previousButton ? $.getElement( this.previousButton ) : null,
4644                 clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4645                 clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4646                 tooltip:    $.getString( "Tooltips.PreviousPage" ),
4647                 srcRest:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.previous.REST ),
4648                 srcGroup:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.previous.GROUP ),
4649                 srcHover:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.previous.HOVER ),
4650                 srcDown:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.previous.DOWN ),
4651                 onRelease:  onPreviousHandler,
4652                 onFocus:    onFocusHandler,
4653                 onBlur:     onBlurHandler
4654             });
4655 
4656             this.nextButton = new $.Button({
4657                 element:    this.nextButton ? $.getElement( this.nextButton ) : null,
4658                 clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4659                 clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4660                 tooltip:    $.getString( "Tooltips.NextPage" ),
4661                 srcRest:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.next.REST ),
4662                 srcGroup:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.next.GROUP ),
4663                 srcHover:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.next.HOVER ),
4664                 srcDown:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.next.DOWN ),
4665                 onRelease:  onNextHandler,
4666                 onFocus:    onFocusHandler,
4667                 onBlur:     onBlurHandler
4668             });
4669 
4670             if( !this.navPrevNextWrap ){
4671                 this.previousButton.disable();
4672             }
4673 
4674             if( useGroup ){
4675                 this.paging = new $.ButtonGroup({
4676                     buttons: [
4677                         this.previousButton,
4678                         this.nextButton
4679                     ],
4680                     clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4681                     clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold
4682                 });
4683 
4684                 this.pagingControl = this.paging.element;
4685 
4686                 if( this.toolbar ){
4687                     this.toolbar.addControl(
4688                         this.pagingControl,
4689                         {anchor: $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_RIGHT}
4690                     );
4691                 }else{
4692                     this.addControl(
4693                         this.pagingControl,
4694                         {anchor: $.ControlAnchor.TOP_LEFT}
4695                     );
4696                 }
4697             }
4698         }
4699         return this;
4700     },
4701 
4702 
4703     /**
4704      * @function
4705      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.bindStandardControls
4706      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4707      */
4708     bindStandardControls: function(){
4709         //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4710         // Navigation Controls
4711         //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4712         var beginZoomingInHandler   = $.delegate( this, beginZoomingIn ),
4713             endZoomingHandler       = $.delegate( this, endZooming ),
4714             doSingleZoomInHandler   = $.delegate( this, doSingleZoomIn ),
4715             beginZoomingOutHandler  = $.delegate( this, beginZoomingOut ),
4716             doSingleZoomOutHandler  = $.delegate( this, doSingleZoomOut ),
4717             onHomeHandler           = $.delegate( this, onHome ),
4718             onFullPageHandler       = $.delegate( this, onFullPage ),
4719             onFocusHandler          = $.delegate( this, onFocus ),
4720             onBlurHandler           = $.delegate( this, onBlur ),
4721             navImages               = this.navImages,
4722             buttons                 = [],
4723             useGroup                = true ;
4724 
4725 
4726         if( this.showNavigationControl ){
4727 
4728             if( this.zoomInButton || this.zoomOutButton || this.homeButton || this.fullPageButton ){
4729                 //if we are binding to custom buttons then layout and
4730                 //grouping is the responsibility of the page author
4731                 useGroup = false;
4732             }
4733 
4734             buttons.push( this.zoomInButton = new $.Button({
4735                 element:    this.zoomInButton ? $.getElement( this.zoomInButton ) : null,
4736                 clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4737                 clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4738                 tooltip:    $.getString( "Tooltips.ZoomIn" ),
4739                 srcRest:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomIn.REST ),
4740                 srcGroup:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomIn.GROUP ),
4741                 srcHover:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomIn.HOVER ),
4742                 srcDown:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomIn.DOWN ),
4743                 onPress:    beginZoomingInHandler,
4744                 onRelease:  endZoomingHandler,
4745                 onClick:    doSingleZoomInHandler,
4746                 onEnter:    beginZoomingInHandler,
4747                 onExit:     endZoomingHandler,
4748                 onFocus:    onFocusHandler,
4749                 onBlur:     onBlurHandler
4750             }));
4751 
4752             buttons.push( this.zoomOutButton = new $.Button({
4753                 element:    this.zoomOutButton ? $.getElement( this.zoomOutButton ) : null,
4754                 clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4755                 clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4756                 tooltip:    $.getString( "Tooltips.ZoomOut" ),
4757                 srcRest:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomOut.REST ),
4758                 srcGroup:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomOut.GROUP ),
4759                 srcHover:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomOut.HOVER ),
4760                 srcDown:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.zoomOut.DOWN ),
4761                 onPress:    beginZoomingOutHandler,
4762                 onRelease:  endZoomingHandler,
4763                 onClick:    doSingleZoomOutHandler,
4764                 onEnter:    beginZoomingOutHandler,
4765                 onExit:     endZoomingHandler,
4766                 onFocus:    onFocusHandler,
4767                 onBlur:     onBlurHandler
4768             }));
4769 
4770             buttons.push( this.homeButton = new $.Button({
4771                 element:    this.homeButton ? $.getElement( this.homeButton ) : null,
4772                 clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4773                 clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4774                 tooltip:    $.getString( "Tooltips.Home" ),
4775                 srcRest:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.home.REST ),
4776                 srcGroup:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.home.GROUP ),
4777                 srcHover:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.home.HOVER ),
4778                 srcDown:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.home.DOWN ),
4779                 onRelease:  onHomeHandler,
4780                 onFocus:    onFocusHandler,
4781                 onBlur:     onBlurHandler
4782             }));
4783 
4784             buttons.push( this.fullPageButton = new $.Button({
4785                 element:    this.fullPageButton ? $.getElement( this.fullPageButton ) : null,
4786                 clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4787                 clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
4788                 tooltip:    $.getString( "Tooltips.FullPage" ),
4789                 srcRest:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.fullpage.REST ),
4790                 srcGroup:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.fullpage.GROUP ),
4791                 srcHover:   resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.fullpage.HOVER ),
4792                 srcDown:    resolveUrl( this.prefixUrl, navImages.fullpage.DOWN ),
4793                 onRelease:  onFullPageHandler,
4794                 onFocus:    onFocusHandler,
4795                 onBlur:     onBlurHandler
4796             }));
4797 
4798             if( useGroup ){
4799                 this.buttons = new $.ButtonGroup({
4800                     buttons:            buttons,
4801                     clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
4802                     clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold
4803                 });
4804 
4805                 this.navControl  = this.buttons.element;
4806                 this.addHandler( 'open', $.delegate( this, lightUp ) );
4807 
4808                 if( this.toolbar ){
4809                     this.toolbar.addControl(
4810                         this.navControl,
4811                         {anchor: $.ControlAnchor.TOP_LEFT}
4812                     );
4813                 }else{
4814                     this.addControl(
4815                         this.navControl,
4816                         {anchor: $.ControlAnchor.TOP_LEFT}
4817                     );
4818                 }
4819             }
4820 
4821         }
4822         return this;
4823     },
4824 
4825 
4826     /**
4827      * @function
4828      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewer.prototype.goToPage
4829      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewer} Chainable.
4830      */
4831     goToPage: function( page ){
4832         //page is a 1 based index so normalize now
4833         //page = page;
4834         this.raiseEvent( 'page', { page: page, viewer: this } );
4835 
4836         if( this.tileSources.length > page ){
4837 
4838             THIS[ this.hash ].sequence = page;
4839 
4840             if( this.nextButton ){
4841                 if( ( this.tileSources.length - 1 ) === page  ){
4842                     //Disable next button
4843                     if(!this.navPrevNextWrap){
4844                         this.nextButton.disable();
4845                     }
4846                 } else {
4847                     this.nextButton.enable();
4848                 }
4849             }
4850             if( this.previousButton ){
4851                 if( page > 0 ){
4852                     //Enable previous button
4853                     this.previousButton.enable();
4854                 } else {
4855                     if(!this.navPrevNextWrap){
4856                         this.previousButton.disable();
4857                     }
4858                 }
4859             }
4860 
4861             this.open( this.tileSources[ page ] );
4862         }
4863 
4864         if( $.isFunction( this.onPageChange ) ){
4865             this.onPageChange({
4866                 page: page,
4867                 viewer: this
4868             });
4869         }
4870         if( this.referenceStrip ){
4871             this.referenceStrip.setFocus( page );
4872         }
4873         return this;
4874     },
4875 
4876     /**
4877      * Display a message in the viewport
4878      * @function
4879      * @private
4880      * @param {String} text message
4881      */
4882     _showMessage: function ( message ) {
4883         this._hideMessage();
4884 
4885         var div = $.makeNeutralElement( "div" );
4886         div.appendChild( document.createTextNode( message ) );
4887 
4888         this.messageDiv = $.makeCenteredNode( div );
4889 
4890         $.addClass(this.messageDiv, "openseadragon-message");
4891 
4892         this.container.appendChild( this.messageDiv );
4893     },
4894 
4895     /**
4896      * Hide any currently displayed viewport message
4897      * @function
4898      * @private
4899      */
4900     _hideMessage: function () {
4901         var div = this.messageDiv;
4902         if (div) {
4903             div.parentNode.removeChild(div);
4904             delete this.messageDiv;
4905         }
4906     }
4907 });
4908 
4909 
4910 /**
4911  * _getSafeElemSize is like getElementSize(), but refuses to return 0 for x or y,
4912  * which was causing some calling operations in updateOnce and openTileSource to
4913  * return NaN.
4914  * @returns {Point}
4915  * @private
4916  */
4917 function _getSafeElemSize (oElement) {
4918     oElement = $.getElement( oElement );
4919 
4920     return new $.Point(
4921         (oElement.clientWidth === 0 ? 1 : oElement.clientWidth),
4922         (oElement.clientHeight === 0 ? 1 : oElement.clientHeight)
4923     );
4924 }
4925 
4926 /**
4927  * @function
4928  * @private
4929  */
4930 function openTileSource( viewer, source ) {
4931     var _this = viewer,
4932         overlay,
4933         i;
4934 
4935     if ( _this.source ) {
4936         _this.close( );
4937     }
4938 
4939     _this.canvas.innerHTML = "";
4940     THIS[ _this.hash ].prevContainerSize = _getSafeElemSize( _this.container );
4941 
4942 
4943     if( _this.collectionMode ){
4944         _this.source = new $.TileSourceCollection({
4945             rows: _this.collectionRows,
4946             layout: _this.collectionLayout,
4947             tileSize: _this.collectionTileSize,
4948             tileSources: _this.tileSources,
4949             tileMargin: _this.collectionTileMargin
4950         });
4951         _this.viewport = _this.viewport ? _this.viewport : new $.Viewport({
4952             collectionMode:         true,
4953             collectionTileSource:   _this.source,
4954             containerSize:          THIS[ _this.hash ].prevContainerSize,
4955             contentSize:            _this.source.dimensions,
4956             springStiffness:        _this.springStiffness,
4957             animationTime:          _this.animationTime,
4958             showNavigator:          false,
4959             minZoomImageRatio:      1,
4960             maxZoomPixelRatio:      1,
4961             viewer:                 _this //,
4962             //TODO: figure out how to support these in a way that makes sense
4963             //minZoomLevel:           this.minZoomLevel,
4964             //maxZoomLevel:           this.maxZoomLevel
4965         });
4966     }else{
4967         if( source ){
4968             _this.source = source;
4969         }
4970         _this.viewport = _this.viewport ? _this.viewport : new $.Viewport({
4971             containerSize:      THIS[ _this.hash ].prevContainerSize,
4972             contentSize:        _this.source.dimensions,
4973             springStiffness:    _this.springStiffness,
4974             animationTime:      _this.animationTime,
4975             minZoomImageRatio:  _this.minZoomImageRatio,
4976             maxZoomPixelRatio:  _this.maxZoomPixelRatio,
4977             visibilityRatio:    _this.visibilityRatio,
4978             wrapHorizontal:     _this.wrapHorizontal,
4979             wrapVertical:       _this.wrapVertical,
4980             defaultZoomLevel:   _this.defaultZoomLevel,
4981             minZoomLevel:       _this.minZoomLevel,
4982             maxZoomLevel:       _this.maxZoomLevel,
4983             viewer:             _this
4984         });
4985     }
4986 
4987     if( _this.preserveViewport ){
4988         _this.viewport.resetContentSize( _this.source.dimensions );
4989     }
4990 
4991     _this.source.overlays = _this.source.overlays || [];
4992 
4993     _this.drawer = new $.Drawer({
4994         viewer:             _this,
4995         source:             _this.source,
4996         viewport:           _this.viewport,
4997         element:            _this.canvas,
4998         overlays:           [].concat( _this.overlays ).concat( _this.source.overlays ),
4999         maxImageCacheCount: _this.maxImageCacheCount,
5000         imageLoaderLimit:   _this.imageLoaderLimit,
5001         minZoomImageRatio:  _this.minZoomImageRatio,
5002         wrapHorizontal:     _this.wrapHorizontal,
5003         wrapVertical:       _this.wrapVertical,
5004         immediateRender:    _this.immediateRender,
5005         blendTime:          _this.blendTime,
5006         alwaysBlend:        _this.alwaysBlend,
5007         minPixelRatio:      _this.collectionMode ? 0 : _this.minPixelRatio,
5008         timeout:            _this.timeout,
5009         debugMode:          _this.debugMode,
5010         debugGridColor:     _this.debugGridColor
5011     });
5012 
5013     //Instantiate a navigator if configured
5014     if ( _this.showNavigator  && !_this.collectionMode ){
5015         // Note: By passing the fully parsed source, the navigator doesn't
5016         // have to load it again.
5017         if ( _this.navigator ) {
5018             _this.navigator.open( source );
5019         } else {
5020             _this.navigator = new $.Navigator({
5021                 id:          _this.navigatorId,
5022                 position:    _this.navigatorPosition,
5023                 sizeRatio:   _this.navigatorSizeRatio,
5024                 height:      _this.navigatorHeight,
5025                 width:       _this.navigatorWidth,
5026                 tileSources: source,
5027                 tileHost:    _this.tileHost,
5028                 prefixUrl:   _this.prefixUrl,
5029                 overlays:    _this.overlays,
5030                 viewer:      _this
5031             });
5032         }
5033     }
5034 
5035     //Instantiate a referencestrip if configured
5036     if ( _this.showReferenceStrip  && !_this.referenceStrip ){
5037         _this.referenceStrip = new $.ReferenceStrip({
5038             id:          _this.referenceStripElement,
5039             position:    _this.referenceStripPosition,
5040             sizeRatio:   _this.referenceStripSizeRatio,
5041             scroll:      _this.referenceStripScroll,
5042             height:      _this.referenceStripHeight,
5043             width:       _this.referenceStripWidth,
5044             tileSources: _this.tileSources,
5045             tileHost:    _this.tileHost,
5046             prefixUrl:   _this.prefixUrl,
5047             overlays:    _this.overlays,
5048             viewer:      _this
5049         });
5050     }
5051 
5052     //this.profiler = new $.Profiler();
5053 
5054     THIS[ _this.hash ].animating = false;
5055     THIS[ _this.hash ].forceRedraw = true;
5056     _this._updateRequestId = scheduleUpdate( _this, updateMulti );
5057 
5058     //Assuming you had programatically created a bunch of overlays
5059     //and added them via configuration
5060     for ( i = 0; i < _this.overlayControls.length; i++ ) {
5061 
5062         overlay = _this.overlayControls[ i ];
5063 
5064         if ( overlay.point ) {
5065 
5066             _this.drawer.addOverlay(
5067                 overlay.id,
5068                 new $.Point(
5069                     overlay.point.X,
5070                     overlay.point.Y
5071                 ),
5072                 $.OverlayPlacement.TOP_LEFT
5073             );
5074 
5075         } else {
5076 
5077             _this.drawer.addOverlay(
5078                 overlay.id,
5079                 new $.Rect(
5080                     overlay.rect.Point.X,
5081                     overlay.rect.Point.Y,
5082                     overlay.rect.Width,
5083                     overlay.rect.Height
5084                 ),
5085                 overlay.placement
5086             );
5087 
5088         }
5089     }
5090     VIEWERS[ _this.hash ] = _this;
5091 
5092     _this.raiseEvent( 'open', { source: source, viewer: _this } );
5093 
5094     return _this;
5095 }
5096 
5097 
5098 
5099 
5100 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5101 // Schedulers provide the general engine for animation
5102 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5103 function scheduleUpdate( viewer, updateFunc ){
5104     return $.requestAnimationFrame( function(){
5105         updateFunc( viewer );
5106     } );
5107 }
5108 
5109 
5110 //provides a sequence in the fade animation
5111 function scheduleControlsFade( viewer ) {
5112     $.requestAnimationFrame( function(){
5113         updateControlsFade( viewer );
5114     });
5115 }
5116 
5117 
5118 //initiates an animation to hide the controls
5119 function beginControlsAutoHide( viewer ) {
5120     if ( !viewer.autoHideControls ) {
5121         return;
5122     }
5123     viewer.controlsShouldFade = true;
5124     viewer.controlsFadeBeginTime =
5125         $.now() +
5126         viewer.controlsFadeDelay;
5127 
5128     window.setTimeout( function(){
5129         scheduleControlsFade( viewer );
5130     }, viewer.controlsFadeDelay );
5131 }
5132 
5133 
5134 //determines if fade animation is done or continues the animation
5135 function updateControlsFade( viewer ) {
5136     var currentTime,
5137         deltaTime,
5138         opacity,
5139         i;
5140     if ( viewer.controlsShouldFade ) {
5141         currentTime = $.now();
5142         deltaTime = currentTime - viewer.controlsFadeBeginTime;
5143         opacity = 1.0 - deltaTime / viewer.controlsFadeLength;
5144 
5145         opacity = Math.min( 1.0, opacity );
5146         opacity = Math.max( 0.0, opacity );
5147 
5148         for ( i = viewer.controls.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
5149             if (viewer.controls[ i ].autoFade) {
5150                 viewer.controls[ i ].setOpacity( opacity );
5151             }
5152         }
5153 
5154         if ( opacity > 0 ) {
5155             // fade again
5156             scheduleControlsFade( viewer );
5157         }
5158     }
5159 }
5160 
5161 
5162 //stop the fade animation on the controls and show them
5163 function abortControlsAutoHide( viewer ) {
5164     var i;
5165     viewer.controlsShouldFade = false;
5166     for ( i = viewer.controls.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
5167         viewer.controls[ i ].setOpacity( 1.0 );
5168     }
5169 }
5170 
5171 
5172 
5173 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5174 // Default view event handlers.
5175 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5176 function onFocus(){
5177     abortControlsAutoHide( this );
5178 }
5179 
5180 function onBlur(){
5181     beginControlsAutoHide( this );
5182 
5183 }
5184 
5185 function onCanvasClick( tracker, position, quick, shift ) {
5186     var zoomPerClick,
5187         factor;
5188     if ( this.viewport && quick ) {    // ignore clicks where mouse moved
5189         zoomPerClick = this.zoomPerClick;
5190         factor = shift ? 1.0 / zoomPerClick : zoomPerClick;
5191         this.viewport.zoomBy(
5192             factor,
5193             this.viewport.pointFromPixel( position, true )
5194         );
5195         this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5196     }
5197     this.raiseEvent( 'canvas-click', {
5198         tracker: tracker,
5199         position: position,
5200         quick: quick,
5201         shift: shift
5202     });
5203 }
5204 
5205 function onCanvasDrag( tracker, position, delta, shift ) {
5206     if ( this.viewport ) {
5207         if( !this.panHorizontal ){
5208             delta.x = 0;
5209         }
5210         if( !this.panVertical ){
5211             delta.y = 0;
5212         }
5213         this.viewport.panBy(
5214             this.viewport.deltaPointsFromPixels(
5215                 delta.negate()
5216             )
5217         );
5218         if( this.constrainDuringPan ){
5219             this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5220         }
5221     }
5222     this.raiseEvent( 'canvas-drag', {
5223         tracker: tracker,
5224         position: position,
5225         delta: delta,
5226         shift: shift
5227     });
5228 }
5229 
5230 function onCanvasRelease( tracker, position, insideElementPress, insideElementRelease ) {
5231     if ( insideElementPress && this.viewport ) {
5232         this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5233     }
5234     this.raiseEvent( 'canvas-release', {
5235         tracker: tracker,
5236         position: position,
5237         insideElementPress: insideElementPress,
5238         insideElementRelease: insideElementRelease
5239     });
5240 }
5241 
5242 function onCanvasScroll( tracker, position, scroll, shift ) {
5243     var factor;
5244     if ( this.viewport ) {
5245         factor = Math.pow( this.zoomPerScroll, scroll );
5246         this.viewport.zoomBy(
5247             factor,
5248             this.viewport.pointFromPixel( position, true )
5249         );
5250         this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5251     }
5252     this.raiseEvent( 'canvas-scroll', {
5253         tracker: tracker,
5254         position: position,
5255         scroll: scroll,
5256         shift: shift
5257     });
5258     //cancels event
5259     return false;
5260 }
5261 
5262 function onContainerExit( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny ) {
5263     if ( !buttonDownElement ) {
5264         THIS[ this.hash ].mouseInside = false;
5265         if ( !THIS[ this.hash ].animating ) {
5266             beginControlsAutoHide( this );
5267         }
5268     }
5269     this.raiseEvent( 'container-exit', {
5270         tracker: tracker,
5271         position: position,
5272         buttonDownElement: buttonDownElement,
5273         buttonDownAny: buttonDownAny
5274     });
5275 }
5276 
5277 function onContainerRelease( tracker, position, insideElementPress, insideElementRelease ) {
5278     if ( !insideElementRelease ) {
5279         THIS[ this.hash ].mouseInside = false;
5280         if ( !THIS[ this.hash ].animating ) {
5281             beginControlsAutoHide( this );
5282         }
5283     }
5284     this.raiseEvent( 'container-release', {
5285         tracker: tracker,
5286         position: position,
5287         insideElementPress: insideElementPress,
5288         insideElementRelease: insideElementRelease
5289     });
5290 }
5291 
5292 function onContainerEnter( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny ) {
5293     THIS[ this.hash ].mouseInside = true;
5294     abortControlsAutoHide( this );
5295     this.raiseEvent( 'container-enter', {
5296         tracker: tracker,
5297         position: position,
5298         buttonDownElement: buttonDownElement,
5299         buttonDownAny: buttonDownAny
5300     });
5301 }
5302 
5303 
5304 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5305 // Page update routines ( aka Views - for future reference )
5306 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5307 
5308 function updateMulti( viewer ) {
5309     if ( !viewer.source ) {
5310         viewer._updateRequestId = null;
5311         return;
5312     }
5313 
5314     updateOnce( viewer );
5315 
5316     // Request the next frame, unless we've been closed during the updateOnce()
5317     if ( viewer.source ) {
5318         viewer._updateRequestId = scheduleUpdate( viewer, updateMulti );
5319     }
5320 }
5321 
5322 function updateOnce( viewer ) {
5323 
5324     var containerSize,
5325         animated;
5326 
5327     if ( !viewer.source ) {
5328         return;
5329     }
5330 
5331     //viewer.profiler.beginUpdate();
5332 
5333     containerSize = _getSafeElemSize( viewer.container );
5334     if ( !containerSize.equals( THIS[ viewer.hash ].prevContainerSize ) ) {
5335         // maintain image position
5336         viewer.viewport.resize( containerSize, true );
5337         THIS[ viewer.hash ].prevContainerSize = containerSize;
5338     }
5339 
5340     animated = viewer.viewport.update();
5341 
5342     if( viewer.referenceStrip ){
5343         animated = viewer.referenceStrip.update( viewer.viewport ) || animated;
5344     }
5345 
5346     if ( !THIS[ viewer.hash ].animating && animated ) {
5347         viewer.raiseEvent( "animationstart" );
5348         abortControlsAutoHide( viewer );
5349     }
5350 
5351     if ( animated ) {
5352         viewer.drawer.update();
5353         if( viewer.navigator ){
5354             viewer.navigator.update( viewer.viewport );
5355         }
5356         viewer.raiseEvent( "animation" );
5357     } else if ( THIS[ viewer.hash ].forceRedraw || viewer.drawer.needsUpdate() ) {
5358         viewer.drawer.update();
5359         if( viewer.navigator ){
5360             viewer.navigator.update( viewer.viewport );
5361         }
5362         THIS[ viewer.hash ].forceRedraw = false;
5363     }
5364 
5365     if ( THIS[ viewer.hash ].animating && !animated ) {
5366         viewer.raiseEvent( "animationfinish" );
5367 
5368         if ( !THIS[ viewer.hash ].mouseInside ) {
5369             beginControlsAutoHide( viewer );
5370         }
5371     }
5372 
5373     THIS[ viewer.hash ].animating = animated;
5374 
5375     //viewer.profiler.endUpdate();
5376 }
5377 
5378 
5379 
5380 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5381 // Navigation Controls
5382 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5383 function resolveUrl( prefix, url ) {
5384     return prefix ? prefix + url : url;
5385 }
5386 
5387 
5388 
5389 function beginZoomingIn() {
5390     THIS[ this.hash ].lastZoomTime = $.now();
5391     THIS[ this.hash ].zoomFactor = this.zoomPerSecond;
5392     THIS[ this.hash ].zooming = true;
5393     scheduleZoom( this );
5394 }
5395 
5396 
5397 function beginZoomingOut() {
5398     THIS[ this.hash ].lastZoomTime = $.now();
5399     THIS[ this.hash ].zoomFactor = 1.0 / this.zoomPerSecond;
5400     THIS[ this.hash ].zooming = true;
5401     scheduleZoom( this );
5402 }
5403 
5404 
5405 function endZooming() {
5406     THIS[ this.hash ].zooming = false;
5407 }
5408 
5409 
5410 function scheduleZoom( viewer ) {
5411     $.requestAnimationFrame( $.delegate( viewer, doZoom ) );
5412 }
5413 
5414 
5415 function doZoom() {
5416     var currentTime,
5417         deltaTime,
5418         adjustedFactor;
5419 
5420     if ( THIS[ this.hash ].zooming && this.viewport) {
5421         currentTime     = $.now();
5422         deltaTime       = currentTime - THIS[ this.hash ].lastZoomTime;
5423         adjustedFactor  = Math.pow( THIS[ this.hash ].zoomFactor, deltaTime / 1000 );
5424 
5425         this.viewport.zoomBy( adjustedFactor );
5426         this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5427         THIS[ this.hash ].lastZoomTime = currentTime;
5428         scheduleZoom( this );
5429     }
5430 }
5431 
5432 
5433 function doSingleZoomIn() {
5434     if ( this.viewport ) {
5435         THIS[ this.hash ].zooming = false;
5436         this.viewport.zoomBy(
5437             this.zoomPerClick / 1.0
5438         );
5439         this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5440     }
5441 }
5442 
5443 
5444 function doSingleZoomOut() {
5445     if ( this.viewport ) {
5446         THIS[ this.hash ].zooming = false;
5447         this.viewport.zoomBy(
5448             1.0 / this.zoomPerClick
5449         );
5450         this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5451     }
5452 }
5453 
5454 
5455 function lightUp() {
5456     this.buttons.emulateEnter();
5457     this.buttons.emulateExit();
5458 }
5459 
5460 
5461 function onHome() {
5462     if ( this.viewport ) {
5463         this.viewport.goHome();
5464     }
5465 }
5466 
5467 
5468 function onFullPage() {
5469     this.setFullPage( !this.isFullPage() );
5470     // correct for no mouseout event on change
5471     if( this.buttons ){
5472         this.buttons.emulateExit();
5473     }
5474     this.fullPageButton.element.focus();
5475     if ( this.viewport ) {
5476         this.viewport.applyConstraints();
5477     }
5478 }
5479 
5480 
5481 function onPrevious(){
5482     var previous = THIS[ this.hash ].sequence - 1;
5483     if(this.navPrevNextWrap && previous < 0){
5484         previous += this.tileSources.length;
5485     }
5486     this.goToPage( previous );
5487 }
5488 
5489 
5490 function onNext(){
5491     var next = THIS[ this.hash ].sequence + 1;
5492     if(this.navPrevNextWrap && next >= this.tileSources.length){
5493         next = 0;
5494     }
5495     this.goToPage( next );
5496 }
5497 
5498 
5499 }( OpenSeadragon ));
5500

5502  * OpenSeadragon - Navigator

5508  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
5509  * met:
5510  *
5511  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
5512  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
5513  *
5514  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
5515  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
5516  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
5517  *
5518  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
5519  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
5520  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
5521  *
5522  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
5523  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
5524  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
5525  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
5526  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
5527  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
5528  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
5529  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
5530  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
5531  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
5532  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
5533  */
5534 
5535 (function( $ ){
5536 
5537 /**
5538  * The Navigator provides a small view of the current image as fixed
5539  * while representing the viewport as a moving box serving as a frame
5540  * of reference in the larger viewport as to which portion of the image
5541  * is currently being examined.  The navigator's viewport can be interacted
5542  * with using the keyboard or the mouse.
5543  * @class
5544  * @name OpenSeadragon.Navigator
5545  * @extends OpenSeadragon.Viewer
5546  * @extends OpenSeadragon.EventHandler
5547  * @param {Object} options
5548  * @param {String} options.viewerId
5549  */
5550 $.Navigator = function( options ){
5551 
5552     var viewer      = options.viewer,
5553         viewerSize  = $.getElementSize( viewer.element),
5554         unneededElement;
5555 
5556     //We may need to create a new element and id if they did not
5557     //provide the id for the existing element
5558     if( !options.id ){
5559         options.id              = 'navigator-' + $.now();
5560         this.element            = $.makeNeutralElement( "div" );
5561         options.controlOptions  = {
5562             anchor:           $.ControlAnchor.TOP_RIGHT,
5563             attachToViewer:   true,
5564             autoFade:         true
5565         };
5566 
5567         if( options.position ){
5568             if( 'BOTTOM_RIGHT' == options.position ){
5569                options.controlOptions.anchor = $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_RIGHT;
5570             } else if( 'BOTTOM_LEFT' == options.position ){
5571                options.controlOptions.anchor = $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_LEFT;
5572             } else if( 'TOP_RIGHT' == options.position ){
5573                options.controlOptions.anchor = $.ControlAnchor.TOP_RIGHT;
5574             } else if( 'TOP_LEFT' == options.position ){
5575                options.controlOptions.anchor = $.ControlAnchor.TOP_LEFT;
5576             }
5577         }
5578         
5579     } else {
5580         this.element            = document.getElementById( options.id );
5581         options.controlOptions  = {
5582             anchor:           $.ControlAnchor.NONE,
5583             attachToViewer:   false,
5584             autoFade:         false
5585         };
5586     }
5587     this.element.id         = options.id;
5588     this.element.className  += ' navigator';
5589 
5590     options = $.extend( true, {
5591         sizeRatio:     $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.navigatorSizeRatio
5592     }, options, {
5593         element:                this.element,
5594         //These need to be overridden to prevent recursion since
5595         //the navigator is a viewer and a viewer has a navigator
5596         showNavigator:          false,
5597         mouseNavEnabled:        false,
5598         showNavigationControl:  false,
5599         showSequenceControl:    false,
5600         immediateRender:        true,
5601         blendTime:              0,
5602         animationTime:          0
5603     });
5604 
5605     options.minPixelRatio = this.minPixelRatio = viewer.minPixelRatio;
5606 
5607     this.viewerSizeInPoints = viewer.viewport.deltaPointsFromPixels(viewerSize);
5608     this.borderWidth = 2;
5609     //At some browser magnification levels the display regions lines up correctly, but at some there appears to
5610     //be a one pixel gap.
5611     this.fudge = new $.Point(1, 1);
5612     this.totalBorderWidths = new $.Point(this.borderWidth*2, this.borderWidth*2).minus(this.fudge);
5613 
5614 
5615     (function( style, borderWidth ){
5616         style.margin        = '0px';
5617         style.border        = borderWidth + 'px solid #555';
5618         style.padding       = '0px';
5619         style.background    = '#000';
5620         style.opacity       = 0.8;
5621         style.overflow      = 'hidden';
5622     }( this.element.style, this.borderWidth));
5623 
5624     this.displayRegion           = $.makeNeutralElement( "div" );
5625     this.displayRegion.id        = this.element.id + '-displayregion';
5626     this.displayRegion.className = 'displayregion';
5627 
5628     (function( style, borderWidth ){
5629         style.position      = 'relative';
5630         style.top           = '0px';
5631         style.left          = '0px';
5632         style.fontSize      = '0px';
5633         style.overflow      = 'hidden';
5634         style.border        = borderWidth + 'px solid #900';
5635         style.margin        = '0px';
5636         style.padding       = '0px';
5637         //TODO: IE doesnt like this property being set
5638         //try{ style.outline  = '2px auto #909'; }catch(e){/*ignore*/}
5639 
5640         style.background    = 'transparent';
5641 
5642         // We use square bracket notation on the statement below, because float is a keyword.
5643         // This is important for the Google Closure compiler, if nothing else.
5644         /*jshint sub:true */
5645         style['float']      = 'left'; //Webkit
5646 
5647         style.cssFloat      = 'left'; //Firefox
5648         style.styleFloat    = 'left'; //IE
5649         style.zIndex        = 999999999;
5650         style.cursor        = 'default';
5651     }( this.displayRegion.style, this.borderWidth ));
5652 
5653 
5654     this.element.innerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
5655         element:        this.element,
5656         dragHandler:        $.delegate( this, onCanvasDrag ),
5657         clickHandler:       $.delegate( this, onCanvasClick ),
5658         releaseHandler:     $.delegate( this, onCanvasRelease ),
5659         scrollHandler:  function(){
5660             //dont scroll the page up and down if the user is scrolling
5661             //in the navigator
5662             return false;
5663         }
5664     }).setTracking( true );
5665 
5666     /*this.displayRegion.outerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
5667         element:            this.container,
5668         clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
5669         clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
5670         enterHandler:       $.delegate( this, onContainerEnter ),
5671         exitHandler:        $.delegate( this, onContainerExit ),
5672         releaseHandler:     $.delegate( this, onContainerRelease )
5673     }).setTracking( this.mouseNavEnabled ? true : false ); // always tracking*/
5674 
5675 
5676     viewer.addControl(
5677         this.element,
5678         options.controlOptions
5679     );
5680 
5681     if( options.width && options.height ){
5682         this.element.style.width  = options.width + 'px';
5683         this.element.style.height = options.height + 'px';
5684     } else {
5685         this.element.style.width  = ( viewerSize.x * options.sizeRatio ) + 'px';
5686         this.element.style.height = ( viewerSize.y * options.sizeRatio ) + 'px';
5687     }
5688 
5689     $.Viewer.apply( this, [ options ] );
5690 
5691     this.element.getElementsByTagName('form')[0].appendChild( this.displayRegion );
5692     unneededElement = this.element.getElementsByTagName('textarea')[0];
5693     if (unneededElement) {
5694         unneededElement.parentNode.removeChild(unneededElement);
5695     }
5696 
5697 };
5698 
5699 $.extend( $.Navigator.prototype, $.EventHandler.prototype, $.Viewer.prototype, {
5700 
5701     /**
5702      * @function
5703      * @name OpenSeadragon.Navigator.prototype.update
5704      */
5705     update: function( viewport ){
5706 
5707         var bounds,
5708             topleft,
5709             bottomright;
5710 
5711         if( viewport && this.viewport ){
5712             bounds      = viewport.getBounds( true );
5713             topleft     = this.viewport.pixelFromPoint( bounds.getTopLeft());
5714             bottomright = this.viewport.pixelFromPoint( bounds.getBottomRight()).minus(this.totalBorderWidths);
5715 
5716             //update style for navigator-box
5717             (function(style) {
5718 
5719                 style.top    = topleft.y + 'px';
5720                 style.left   = topleft.x + 'px';
5721 
5722                 var width = Math.abs( topleft.x - bottomright.x );
5723                 var height = Math.abs( topleft.y - bottomright.y );
5724                 // make sure width and height are non-negative so IE doesn't throw
5725                 style.width  = Math.max( width, 0 ) + 'px';
5726                 style.height = Math.max( height, 0 ) + 'px';
5727 
5728             }( this.displayRegion.style ));
5729         }
5730 
5731     },
5732 
5733     open: function( source ){
5734         var containerSize = this.viewer.viewport.containerSize.times( this.sizeRatio );
5735         if( source.tileSize > containerSize.x ||
5736             source.tileSize > containerSize.y ){
5737             this.minPixelRatio = Math.min(
5738                 containerSize.x,
5739                 containerSize.y
5740             ) / source.tileSize;
5741         } else {
5742             this.minPixelRatio = this.viewer.minPixelRatio;
5743         }
5744         return $.Viewer.prototype.open.apply( this, [ source ] );
5745     }
5746 
5747 });
5748 
5749 /**
5750  * @private
5751  * @inner
5752  * @function
5753  */
5754 function onCanvasClick( tracker, position, quick, shift ) {
5755     var newBounds,
5756         viewerPosition,
5757         dimensions;
5758     if (! this.drag) {
5759         if ( this.viewer.viewport ) {
5760             viewerPosition = this.viewport.deltaPointsFromPixels(position);
5761             dimensions = this.viewer.viewport.getBounds().getSize();
5762             newBounds = new $.Rect(
5763                 viewerPosition.x - dimensions.x/2,
5764                 viewerPosition.y - dimensions.y/2,
5765                 dimensions.x,
5766                 dimensions.y
5767             );
5768             if (this.viewer.source.aspectRatio > this.viewer.viewport.getAspectRatio()) {
5769                 newBounds.y = newBounds.y -  ((this.viewerSizeInPoints.y - (1/this.viewer.source.aspectRatio)) /2 );
5770             }
5771             else  {
5772                 newBounds.x = newBounds.x -  ((this.viewerSizeInPoints.x -1) /2 );
5773             }
5774             this.viewer.viewport.fitBounds(newBounds);
5775             this.viewer.viewport.applyConstraints();
5776         }
5777     }
5778     else {
5779         this.drag = false;
5780     }
5781 }
5782 
5783 /**
5784  * @private
5785  * @inner
5786  * @function
5787  */
5788 function onCanvasDrag( tracker, position, delta, shift ) {
5789     if ( this.viewer.viewport ) {
5790         this.drag = true;
5791         if( !this.panHorizontal ){
5792             delta.x = 0;
5793         }
5794         if( !this.panVertical ){
5795             delta.y = 0;
5796         }
5797         this.viewer.viewport.panBy(
5798             this.viewport.deltaPointsFromPixels(
5799                 delta
5800             )
5801         );
5802     }
5803 }
5804 
5805 
5806 /**
5807  * @private
5808  * @inner
5809  * @function
5810  */
5811 function onCanvasRelease( tracker, position, insideElementPress, insideElementRelease ) {
5812     if ( insideElementPress && this.viewer.viewport ) {
5813         this.viewer.viewport.applyConstraints();
5814     }
5815 }
5816 
5817 
5818 /**
5819  * @private
5820  * @inner
5821  * @function
5822  */
5823 function onCanvasScroll( tracker, position, scroll, shift ) {
5824     var factor;
5825     if ( this.viewer.viewport ) {
5826         factor = Math.pow( this.zoomPerScroll, scroll );
5827         this.viewer.viewport.zoomBy(
5828             factor,
5829             this.viewport.getCenter()
5830         );
5831         this.viewer.viewport.applyConstraints();
5832     }
5833     //cancels event
5834     return false;
5835 }
5836 
5837 
5838 }( OpenSeadragon ));
5839 
5840 /*
5841  * OpenSeadragon - getString/setString
5842  *
5843  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
5844  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
5845  *
5846  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
5847  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
5848  * met:
5849  *
5850  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
5851  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
5852  *
5853  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
5854  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
5855  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
5856  *
5857  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
5858  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
5859  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
5860  *
5861  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
5862  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
5863  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
5864  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
5865  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
5866  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
5867  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
5868  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
5869  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
5870  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
5871  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
