5873 
5874 (function( $ ){
5875 
5876 //TODO: I guess this is where the i18n needs to be reimplemented.  I'll look
5877 //      into existing patterns for i18n in javascript but i think that mimicking
5878 //      pythons gettext might be a reasonable approach.
5879 var I18N = {
5880     Errors: {
5881         Dzc:            "Sorry, we don't support Deep Zoom Collections!",
5882         Dzi:            "Hmm, this doesn't appear to be a valid Deep Zoom Image.",
5883         Xml:            "Hmm, this doesn't appear to be a valid Deep Zoom Image.",
5884         ImageFormat:    "Sorry, we don't support {0}-based Deep Zoom Images.",
5885         Security:       "It looks like a security restriction stopped us from " +
5886                         "loading this Deep Zoom Image.",
5887         Status:         "This space unintentionally left blank ({0} {1}).",
5888         "Open-Failed":  "Unable to open {0}: {1}"
5889     },
5890 
5891     Tooltips: {
5892         FullPage:       "Toggle full page",
5893         Home:           "Go home",
5894         ZoomIn:         "Zoom in",
5895         ZoomOut:        "Zoom out",
5896         NextPage:       "Next page",
5897         PreviousPage:   "Previous page"
5898     }
5899 };
5900 
5901 $.extend( $, {
5902 
5903     /**
5904      * @function
5905      * @name OpenSeadragon.getString
5906      * @param {String} property
5907      */
5908     getString: function( prop ) {
5909 
5910         var props   = prop.split('.'),
5911             string  = null,
5912             args    = arguments,
5913             container = I18N,
5914             i;
5915 
5916         for ( i = 0; i < props.length-1; i++ ) {
5917             // in case not a subproperty
5918             container = container[ props[ i ] ] || {};
5919         }
5920         string = container[ props[ i ] ];
5921 
5922         if ( typeof( string ) != "string" ) {
5923             $.console.debug( "Untranslated source string:", prop );
5924             string = ""; // FIXME: this breaks gettext()-style convention, which would return source
5925         }
5926 
5927         return string.replace(/\{\d+\}/g, function(capture) {
5928             var i = parseInt( capture.match( /\d+/ ), 10 ) + 1;
5929             return i < args.length ?
5930                 args[ i ] :
5931                 "";
5932         });
5933     },
5934 
5935     /**
5936      * @function
5937      * @name OpenSeadragon.setString
5938      * @param {String} property
5939      * @param {*} value
5940      */
5941     setString: function( prop, value ) {
5942 
5943         var props     = prop.split('.'),
5944             container = I18N,
5945             i;
5946 
5947         for ( i = 0; i < props.length - 1; i++ ) {
5948             if ( !container[ props[ i ] ] ) {
5949                 container[ props[ i ] ] = {};
5950             }
5951             container = container[ props[ i ] ];
5952         }
5953 
5954         container[ props[ i ] ] = value;
5955     }
5956 
5957 });
5958 
5959 }( OpenSeadragon ));
5960 
5961 /*
5962  * OpenSeadragon - Point
5963  *
5964  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
5965  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
5966  *
5967  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
5968  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
5969  * met:
5970  *
5971  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
5972  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
5973  *
5974  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
5975  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
5976  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
5977  *
5978  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
5979  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
5980  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
5981  *
5982  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
5983  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
5984  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
5985  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
5986  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
5987  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
5988  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
5989  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
5990  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
5991  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
5992  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
5993  */
5994 
5995 (function( $ ){
5996 
5997 /**
5998  * A Point is really used as a 2-dimensional vector, equally useful for
5999  * representing a point on a plane, or the height and width of a plane
6000  * not requiring any other frame of reference.
6001  * @class
6002  * @param {Number} [x] The vector component 'x'. Defaults to the origin at 0.
6003  * @param {Number} [y] The vector component 'y'. Defaults to the origin at 0.
6004  * @property {Number} [x] The vector component 'x'.
6005  * @property {Number} [y] The vector component 'y'.
6006  */
6007 $.Point = function( x, y ) {
6008     this.x = typeof ( x ) == "number" ? x : 0;
6009     this.y = typeof ( y ) == "number" ? y : 0;
6010 };
6011 
6012 $.Point.prototype = {
6013 
6014     /**
6015      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6016      * @function
6017      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6018      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6019      *  vector components
6020      */
6021     plus: function( point ) {
6022         return new $.Point(
6023             this.x + point.x,
6024             this.y + point.y
6025         );
6026     },
6027 
6028     /**
6029      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6030      * @function
6031      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6032      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6033      *  vector components
6034      */
6035     minus: function( point ) {
6036         return new $.Point(
6037             this.x - point.x,
6038             this.y - point.y
6039         );
6040     },
6041 
6042     /**
6043      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6044      * @function
6045      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6046      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6047      *  vector components
6048      */
6049     times: function( factor ) {
6050         return new $.Point(
6051             this.x * factor,
6052             this.y * factor
6053         );
6054     },
6055 
6056     /**
6057      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6058      * @function
6059      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6060      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6061      *  vector components
6062      */
6063     divide: function( factor ) {
6064         return new $.Point(
6065             this.x / factor,
6066             this.y / factor
6067         );
6068     },
6069 
6070     /**
6071      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6072      * @function
6073      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6074      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6075      *  vector components
6076      */
6077     negate: function() {
6078         return new $.Point( -this.x, -this.y );
6079     },
6080 
6081     /**
6082      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6083      * @function
6084      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6085      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6086      *  vector components
6087      */
6088     distanceTo: function( point ) {
6089         return Math.sqrt(
6090             Math.pow( this.x - point.x, 2 ) +
6091             Math.pow( this.y - point.y, 2 )
6092         );
6093     },
6094 
6095     /**
6096      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6097      * @function
6098      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6099      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6100      *  vector components
6101      */
6102     apply: function( func ) {
6103         return new $.Point( func( this.x ), func( this.y ) );
6104     },
6105 
6106     /**
6107      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6108      * @function
6109      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6110      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6111      *  vector components
6112      */
6113     equals: function( point ) {
6114         return (
6115             point instanceof $.Point
6116         ) && (
6117             this.x === point.x
6118         ) && (
6119             this.y === point.y
6120         );
6121     },
6122 
6123     /**
6124      * Rotates the point around the specified pivot
6125      * From http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4465931/rotate-rectangle-around-a-point
6126      * @function
6127      * @param {Number} degress to rotate around the pivot.
6128      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} pivot Point about which to rotate.
6129      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point}. A new point representing the point rotated around the specified pivot
6130      */
6131     rotate: function ( degrees, pivot ) {
6132         var angle = degrees * Math.PI / 180.0,
6133             x = Math.cos( angle ) * ( this.x - pivot.x ) - Math.sin( angle ) * ( this.y - pivot.y ) + pivot.x,
6134             y = Math.sin( angle ) * ( this.x - pivot.x ) + Math.cos( angle ) * ( this.y - pivot.y ) + pivot.y;
6135         return new $.Point( x, y );
6136     },
6137 
6138     /**
6139      * Add another Point to this point and return a new Point.
6140      * @function
6141      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point The point to add vector components.
6142      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} A new point representing the sum of the
6143      *  vector components
6144      */
6145     toString: function() {
6146         return "(" + Math.round(this.x) + "," + Math.round(this.y) + ")";
6147     }
6148 };
6149 
6150 }( OpenSeadragon ));
6151 
6152 /*
6153  * OpenSeadragon - TileSource
6154  *
6155  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
6156  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
6157  *
6158  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
6159  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
6160  * met:
6161  *
6162  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
6163  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
6164  *
6165  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
6166  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
6167  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
6168  *
6169  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
6170  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
6171  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
6172  *
6173  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
6174  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
6175  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
6176  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
6177  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
6178  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
6179  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
6180  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
6181  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
6182  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
6183  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
6184  */
6185 
6186 (function( $ ){
6187 
6188 
6189 /**
6190  * The TileSource contains the most basic implementation required to create a
6191  * smooth transition between layer in an image pyramid. It has only a single key
6192  * interface that must be implemented to complete it key functionality:
6193  * 'getTileUrl'.  It also has several optional interfaces that can be
6194  * implemented if a new TileSource wishes to support configuration via a simple
6195  * object or array ('configure') and if the tile source supports or requires
6196  * configuration via retreival of a document on the network ala AJAX or JSONP,
6197  * ('getImageInfo').
6198  * <br/>
6199  * By default the image pyramid is split into N layers where the images longest
6200  * side in M (in pixels), where N is the smallest integer which satisfies
6201  *      <strong>2^(N+1) >= M</strong>.
6202  * @class
6203  * @extends OpenSeadragon.EventHandler
6204  * @param {Number|Object|Array|String} width
6205  *      If more than a single argument is supplied, the traditional use of
6206  *      positional parameters is supplied and width is expected to be the width
6207  *      source image at it's max resolution in pixels.  If a single argument is supplied and
6208  *      it is an Object or Array, the construction is assumed to occur through
6209  *      the extending classes implementation of 'configure'.  Finally if only a
6210  *      single argument is supplied and it is a String, the extending class is
6211  *      expected to implement 'getImageInfo' and 'configure'.
6212  * @param {Number} height
6213  *      Width of the source image at max resolution in pixels.
6214  * @param {Number} tileSize
6215  *      The size of the tiles to assumed to make up each pyramid layer in pixels.
6216  *      Tile size determines the point at which the image pyramid must be
6217  *      divided into a matrix of smaller images.
6218  * @param {Number} tileOverlap
6219  *      The number of pixels each tile is expected to overlap touching tiles.
6220  * @param {Number} minLevel
6221  *      The minimum level to attempt to load.
6222  * @param {Number} maxLevel
6223  *      The maximum level to attempt to load.
6224  * @property {Number} aspectRatio
6225  *      Ratio of width to height
6226  * @property {OpenSeadragon.Point} dimensions
6227  *      Vector storing x and y dimensions ( width and height respectively ).
6228  * @property {Number} tileSize
6229  *      The size of the image tiles used to compose the image.
6230  * @property {Number} tileOverlap
6231  *      The overlap in pixels each tile shares with it's adjacent neighbors.
6232  * @property {Number} minLevel
6233  *      The minimum pyramid level this tile source supports or should attempt to load.
6234  * @property {Number} maxLevel
6235  *      The maximum pyramid level this tile source supports or should attempt to load.
6236  */
6237 $.TileSource = function( width, height, tileSize, tileOverlap, minLevel, maxLevel ) {
6238     var callback = null,
6239         args = arguments,
6240         options,
6241         i;
6242 
6243     if( $.isPlainObject( width ) ){
6244         options = width;
6245     }else{
6246         options = {
6247             width: args[0],
6248             height: args[1],
6249             tileSize: args[2],
6250             tileOverlap: args[3],
6251             minLevel: args[4],
6252             maxLevel: args[5]
6253         };
6254     }
6255 
6256     //Tile sources supply some events, namely 'ready' when they must be configured
6257     //by asyncronously fetching their configuration data.
6258     $.EventHandler.call( this );
6259 
6260     //we allow options to override anything we dont treat as
6261     //required via idiomatic options or which is functionally
6262     //set depending on the state of the readiness of this tile
6263     //source
6264     $.extend( true, this, options );
6265 
6266     //Any functions that are passed as arguments are bound to the ready callback
6267     /*jshint loopfunc:true*/
6268     for ( i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
6269         if ( $.isFunction( arguments[ i ] ) ) {
6270             callback = arguments[ i ];
6271             // TODO Send generic object wrapping readySource as a property (breaking change)
6272             // TODO Maybe placeHolderSource should be passed to callback as well for consistency
6273             //      with event handler signature?
6274             //  Should be this (although technically it works as-is):
6275             //this.addHandler( 'ready', function ( placeHolderSource, placeHolderArgs ) {
6276             //    callback( placeHolderArgs );
6277             //} );
6278             this.addHandler( 'ready', function ( placeHolderSource, readySource ) {
6279                 callback( readySource );
6280             } );
6281             //only one callback per constructor
6282             break;
6283         }
6284     }
6285 
6286     if( 'string' == $.type( arguments[ 0 ] ) ){
6287         //in case the getImageInfo method is overriden and/or implies an
6288         //async mechanism set some safe defaults first
6289         this.aspectRatio = 1;
6290         this.dimensions  = new $.Point( 10, 10 );
6291         this.tileSize    = 0;
6292         this.tileOverlap = 0;
6293         this.minLevel    = 0;
6294         this.maxLevel    = 0;
6295         this.ready       = false;
6296         //configuration via url implies the extending class
6297         //implements and 'configure'
6298         this.getImageInfo( arguments[ 0 ] );
6299 
6300     } else {
6301 
6302         //explicit configuration via positional args in constructor
6303         //or the more idiomatic 'options' object
6304         this.ready       = true;
6305         this.aspectRatio = ( options.width && options.height ) ?
6306             (  options.width / options.height ) : 1;
6307         this.dimensions  = new $.Point( options.width, options.height );
6308         this.tileSize    = options.tileSize ? options.tileSize : 0;
6309         this.tileOverlap = options.tileOverlap ? options.tileOverlap : 0;
6310         this.minLevel    = options.minLevel ? options.minLevel : 0;
6311         this.maxLevel    = ( undefined !== options.maxLevel && null !== options.maxLevel ) ?
6312             options.maxLevel : (
6313                 ( options.width && options.height ) ? Math.ceil(
6314                     Math.log( Math.max( options.width, options.height ) ) /
6315                     Math.log( 2 )
6316                 ) : 0
6317             );
6318         if( callback && $.isFunction( callback ) ){
6319             callback( this );
6320         }
6321     }
6322 
6323 
6324 };
6325 
6326 
6327 $.TileSource.prototype = {
6328 
6329     /**
6330      * @function
6331      * @param {Number} level
6332      */
6333     getLevelScale: function( level ) {
6334 
6335         // see https://github.com/openseadragon/openseadragon/issues/22
6336         // we use the tilesources implementation of getLevelScale to generate
6337         // a memoized re-implementation
6338         var levelScaleCache = {},
6339             i;
6340         for( i = 0; i <= this.maxLevel; i++ ){
6341             levelScaleCache[ i ] = 1 / Math.pow(2, this.maxLevel - i);
6342         }
6343         this.getLevelScale = function( _level ){
6344             return levelScaleCache[ _level ];
6345         };
6346         return this.getLevelScale( level );
6347     },
6348 
6349     /**
6350      * @function
6351      * @param {Number} level
6352      */
6353     getNumTiles: function( level ) {
6354         var scale = this.getLevelScale( level ),
6355             x = Math.ceil( scale * this.dimensions.x / this.tileSize ),
6356             y = Math.ceil( scale * this.dimensions.y / this.tileSize );
6357 
6358         return new $.Point( x, y );
6359     },
6360 
6361     /**
6362      * @function
6363      * @param {Number} level
6364      */
6365     getPixelRatio: function( level ) {
6366         var imageSizeScaled = this.dimensions.times( this.getLevelScale( level ) ),
6367             rx = 1.0 / imageSizeScaled.x,
6368             ry = 1.0 / imageSizeScaled.y;
6369 
6370         return new $.Point(rx, ry);
6371     },
6372 
6373 
6374     /**
6375      * @function
6376      * @param {Number} level
6377      */
6378     getClosestLevel: function( rect ) {
6379         var i,
6380             tilesPerSide = Math.floor( Math.max( rect.x, rect.y ) / this.tileSize ),
6381             tiles;
6382         for( i = this.minLevel; i < this.maxLevel; i++ ){
6383             tiles = this.getNumTiles( i );
6384             if( Math.max( tiles.x, tiles.y ) + 1 >= tilesPerSide ){
6385                 break;
6386             }
6387         }
6388         return Math.max( 0, i - 1 );
6389     },
6390 
6391     /**
6392      * @function
6393      * @param {Number} level
6394      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point
6395      */
6396     getTileAtPoint: function( level, point ) {
6397         var pixel = point.times( this.dimensions.x ).times( this.getLevelScale(level ) ),
6398             tx = Math.floor( pixel.x / this.tileSize ),
6399             ty = Math.floor( pixel.y / this.tileSize );
6400 
6401         return new $.Point( tx, ty );
6402     },
6403 
6404     /**
6405      * @function
6406      * @param {Number} level
6407      * @param {Number} x
6408      * @param {Number} y
6409      */
6410     getTileBounds: function( level, x, y ) {
6411         var dimensionsScaled = this.dimensions.times( this.getLevelScale( level ) ),
6412             px = ( x === 0 ) ? 0 : this.tileSize * x - this.tileOverlap,
6413             py = ( y === 0 ) ? 0 : this.tileSize * y - this.tileOverlap,
6414             sx = this.tileSize + ( x === 0 ? 1 : 2 ) * this.tileOverlap,
6415             sy = this.tileSize + ( y === 0 ? 1 : 2 ) * this.tileOverlap,
6416             scale = 1.0 / dimensionsScaled.x;
6417 
6418         sx = Math.min( sx, dimensionsScaled.x - px );
6419         sy = Math.min( sy, dimensionsScaled.y - py );
6420 
6421         return new $.Rect( px * scale, py * scale, sx * scale, sy * scale );
6422     },
6423 
6424 
6425     /**
6426      * Responsible for retrieving, and caching the
6427      * image metadata pertinent to this TileSources implementation.
6428      * @function
6429      * @param {String} url
6430      * @throws {Error}
6431      */
6432     getImageInfo: function( url ) {
6433         var _this = this,
6434             callbackName,
6435             callback,
6436             readySource,
6437             options,
6438             urlParts,
6439             filename,
6440             lastDot;
6441 
6442 
6443         if( url ) {
6444             urlParts = url.split( '/' );
6445             filename = urlParts[ urlParts.length - 1 ];
6446             lastDot  = filename.lastIndexOf( '.' );
6447             if ( lastDot > -1 ) {
6448                 urlParts[ urlParts.length - 1 ] = filename.slice( 0, lastDot );
6449             }
6450         }
6451 
6452         callback = function( data ){
6453             var $TileSource = $.TileSource.determineType( _this, data, url );
6454             if ( !$TileSource ) {
6455                 _this.raiseEvent( 'open-failed', { message: "Unable to load TileSource", source: url } );
6456                 return;
6457             }
6458 
6459             options = $TileSource.prototype.configure.apply( _this, [ data, url ]);
6460             readySource = new $TileSource( options );
6461             _this.ready = true;
6462             // TODO Send generic object wrapping readySource as a property (breaking change)
6463             //  Should be this:
6464             //_this.raiseEvent( 'ready', { tileSource: readySource } );
6465             _this.raiseEvent( 'ready', readySource );
6466         };
6467 
6468         if( url.match(/\.js$/) ){
6469             //TODO: Its not very flexible to require tile sources to end jsonp
6470             //      request for info  with a url that ends with '.js' but for
6471             //      now it's the only way I see to distinguish uniformly.
6472             callbackName = url.split( '/' ).pop().replace('.js','');
6473             $.jsonp({
6474                 url: url,
6475                 async: false,
6476                 callbackName: callbackName,
6477                 callback: callback
6478             });
6479         } else {
6480             // request info via xhr asyncronously.
6481             $.makeAjaxRequest( url, function( xhr ) {
6482                 var data = processResponse( xhr );
6483                 callback( data );
6484             }, function ( xhr, exc ) {
6485                 var msg;
6486 
6487                 /*
6488                     IE < 10 will block XHR requests to different origins. Any property access on the request
6489                     object will raise an exception which we'll attempt to handle by formatting the original
6490                     exception rather than the second one raised when we try to access xhr.status
6491                  */
6492                 try {
6493                     msg = "HTTP " + xhr.status + " attempting to load TileSource";
6494                 } catch ( e ) {
6495                     var formattedExc;
6496                     if ( typeof( exc ) == "undefined" || !exc.toString ) {
6497                         formattedExc = "Unknown error";
6498                     } else {
6499                         formattedExc = exc.toString();
6500                     }
6501 
6502                     msg = formattedExc + " attempting to load TileSource";
6503                 }
6504 
6505                 _this.raiseEvent( 'open-failed', {
6506                     message: msg,
6507                     source: url
6508                 });
6509             });
6510         }
6511 
6512     },
6513 
6514     /**
6515      * Responsible determining if a the particular TileSource supports the
6516      * data format ( and allowed to apply logic against the url the data was
6517      * loaded from, if any ). Overriding implementations are expected to do
6518      * something smart with data and / or url to determine support.  Also
6519      * understand that iteration order of TileSources is not guarunteed so
6520      * please make sure your data or url is expressive enough to ensure a simple
6521      * and sufficient mechanisim for clear determination.
6522      * @function
6523      * @param {String|Object|Array|Document} data
6524      * @param {String} url - the url the data was loaded
6525      *      from if any.
6526      * @return {Boolean}
6527      */
6528     supports: function( data, url ) {
6529         return false;
6530     },
6531 
6532     /**
6533      * Responsible for parsing and configuring the
6534      * image metadata pertinent to this TileSources implementation.
6535      * This method is not implemented by this class other than to throw an Error
6536      * announcing you have to implement it.  Because of the variety of tile
6537      * server technologies, and various specifications for building image
6538      * pyramids, this method is here to allow easy integration.
6539      * @function
6540      * @param {String|Object|Array|Document} data
6541      * @param {String} url - the url the data was loaded
6542      *      from if any.
6543      * @return {Object} options - A dictionary of keyword arguments sufficient
6544      *      to configure this tile sources constructor.
6545      * @throws {Error}
6546      */
6547     configure: function( data, url ) {
6548         throw new Error( "Method not implemented." );
6549     },
6550 
6551     /**
6552      * Responsible for retriving the url which will return an image for the
6553      * region speified by the given x, y, and level components.
6554      * This method is not implemented by this class other than to throw an Error
6555      * announcing you have to implement it.  Because of the variety of tile
6556      * server technologies, and various specifications for building image
6557      * pyramids, this method is here to allow easy integration.
6558      * @function
6559      * @param {Number} level
6560      * @param {Number} x
6561      * @param {Number} y
6562      * @throws {Error}
6563      */
6564     getTileUrl: function( level, x, y ) {
6565         throw new Error( "Method not implemented." );
6566     },
6567 
6568     /**
6569      * @function
6570      * @param {Number} level
6571      * @param {Number} x
6572      * @param {Number} y
6573      */
6574     tileExists: function( level, x, y ) {
6575         var numTiles = this.getNumTiles( level );
6576         return  level >= this.minLevel &&
6577                 level <= this.maxLevel &&
6578                 x >= 0 &&
6579                 y >= 0 &&
6580                 x < numTiles.x &&
6581                 y < numTiles.y;
6582     }
6583 };
6584 
6585 
6586 $.extend( true, $.TileSource.prototype, $.EventHandler.prototype );
6587 
6588 
6589 /**
6590  * Decides whether to try to process the response as xml, json, or hand back
6591  * the text
6592  * @eprivate
6593  * @inner
6594  * @function
6595  * @param {XMLHttpRequest} xhr - the completed network request
6596  */
6597 function processResponse( xhr ){
6598     var responseText = xhr.responseText,
6599         status       = xhr.status,
6600         statusText,
6601         data;
6602 
6603     if ( !xhr ) {
6604         throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.Security" ) );
6605     } else if ( xhr.status !== 200 && xhr.status !== 0 ) {
6606         status     = xhr.status;
6607         statusText = ( status == 404 ) ?
6608             "Not Found" :
6609             xhr.statusText;
6610         throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.Status", status, statusText ) );
6611     }
6612 
6613     if( responseText.match(/\s*<.*/) ){
6614         try{
6615         data = ( xhr.responseXML && xhr.responseXML.documentElement ) ?
6616             xhr.responseXML :
6617             $.parseXml( responseText );
6618         } catch (e){
6619             data = xhr.responseText;
6620         }
6621     }else if( responseText.match(/\s*[\{\[].*/) ){
6622         /*jshint evil:true*/
6623         data = eval( '('+responseText+')' );
6624     }else{
6625         data = responseText;
6626     }
6627     return data;
6628 }
6629 
6630 
6631 /**
6632  * Determines the TileSource Implementation by introspection of OpenSeadragon
6633  * namespace, calling each TileSource implementation of 'isType'
6634  * @eprivate
6635  * @inner
6636  * @function
6637  * @param {Object|Array|Document} data - the tile source configuration object
6638  * @param {String} url - the url where the tile source configuration object was
6639  *      loaded from, if any.
6640  */
6641 $.TileSource.determineType = function( tileSource, data, url ){
6642     var property;
6643     for( property in OpenSeadragon ){
6644         if( property.match(/.+TileSource$/) &&
6645             $.isFunction( OpenSeadragon[ property ] ) &&
6646             $.isFunction( OpenSeadragon[ property ].prototype.supports ) &&
6647             OpenSeadragon[ property ].prototype.supports.call( tileSource, data, url )
6648         ){
6649             return OpenSeadragon[ property ];
6650         }
6651     }
6652 
6653     $.console.error( "No TileSource was able to open %s %s", url, data );
6654 };
6655 
6656 
6657 }( OpenSeadragon ));
6658

6666  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
6667  * met:

6669  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
6670  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
6671  *
6672  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
6673  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
6674  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
6675  *
6676  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
6677  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
6678  *   this software without specific prior written permission.

6681  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
6682  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
6683  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
6684  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
6685  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
6686  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
6687  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
6688  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
6689  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
6690  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

6692 
6693 (function( $ ){
6694 
6695 /**
6696  * @class
6697  * @extends OpenSeadragon.TileSource
6698  * @param {Number|Object} width - the pixel width of the image or the idiomatic
6699  *      options object which is used instead of positional arguments.
6700  * @param {Number} height
6701  * @param {Number} tileSize
6702  * @param {Number} tileOverlap
6703  * @param {String} tilesUrl
6704  * @param {String} fileFormat
6705  * @param {OpenSeadragon.DisplayRect[]} displayRects
6706  * @property {String} tilesUrl
6707  * @property {String} fileFormat
6708  * @property {OpenSeadragon.DisplayRect[]} displayRects
6709  */
6710 $.DziTileSource = function( width, height, tileSize, tileOverlap, tilesUrl, fileFormat, displayRects, minLevel, maxLevel ) {
6711     var i,
6712         rect,
6713         level,
6714         options;
6715 
6716     if( $.isPlainObject( width ) ){
6717         options = width;
6718     }else{
6719         options = {
6720             width: arguments[ 0 ],
6721             height: arguments[ 1 ],
6722             tileSize: arguments[ 2 ],
6723             tileOverlap: arguments[ 3 ],
6724             tilesUrl: arguments[ 4 ],
6725             fileFormat: arguments[ 5 ],
6726             displayRects: arguments[ 6 ],
6727             minLevel: arguments[ 7 ],
6728             maxLevel: arguments[ 8 ]
6729         };
6730     }
6731 
6732     this._levelRects  = {};
6733     this.tilesUrl     = options.tilesUrl;
6734     this.fileFormat   = options.fileFormat;
6735     this.displayRects = options.displayRects;
6736 
6737     if ( this.displayRects ) {
6738         for ( i = this.displayRects.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
6739             rect = this.displayRects[ i ];
6740             for ( level = rect.minLevel; level <= rect.maxLevel; level++ ) {
6741                 if ( !this._levelRects[ level ] ) {
6742                     this._levelRects[ level ] = [];
6743                 }
6744                 this._levelRects[ level ].push( rect );
6745             }
6746         }
6747     }
6748 
6749     $.TileSource.apply( this, [ options ] );
6750 
6751 };
6752 
6753 $.extend( $.DziTileSource.prototype, $.TileSource.prototype, {
6754 
6755 
6756     /**
6757      * Determine if the data and/or url imply the image service is supported by
6758      * this tile source.
6759      * @function
6760      * @name OpenSeadragon.DziTileSource.prototype.supports
6761      * @param {Object|Array} data
6762      * @param {String} optional - url
6763      */
6764     supports: function( data, url ){
6765         var ns;
6766         if ( data.Image ) {
6767             ns = data.Image.xmlns;
6768         } else if ( data.documentElement && "Image" == data.documentElement.tagName ) {
6769             ns = data.documentElement.namespaceURI;
6770         }
6771 
6772         return ( "http://schemas.microsoft.com/deepzoom/2008" == ns ||
6773             "http://schemas.microsoft.com/deepzoom/2009" == ns );
6774     },
6775 
6776     /**
6777      *
6778      * @function
6779      * @name OpenSeadragon.DziTileSource.prototype.configure
6780      * @param {Object|XMLDocument} data - the raw configuration
6781      * @param {String} url - the url the data was retreived from if any.
6782      * @return {Object} options - A dictionary of keyword arguments sufficient
6783      *      to configure this tile sources constructor.
6784      */
6785     configure: function( data, url ){
6786 
6787         var options;
6788 
6789         if( !$.isPlainObject(data) ){
6790 
6791             options = configureFromXML( this, data );
6792 
6793         }else{
6794 
6795             options = configureFromObject( this, data );
6796         }
6797 
6798         if (url && !options.tilesUrl) {
6799             options.tilesUrl = url.replace(/([^\/]+)\.(dzi|xml|js)$/, '$1_files/');
6800         }
6801 
6802         return options;
6803     },
6804 
6805 
6806     /**
6807      * @function
6808      * @name OpenSeadragon.DziTileSource.prototype.getTileUrl
6809      * @param {Number} level
6810      * @param {Number} x
6811      * @param {Number} y
6812      */
6813     getTileUrl: function( level, x, y ) {
6814         return [ this.tilesUrl, level, '/', x, '_', y, '.', this.fileFormat ].join( '' );
6815     },
6816 
6817 
6818     /**
6819      * @function
6820      * @name OpenSeadragon.DziTileSource.prototype.tileExists
6821      * @param {Number} level
6822      * @param {Number} x
6823      * @param {Number} y
6824      */
6825     tileExists: function( level, x, y ) {
6826         var rects = this._levelRects[ level ],
6827             rect,
6828             scale,
6829             xMin,
6830             yMin,
6831             xMax,
6832             yMax,
6833             i;
6834 
6835         if ( !rects || !rects.length ) {
6836             return true;
6837         }
6838 
6839         for ( i = rects.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
6840             rect = rects[ i ];
6841 
6842             if ( level < rect.minLevel || level > rect.maxLevel ) {
6843                 continue;
6844             }
6845 
6846             scale = this.getLevelScale( level );
6847             xMin = rect.x * scale;
6848             yMin = rect.y * scale;
6849             xMax = xMin + rect.width * scale;
6850             yMax = yMin + rect.height * scale;
6851 
6852             xMin = Math.floor( xMin / this.tileSize );
6853             yMin = Math.floor( yMin / this.tileSize );
6854             xMax = Math.ceil( xMax / this.tileSize );
6855             yMax = Math.ceil( yMax / this.tileSize );
6856 
6857             if ( xMin <= x && x < xMax && yMin <= y && y < yMax ) {
6858                 return true;
6859             }
6860         }
6861 
6862         return false;
6863     }
6864 });
6865 
6866 
6867 /**
6868  * @private
6869  * @inner
6870  * @function
6871  */
6872 function configureFromXML( tileSource, xmlDoc ){
6873 
6874     if ( !xmlDoc || !xmlDoc.documentElement ) {
6875         throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.Xml" ) );
6876     }
6877 
6878     var root           = xmlDoc.documentElement,
6879         rootName       = root.tagName,
6880         configuration  = null,
6881         displayRects   = [],
6882         dispRectNodes,
6883         dispRectNode,
6884         rectNode,
6885         sizeNode,
6886         i;
6887 
6888     if ( rootName == "Image" ) {
6889 
6890         try {
6891             sizeNode = root.getElementsByTagName( "Size" )[ 0 ];
6892             configuration = {
6893                 Image: {
6894                     xmlns:       "http://schemas.microsoft.com/deepzoom/2008",
6895                     Url:         root.getAttribute( "Url" ),
6896                     Format:      root.getAttribute( "Format" ),
6897                     DisplayRect: null,
6898                     Overlap:     parseInt( root.getAttribute( "Overlap" ), 10 ),
6899                     TileSize:    parseInt( root.getAttribute( "TileSize" ), 10 ),
6900                     Size: {
6901                         Height: parseInt( sizeNode.getAttribute( "Height" ), 10 ),
6902                         Width:  parseInt( sizeNode.getAttribute( "Width" ), 10 )
6903                     }
6904                 }
6905             };
6906 
6907             if ( !$.imageFormatSupported( configuration.Image.Format ) ) {
6908                 throw new Error(
6909                     $.getString( "Errors.ImageFormat", configuration.Image.Format.toUpperCase() )
6910                 );
6911             }
6912 
6913             dispRectNodes = root.getElementsByTagName( "DisplayRect" );
6914             for ( i = 0; i < dispRectNodes.length; i++ ) {
6915                 dispRectNode = dispRectNodes[ i ];
6916                 rectNode     = dispRectNode.getElementsByTagName( "Rect" )[ 0 ];
6917 
6918                 displayRects.push({
6919                     Rect: {
6920                         X: parseInt( rectNode.getAttribute( "X" ), 10 ),
6921                         Y: parseInt( rectNode.getAttribute( "Y" ), 10 ),
6922                         Width: parseInt( rectNode.getAttribute( "Width" ), 10 ),
6923                         Height: parseInt( rectNode.getAttribute( "Height" ), 10 ),
6924                         MinLevel: parseInt( dispRectNode.getAttribute( "MinLevel" ), 10 ),
6925                         MaxLevel: parseInt( dispRectNode.getAttribute( "MaxLevel" ), 10 )
6926                     }
6927                 });
6928             }
6929 
6930             if( displayRects.length ){
6931                 configuration.Image.DisplayRect = displayRects;
6932             }
6933 
6934             return configureFromObject( tileSource, configuration );
6935 
6936         } catch ( e ) {
6937             throw (e instanceof Error) ?
6938                 e :
6939                 new Error( $.getString("Errors.Dzi") );
6940         }
6941     } else if ( rootName == "Collection" ) {
6942         throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.Dzc" ) );
6943     } else if ( rootName == "Error" ) {
6944         return $._processDZIError( root );
6945     }
6946 
6947     throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.Dzi" ) );
6948 }
6949 
6950 /**
6951  * @private
6952  * @inner
6953  * @function
6954  */
6955 function configureFromObject( tileSource, configuration ){
6956     var imageData     = configuration.Image,
6957         tilesUrl      = imageData.Url,
6958         fileFormat    = imageData.Format,
6959         sizeData      = imageData.Size,
6960         dispRectData  = imageData.DisplayRect || [],
6961         width         = parseInt( sizeData.Width, 10 ),
6962         height        = parseInt( sizeData.Height, 10 ),
6963         tileSize      = parseInt( imageData.TileSize, 10 ),
6964         tileOverlap   = parseInt( imageData.Overlap, 10 ),
6965         displayRects  = [],
6966         rectData,
6967         i;
6968 
6969     //TODO: need to figure out out to better handle image format compatibility
6970     //      which actually includes additional file formats like xml and pdf
6971     //      and plain text for various tilesource implementations to avoid low
6972     //      level errors.
6973     //
6974     //      For now, just don't perform the check.
6975     //
6976     /*if ( !imageFormatSupported( fileFormat ) ) {
6977         throw new Error(
6978             $.getString( "Errors.ImageFormat", fileFormat.toUpperCase() )
6979         );
6980     }*/
6981 
6982     for ( i = 0; i < dispRectData.length; i++ ) {
6983         rectData = dispRectData[ i ].Rect;
6984 
6985         displayRects.push( new $.DisplayRect(
6986             parseInt( rectData.X, 10 ),
6987             parseInt( rectData.Y, 10 ),
6988             parseInt( rectData.Width, 10 ),
6989             parseInt( rectData.Height, 10 ),
6990             parseInt( rectData.MinLevel, 10 ),
6991             parseInt( rectData.MaxLevel, 10 )
6992         ));
6993     }
6994 
6995     return $.extend(true, {
6996         width: width, /* width *required */
6997         height: height, /* height *required */
6998         tileSize: tileSize, /* tileSize *required */
6999         tileOverlap: tileOverlap, /* tileOverlap *required */
7000         minLevel: null, /* minLevel */
7001         maxLevel: null, /* maxLevel */
7002         tilesUrl: tilesUrl, /* tilesUrl */
7003         fileFormat: fileFormat, /* fileFormat */
7004         displayRects: displayRects /* displayRects */
7005     }, configuration );
7006 
7007 }
7008 
7009 }( OpenSeadragon ));
7010 
7011 /*
7012  * OpenSeadragon - IIIFTileSource
7013  *
7014  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
7015  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
7016  *
7017  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
7018  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
7019  * met:
7020  *
7021  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
7022  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
7023  *
7024  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
7025  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
7026  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
7027  *
7028  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
7029  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
7030  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
7031  *
7032  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
7033  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
7034  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
7035  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
7036  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
7037  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
7038  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
7039  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
7040  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING

7042  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

7045 /*
7046  * The getTileUrl implementation is based on Jon Stroop's Python version,
7047  * which is released under the New BSD license:
7048  * https://gist.github.com/jpstroop/4624253
7049  */
7050 
7051 
7052 (function( $ ){
7053 
7054 /**
7055  * A client implementation of the International Image Interoperability
7056  * Format: Image API Draft 0.2 - Please read more about the specification
7057  * at
7058  *
7059  * @class
7060  * @extends OpenSeadragon.TileSource
7061  * @see http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/
7062  */
7063 $.IIIFTileSource = function( options ){
7064 
7065     $.extend( true, this, options );
7066 
7067     if( !(this.height && this.width && this.identifier && this.tilesUrl ) ){
7068         throw new Error('IIIF required parameters not provided.');
7069     }
7070 
7071     //TODO: at this point the base tile source implementation assumes
7072     //      a tile is a square and so only has one property tileSize
7073     //      to store it.  It may be possible to make tileSize a vector
7074     //      OpenSeadraon.Point but would require careful implementation
7075     //      to preserve backward compatibility.
7076     options.tileSize = this.tile_width;
7077 
7078     if (! options.maxLevel ) {
7079         var mf = -1;
7080         var scfs = this.scale_factors || this.scale_factor;
7081         if ( scfs instanceof Array ) {
7082             for ( var i = 0; i < scfs.length; i++ ) {
7083                 var cf = Number( scfs[i] );
7084                 if ( !isNaN( cf ) && cf > mf ) { mf = cf; }
7085             }
7086         }
7087         if ( mf < 0 ) { options.maxLevel = Number(Math.ceil(Math.log(Math.max(this.width, this.height), 2))); }
7088         else { options.maxLevel = mf; }
7089     }
7090 
7091     $.TileSource.apply( this, [ options ] );
7092 };
7093 
7094 $.extend( $.IIIFTileSource.prototype, $.TileSource.prototype, {
7095     /**
7096      * Determine if the data and/or url imply the image service is supported by
7097      * this tile source.
7098      * @function
7099      * @name OpenSeadragon.IIIFTileSource.prototype.supports
7100      * @param {Object|Array} data
7101      * @param {String} optional - url
7102      */
7103     supports: function( data, url ){
7104         return (
7105             data.ns &&
7106             "http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/ns/" == data.ns
7107         ) || (
7108             data.profile && (
7109                 "http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/compliance.html#level1" == data.profile ||
7110                 "http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/compliance.html#level2" == data.profile ||
7111                 "http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/compliance.html#level3" == data.profile ||
7112                 "http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/compliance.html" == data.profile
7113             )
7114         ) || (
7115             data.documentElement &&
7116             "info" == data.documentElement.tagName &&
7117             "http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/ns/" ==
7118                 data.documentElement.namespaceURI
7119         );
7120     },
7121 
7122     /**
7123      *
7124      * @function
7125      * @name OpenSeadragon.IIIFTileSource.prototype.configure
7126      * @param {Object|XMLDocument} data - the raw configuration
7127      * @param {String} url - the url the data was retreived from if any.
7128      * @return {Object} options - A dictionary of keyword arguments sufficient
7129      *      to configure this tile source via it's constructor.
7130      */
7131     configure: function( data, url ){
7132         var service,
7133             options,
7134             host;
7135 
7136         if( !$.isPlainObject(data) ){
7137 
7138             options = configureFromXml( this, data );
7139 
7140         }else{
7141 
7142             options = configureFromObject( this, data );
7143         }
7144 
7145         if( url && !options.tilesUrl ){
7146             service = url.split('/');
7147             service.pop(); //info.json or info.xml
7148             service = service.join('/');
7149             if( 'http' !== url.substring( 0, 4 ) ){
7150                 host = location.protocol + '//' + location.host;
7151                 service = host + service;
7152             }
7153             options.tilesUrl = service.replace(
7154                 data.identifier,
7155                 ''
7156             );
7157         }
7158 
7159         return options;
7160     },
7161 
7162     /**
7163      * Responsible for retreiving the url which will return an image for the
7164      * region speified by the given x, y, and level components.
7165      * @function
7166      * @name OpenSeadragon.IIIFTileSource.prototype.getTileUrl
7167      * @param {Number} level - z index
7168      * @param {Number} x
7169      * @param {Number} y
7170      * @throws {Error}
7171      */
7172     getTileUrl: function( level, x, y ){
7173 
7174         //# constants
7175         var IIIF_ROTATION = '0',
7176             IIIF_QUALITY = 'native.jpg',
7177 
7178             //## get the scale (level as a decimal)
7179             scale = Math.pow( 0.5, this.maxLevel - level ),
7180 
7181             //## get iiif size
7182             iiif_size = 'pct:' + ( scale * 100 ),
7183 
7184             //# image dimensions at this level
7185             level_width = Math.ceil( this.width * scale ),
7186             level_height = Math.ceil( this.height * scale ),
7187 
7188             //## iiif region
7189             iiif_tile_size_width = Math.ceil( this.tileSize / scale ),
7190             iiif_tile_size_height = Math.ceil( this.tileSize / scale ),
7191             iiif_region,
7192             iiif_tile_x,
7193             iiif_tile_y,
7194             iiif_tile_w,
7195             iiif_tile_h;
7196 
7197 
7198         if ( level_width < this.tile_width && level_height < this.tile_height ){
7199             iiif_region = 'full';
7200         } else {
7201             iiif_tile_x = x * iiif_tile_size_width;
7202             iiif_tile_y = y * iiif_tile_size_height;
7203             iiif_tile_w = Math.min( iiif_tile_size_width, this.width - iiif_tile_x );
7204             iiif_tile_h = Math.min( iiif_tile_size_height, this.height - iiif_tile_y );
7205             iiif_region = [ iiif_tile_x, iiif_tile_y, iiif_tile_w, iiif_tile_h ].join(',');
7206         }
7207 
7208         return [
7209             this.tilesUrl,
7210             this.identifier,
7211             iiif_region,
7212             iiif_size,
7213             IIIF_ROTATION,
7214             IIIF_QUALITY
7215         ].join('/');
7216     }
7217 
7218 
7219 });
7220 
7221 /**
7222  * @private
7223  * @inner
7224  * @function
7225  *
7226     <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
7227     <info xmlns="http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/ns/">
7228       <identifier>1E34750D-38DB-4825-A38A-B60A345E591C</identifier>
7229       <width>6000</width>
7230       <height>4000</height>
7231       <scale_factors>
7232         <scale_factor>1</scale_factor>
7233         <scale_factor>2</scale_factor>
7234         <scale_factor>4</scale_factor>
7235       </scale_factors>
7236       <tile_width>1024</tile_width>
7237       <tile_height>1024</tile_height>
7238       <formats>
7239         <format>jpg</format>
7240         <format>png</format>
7241       </formats>
7242       <qualities>
7243         <quality>native</quality>
7244         <quality>grey</quality>
7245       </qualities>
7246     </info>
7247  */
7248 function configureFromXml( tileSource, xmlDoc ){
7249 
7250     //parse the xml
7251     if ( !xmlDoc || !xmlDoc.documentElement ) {
7252         throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.Xml" ) );
7253     }
7254 
7255     var root            = xmlDoc.documentElement,
7256         rootName        = root.tagName,
7257         configuration   = null;
7258 
7259     if ( rootName == "info" ) {
7260 
7261         try {
7262 
7263             configuration = {
7264                 "ns": root.namespaceURI
7265             };
7266 
7267             parseXML( root, configuration );
7268 
7269             return configureFromObject( tileSource, configuration );
7270 
7271         } catch ( e ) {
7272             throw (e instanceof Error) ?
7273                 e :
7274                 new Error( $.getString("Errors.IIIF") );
7275         }
7276     }
7277 
7278     throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.IIIF" ) );
7279 
7280 }
7281 
7282 
7283 /**
7284  * @private
7285  * @inner
7286  * @function
7287  */
7288 function parseXML( node, configuration, property ){
7289     var i,
7290         value;
7291     if( node.nodeType == 3 && property ){//text node
7292         value = node.nodeValue.trim();
7293         if( value.match(/^\d*$/)){
7294             value = Number( value );
7295         }
7296         if( !configuration[ property ] ){
7297             configuration[ property ] = value;
7298         }else{
7299             if( !$.isArray( configuration[ property ] ) ){
7300                 configuration[ property ] = [ configuration[ property ] ];
7301             }
7302             configuration[ property ].push( value );
7303         }
7304     } else if( node.nodeType == 1 ){
7305         for( i = 0; i < node.childNodes.length; i++ ){
7306             parseXML( node.childNodes[ i ], configuration, node.nodeName );
7307         }
7308     }
7309 }
7310 
7311 
7312 /**
7313  * @private
7314  * @inner
7315  * @function
7316  *
7317     {
7318         "profile" : "http://library.stanford.edu/iiif/image-api/compliance.html#level1",
7319         "identifier" : "1E34750D-38DB-4825-A38A-B60A345E591C",
7320         "width" : 6000,
7321         "height" : 4000,
7322         "scale_factors" : [ 1, 2, 4 ],
7323         "tile_width" : 1024,
7324         "tile_height" : 1024,
7325         "formats" : [ "jpg", "png" ],
7326         "quality" : [ "native", "grey" ]
7327     }
7328  */
7329 function configureFromObject( tileSource, configuration ){
7330     //the image_host property is not part of the iiif standard but is included here to
7331     //allow the info.json and info.xml specify a different server to load the
7332     //images from so we can test the implementation.
7333     if( configuration.image_host ){
7334         configuration.tilesUrl = configuration.image_host;
7335     }
7336     return configuration;
7337 }
7338 
7339 }( OpenSeadragon ));
7340 
7341 /*
7342  * OpenSeadragon - OsmTileSource
7343  *
7344  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
7345  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
7346  *
7347  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
7348  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
7349  * met:
7350  *
7351  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
7352  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
7353  *
7354  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
7355  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
7356  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
7357  *
7358  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
7359  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
7360  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
7361  *
7362  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
7363  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
7364  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
7365  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
7366  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
7367  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
7368  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
7369  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
7370  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
7371  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
7372  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
