7375 /*
7376  * Derived from the OSM tile source in Rainer Simon's seajax-utils project
7377  * <http://github.com/rsimon/seajax-utils>.  Rainer Simon has contributed
7378  * the included code to the OpenSeadragon project under the New BSD license;
7379  * see <https://github.com/openseadragon/openseadragon/issues/58>.
7380  */
7381 
7382 
7383 (function( $ ){
7384 
7385 /**
7386  * A tilesource implementation for OpenStreetMap.
7387  *
7388  * Note 1. Zoomlevels. Deep Zoom and OSM define zoom levels differently. In  Deep
7389  * Zoom, level 0 equals an image of 1x1 pixels. In OSM, level 0 equals an image of
7390  * 256x256 levels (see http://gasi.ch/blog/inside-deep-zoom-2). I.e. there is a
7391  * difference of log2(256)=8 levels.
7392  *
7393  * Note 2. Image dimension. According to the OSM Wiki
7394  * (http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Slippy_map_tilenames#Zoom_levels)
7395  * the highest Mapnik zoom level has 256.144x256.144 tiles, with a 256x256
7396  * pixel size. I.e. the Deep Zoom image dimension is 65.572.864x65.572.864
7397  * pixels.
7398  *
7399  * @class
7400  * @extends OpenSeadragon.TileSource
7401  * @param {Number|Object} width - the pixel width of the image or the idiomatic
7402  *      options object which is used instead of positional arguments.
7403  * @param {Number} height
7404  * @param {Number} tileSize
7405  * @param {Number} tileOverlap
7406  * @param {String} tilesUrl
7407  */
7408 $.OsmTileSource = function( width, height, tileSize, tileOverlap, tilesUrl ) {
7409     var options;
7410 
7411     if( $.isPlainObject( width ) ){
7412         options = width;
7413     }else{
7414         options = {
7415             width: arguments[0],
7416             height: arguments[1],
7417             tileSize: arguments[2],
7418             tileOverlap: arguments[3],
7419             tilesUrl: arguments[4]
7420         };
7421     }
7422     //apply default setting for standard public OpenStreatMaps service
7423     //but allow them to be specified so fliks can host there own instance
7424     //or apply against other services supportting the same standard
7425     if( !options.width || !options.height ){
7426         options.width = 65572864;
7427         options.height = 65572864;
7428     }
7429     if( !options.tileSize ){
7430         options.tileSize = 256;
7431         options.tileOverlap = 0;
7432     }
7433     if( !options.tilesUrl ){
7434         options.tilesUrl = "http://tile.openstreetmap.org/";
7435     }
7436     options.minLevel = 8;
7437 
7438     $.TileSource.apply( this, [ options ] );
7439 
7440 };
7441 
7442 $.extend( $.OsmTileSource.prototype, $.TileSource.prototype, {
7443 
7444 
7445     /**
7446      * Determine if the data and/or url imply the image service is supported by
7447      * this tile source.
7448      * @function
7449      * @name OpenSeadragon.OsmTileSource.prototype.supports
7450      * @param {Object|Array} data
7451      * @param {String} optional - url
7452      */
7453     supports: function( data, url ){
7454         return (
7455             data.type &&
7456             "openstreetmaps" == data.type
7457         );
7458     },
7459 
7460     /**
7461      *
7462      * @function
7463      * @name OpenSeadragon.OsmTileSource.prototype.configure
7464      * @param {Object} data - the raw configuration
7465      * @param {String} url - the url the data was retreived from if any.
7466      * @return {Object} options - A dictionary of keyword arguments sufficient
7467      *      to configure this tile sources constructor.
7468      */
7469     configure: function( data, url ){
7470         return data;
7471     },
7472 
7473 
7474     /**
7475      * @function
7476      * @name OpenSeadragon.OsmTileSource.prototype.getTileUrl
7477      * @param {Number} level
7478      * @param {Number} x
7479      * @param {Number} y
7480      */
7481     getTileUrl: function( level, x, y ) {
7482         return this.tilesUrl + (level - 8) + "/" + x + "/" + y + ".png";
7483     }
7484 });
7485 
7486 
7487 }( OpenSeadragon ));
7488 
7489 /*
7490  * OpenSeadragon - TmsTileSource
7491  *
7492  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
7493  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
7494  *
7495  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
7496  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
7497  * met:
7498  *
7499  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
7500  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
7501  *
7502  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
7503  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
7504  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
7505  *
7506  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
7507  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
7508  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
7509  *
7510  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
7511  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
7512  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
7513  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
7514  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
7515  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
7516  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
7517  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
7518  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
7519  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
7520  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
7521  */
7522 
7523 /*
7524  * Derived from the TMS tile source in Rainer Simon's seajax-utils project
7525  * <http://github.com/rsimon/seajax-utils>.  Rainer Simon has contributed
7526  * the included code to the OpenSeadragon project under the New BSD license;
7527  * see <https://github.com/openseadragon/openseadragon/issues/58>.
7528  */
7529 
7530 
7531 (function( $ ){
7532 
7533 /**
7534  * A tilesource implementation for Tiled Map Services (TMS).
7535  * TMS tile scheme ( [ as supported by OpenLayers ] is described here
7536  * ( http://openlayers.org/dev/examples/tms.html ).
7537  *
7538  * @class
7539  * @extends OpenSeadragon.TileSource
7540  * @param {Number|Object} width - the pixel width of the image or the idiomatic
7541  *      options object which is used instead of positional arguments.
7542  * @param {Number} height
7543  * @param {Number} tileSize
7544  * @param {Number} tileOverlap
7545  * @param {String} tilesUrl
7546  */
7547 $.TmsTileSource = function( width, height, tileSize, tileOverlap, tilesUrl ) {
7548     var options;
7549 
7550     if( $.isPlainObject( width ) ){
7551         options = width;
7552     }else{
7553         options = {
7554             width: arguments[0],
7555             height: arguments[1],
7556             tileSize: arguments[2],
7557             tileOverlap: arguments[3],
7558             tilesUrl: arguments[4]
7559         };
7560     }
7561     // TMS has integer multiples of 256 for width/height and adds buffer
7562     // if necessary -> account for this!
7563     var bufferedWidth = Math.ceil(options.width / 256) * 256,
7564         bufferedHeight = Math.ceil(options.height / 256) * 256,
7565         max;
7566 
7567     // Compute number of zoomlevels in this tileset
7568     if (bufferedWidth > bufferedHeight) {
7569         max = bufferedWidth / 256;
7570     } else {
7571         max = bufferedHeight / 256;
7572     }
7573     options.maxLevel = Math.ceil(Math.log(max)/Math.log(2)) - 1;
7574     options.tileSize = 256;
7575     options.width = bufferedWidth;
7576     options.height = bufferedHeight;
7577 
7578     $.TileSource.apply( this, [ options ] );
7579 
7580 };
7581 
7582 $.extend( $.TmsTileSource.prototype, $.TileSource.prototype, {
7583 
7584 
7585     /**
7586      * Determine if the data and/or url imply the image service is supported by
7587      * this tile source.
7588      * @function
7589      * @name OpenSeadragon.TmsTileSource.prototype.supports
7590      * @param {Object|Array} data
7591      * @param {String} optional - url
7592      */
7593     supports: function( data, url ){
7594         return ( data.type && "tiledmapservice" == data.type );
7595     },
7596 
7597     /**
7598      *
7599      * @function
7600      * @name OpenSeadragon.TmsTileSource.prototype.configure
7601      * @param {Object} data - the raw configuration
7602      * @param {String} url - the url the data was retreived from if any.
7603      * @return {Object} options - A dictionary of keyword arguments sufficient
7604      *      to configure this tile sources constructor.
7605      */
7606     configure: function( data, url ){
7607         return data;
7608     },
7609 
7610 
7611     /**
7612      * @function
7613      * @name OpenSeadragon.TmsTileSource.prototype.getTileUrl
7614      * @param {Number} level
7615      * @param {Number} x
7616      * @param {Number} y
7617      */
7618     getTileUrl: function( level, x, y ) {
7619         // Convert from Deep Zoom definition to TMS zoom definition
7620         var yTiles = this.getNumTiles( level ).y - 1;
7621 
7622         return this.tilesUrl + level + "/" + x + "/" +  (yTiles - y) + ".png";
7623     }
7624 });
7625 
7626 
7627 }( OpenSeadragon ));
7628 
7629 /*
7630  * OpenSeadragon - LegacyTileSource
7631  *
7632  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
7633  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
7634  *
7635  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
7636  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
7637  * met:
7638  *
7639  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
7640  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
7641  *
7642  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
7643  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
7644  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
7645  *
7646  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
7647  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
7648  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
7649  *
7650  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
7651  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
7652  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
7653  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
7654  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
7655  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
7656  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
7657  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
7658  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
7659  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
7660  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
7661  */
7662 
7663 (function( $ ){
7664 
7665 /**
7666  * The LegacyTileSource allows simple, traditional image pyramids to be loaded
7667  * into an OpenSeadragon Viewer.  Basically, this translates to the historically
7668  * common practice of starting with a 'master' image, maybe a tiff for example,
7669  * and generating a set of 'service' images like one or more thumbnails, a medium
7670  * resolution image and a high resolution image in standard web formats like
7671  * png or jpg.
7672  * @class
7673  * @extends OpenSeadragon.TileSource
7674  * @param {Array} levels An array of file descriptions, each is an object with
7675  *      a 'url', a 'width', and a 'height'.  Overriding classes can expect more
7676  *      properties but these properties are sufficient for this implementation.
7677  *      Additionally, the levels are required to be listed in order from
7678  *      smallest to largest.
7679  * @property {Number} aspectRatio
7680  * @property {Number} dimensions
7681  * @property {Number} tileSize
7682  * @property {Number} tileOverlap
7683  * @property {Number} minLevel
7684  * @property {Number} maxLevel
7685  * @property {Array}  levels
7686  */
7687 $.LegacyTileSource = function( levels ) {
7688 
7689     var options,
7690         width,
7691         height;
7692 
7693     if( $.isArray( levels ) ){
7694         options = {
7695             type: 'legacy-image-pyramid',
7696             levels: levels
7697         };
7698     }
7699 
7700     //clean up the levels to make sure we support all formats
7701     options.levels = filterFiles( options.levels );
7702 
7703     if ( options.levels.length > 0 ) {
7704         width = options.levels[ options.levels.length - 1 ].width;
7705         height = options.levels[ options.levels.length - 1 ].height;
7706     }
7707     else {
7708         width = 0;
7709         height = 0;
7710         $.console.error( "No supported image formats found" );
7711     }
7712 
7713     $.extend( true, options, {
7714         width: width,
7715         height: height,
7716         tileSize: Math.max( height, width ),
7717         tileOverlap: 0,
7718         minLevel: 0,
7719         maxLevel: options.levels.length > 0 ? options.levels.length - 1 : 0
7720     } );
7721 
7722     $.TileSource.apply( this, [ options ] );
7723 
7724     this.levels = options.levels;
7725 };
7726 
7727 $.extend( $.LegacyTileSource.prototype, $.TileSource.prototype, {
7728     /**
7729      * Determine if the data and/or url imply the image service is supported by
7730      * this tile source.
7731      * @function
7732      * @name OpenSeadragon.LegacyTileSource.prototype.supports
7733      * @param {Object|Array} data
7734      * @param {String} optional - url
7735      */
7736     supports: function( data, url ){
7737         return (
7738             data.type &&
7739             "legacy-image-pyramid" == data.type
7740         ) || (
7741             data.documentElement &&
7742             "legacy-image-pyramid" == data.documentElement.getAttribute('type')
7743         );
7744     },
7745 
7746 
7747     /**
7748      *
7749      * @function
7750      * @name OpenSeadragon.LegacyTileSource.prototype.configure
7751      * @param {Object|XMLDocument} configuration - the raw configuration
7752      * @param {String} dataUrl - the url the data was retreived from if any.
7753      * @return {Object} options - A dictionary of keyword arguments sufficient
7754      *      to configure this tile sources constructor.
7755      */
7756     configure: function( configuration, dataUrl ){
7757 
7758         var options;
7759 
7760         if( !$.isPlainObject(configuration) ){
7761 
7762             options = configureFromXML( this, configuration );
7763 
7764         }else{
7765 
7766             options = configureFromObject( this, configuration );
7767         }
7768 
7769         return options;
7770 
7771     },
7772 
7773     /**
7774      * @function
7775      * @name OpenSeadragon.LegacyTileSource.prototype.getLevelScale
7776      * @param {Number} level
7777      */
7778     getLevelScale: function ( level ) {
7779         var levelScale = NaN;
7780         if ( this.levels.length > 0 && level >= this.minLevel && level <= this.maxLevel ) {
7781             levelScale =
7782                 this.levels[ level ].width /
7783                 this.levels[ this.maxLevel ].width;
7784         }
7785         return levelScale;
7786     },
7787 
7788     /**
7789      * @function
7790      * @name OpenSeadragon.LegacyTileSource.prototype.getNumTiles
7791      * @param {Number} level
7792      */
7793     getNumTiles: function( level ) {
7794         var scale = this.getLevelScale( level );
7795         if ( scale ){
7796             return new $.Point( 1, 1 );
7797         } else {
7798             return new $.Point( 0, 0 );
7799         }
7800     },
7801 
7802     /**
7803      * @function
7804      * @name OpenSeadragon.LegacyTileSource.prototype.getTileAtPoint
7805      * @param {Number} level
7806      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} point
7807      */
7808     getTileAtPoint: function( level, point ) {
7809         return new $.Point( 0, 0 );
7810     },
7811 
7812 
7813     /**
7814      * This method is not implemented by this class other than to throw an Error
7815      * announcing you have to implement it.  Because of the variety of tile
7816      * server technologies, and various specifications for building image
7817      * pyramids, this method is here to allow easy integration.
7818      * @function
7819      * @name OpenSeadragon.LegacyTileSource.prototype.getTileUrl
7820      * @param {Number} level
7821      * @param {Number} x
7822      * @param {Number} y
7823      * @throws {Error}
7824      */
7825     getTileUrl: function ( level, x, y ) {
7826         var url = null;
7827         if ( this.levels.length > 0 && level >= this.minLevel && level <= this.maxLevel ) {
7828             url = this.levels[ level ].url;
7829         }
7830         return url;
7831     }
7832 } );
7833 
7834 /**
7835  * This method removes any files from the Array which dont conform to our
7836  * basic requirements for a 'level' in the LegacyTileSource.
7837  * @private
7838  * @inner
7839  * @function
7840  */
7841 function filterFiles( files ){
7842     var filtered = [],
7843         file,
7844         i;
7845     for( i = 0; i < files.length; i++ ){
7846         file = files[ i ];
7847         if( file.height &&
7848             file.width &&
7849             file.url && (
7850                 file.url.toLowerCase().match(/^.*\.(png|jpg|jpeg|gif)$/) || (
7851                     file.mimetype &&
7852                     file.mimetype.toLowerCase().match(/^.*\/(png|jpg|jpeg|gif)$/)
7853                 )
7854             ) ){
7855             //This is sufficient to serve as a level
7856             filtered.push({
7857                 url: file.url,
7858                 width: Number( file.width ),
7859                 height: Number( file.height )
7860             });
7861         }
7862         else {
7863             $.console.error( 'Unsupported image format: %s', file.url ? file.url : '<no URL>' );
7864         }
7865     }
7866 
7867     return filtered.sort(function(a,b){
7868         return a.height - b.height;
7869     });
7870 
7871 }
7872 
7873 /**
7874  * @private
7875  * @inner
7876  * @function
7877  */
7878 function configureFromXML( tileSource, xmlDoc ){
7879 
7880     if ( !xmlDoc || !xmlDoc.documentElement ) {
7881         throw new Error( $.getString( "Errors.Xml" ) );
7882     }
7883 
7884     var root         = xmlDoc.documentElement,
7885         rootName     = root.tagName,
7886         conf         = null,
7887         levels       = [],
7888         level,
7889         i;
7890 
7891     if ( rootName == "image" ) {
7892 
7893         try {
7894             conf = {
7895                 type:        root.getAttribute( "type" ),
7896                 levels:      []
7897             };
7898 
7899             levels = root.getElementsByTagName( "level" );
7900             for ( i = 0; i < levels.length; i++ ) {
7901                 level = levels[ i ];
7902 
7903                 conf.levels .push({
7904                     url:    level.getAttribute( "url" ),
7905                     width:  parseInt( level.getAttribute( "width" ), 10 ),
7906                     height: parseInt( level.getAttribute( "height" ), 10 )
7907                 });
7908             }
7909 
7910             return configureFromObject( tileSource, conf );
7911 
7912         } catch ( e ) {
7913             throw (e instanceof Error) ?
7914                 e :
7915                 new Error( 'Unknown error parsing Legacy Image Pyramid XML.' );
7916         }
7917     } else if ( rootName == "collection" ) {
7918         throw new Error( 'Legacy Image Pyramid Collections not yet supported.' );
7919     } else if ( rootName == "error" ) {
7920         throw new Error( 'Error: ' + xmlDoc );
7921     }
7922 
7923     throw new Error( 'Unknown element ' + rootName );
7924 }
7925 
7926 /**
7927  * @private
7928  * @inner
7929  * @function
7930  */
7931 function configureFromObject( tileSource, configuration ){
7932 
7933     return configuration.levels;
7934 
7935 }
7936 
7937 }( OpenSeadragon ));
7938 
7939 /*
7940  * OpenSeadragon - TileSourceCollection
7941  *
7942  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
7943  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
7944  *
7945  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
7946  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
7947  * met:
7948  *
7949  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
7950  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
7951  *
7952  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
7953  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
7954  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
7955  *
7956  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
7957  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
7958  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
7959  *
7960  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
7961  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
7962  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
7963  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
7964  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
7965  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
7966  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
7967  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
7968  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
7969  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
7970  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
7971  */
7972 
7973 (function( $ ){
7974 
7975 /**
7976  * @class
7977  * @extends OpenSeadragon.TileSource
7978  */
7979 $.TileSourceCollection = function( tileSize, tileSources, rows, layout  ) {
7980     var options;
7981 
7982     if( $.isPlainObject( tileSize ) ){
7983         options = tileSize;
7984     }else{
7985         options = {
7986             tileSize: arguments[ 0 ],
7987             tileSources: arguments[ 1 ],
7988             rows: arguments[ 2 ],
7989             layout: arguments[ 3 ]
7990         };
7991     }
7992 
7993     if( !options.layout ){
7994         options.layout = 'horizontal';
7995     }
7996 
7997     var minLevel = 0,
7998         levelSize = 1.0,
7999         tilesPerRow = Math.ceil( options.tileSources.length / options.rows ),
8000         longSide = tilesPerRow >= options.rows ?
8001             tilesPerRow :
8002             options.rows;
8003 
8004     if( 'horizontal' == options.layout ){
8005         options.width = ( options.tileSize ) * tilesPerRow;
8006         options.height = ( options.tileSize ) * options.rows;
8007     } else {
8008         options.height = ( options.tileSize ) * tilesPerRow;
8009         options.width = ( options.tileSize ) * options.rows;
8010     }
8011 
8012     options.tileOverlap = -options.tileMargin;
8013     options.tilesPerRow = tilesPerRow;
8014 
8015     //Set min level to avoid loading sublevels since collection is a
8016     //different kind of abstraction
8017 
8018     while( levelSize  <  ( options.tileSize ) * longSide ){
8019         //$.console.log( '%s levelSize %s minLevel %s', options.tileSize * longSide, levelSize, minLevel );
8020         levelSize = levelSize * 2.0;
8021         minLevel++;
8022     }
8023     options.minLevel = minLevel;
8024 
8025     //for( var name in options ){
8026     //    $.console.log( 'Collection %s %s', name, options[ name ] );
8027     //}
8028 
8029     $.TileSource.apply( this, [ options ] );
8030 
8031 };
8032 
8033 $.extend( $.TileSourceCollection.prototype, $.TileSource.prototype, {
8034 
8035     /**
8036      * @function
8037      * @name OpenSeadragon.TileSourceCollection.prototype.getTileBounds
8038      * @param {Number} level
8039      * @param {Number} x
8040      * @param {Number} y
8041      */
8042     getTileBounds: function( level, x, y ) {
8043         var dimensionsScaled = this.dimensions.times( this.getLevelScale( level ) ),
8044             px = this.tileSize * x - this.tileOverlap,
8045             py = this.tileSize * y - this.tileOverlap,
8046             sx = this.tileSize + 1 * this.tileOverlap,
8047             sy = this.tileSize + 1 * this.tileOverlap,
8048             scale = 1.0 / dimensionsScaled.x;
8049 
8050         sx = Math.min( sx, dimensionsScaled.x - px );
8051         sy = Math.min( sy, dimensionsScaled.y - py );
8052 
8053         return new $.Rect( px * scale, py * scale, sx * scale, sy * scale );
8054     },
8055 
8056     /**
8057      *
8058      * @function
8059      * @name OpenSeadragon.TileSourceCollection.prototype.configure
8060      */
8061     configure: function( data, url ){
8062         return;
8063     },
8064 
8065 
8066     /**
8067      * @function
8068      * @name OpenSeadragon.TileSourceCollection.prototype.getTileUrl
8069      * @param {Number} level
8070      * @param {Number} x
8071      * @param {Number} y
8072      */
8073     getTileUrl: function( level, x, y ) {
8074         //$.console.log([  level, '/', x, '_', y ].join( '' ));
8075         return null;
8076     }
8077 
8078 
8079 
8080 });
8081 
8082 
8083 }( OpenSeadragon ));
8084 
8085 /*
8086  * OpenSeadragon - Button
8087  *
8088  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
8089  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
8090  *
8091  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
8092  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
8093  * met:
8094  *
8095  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
8096  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
8097  *
8098  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
8099  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
8100  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
8101  *
8102  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
8103  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
8104  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
8105  *
8106  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
8107  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
8108  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
8109  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
8110  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
8111  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
8112  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
8113  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
8114  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
8115  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
8116  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
8117  */
8118 
8119 (function( $ ){
8120 
8121 /**
8122  * An enumeration of button states including, REST, GROUP, HOVER, and DOWN
8123  * @static
8124  */
8125 $.ButtonState = {
8126     REST:   0,
8127     GROUP:  1,
8128     HOVER:  2,
8129     DOWN:   3
8130 };
8131 
8132 /**
8133  * Manages events, hover states for individual buttons, tool-tips, as well
8134  * as fading the bottons out when the user has not interacted with them
8135  * for a specified period.
8136  * @class
8137  * @extends OpenSeadragon.EventHandler
8138  * @param {Object} options
8139  * @param {String} options.tooltip Provides context help for the button we the
8140  *  user hovers over it.
8141  * @param {String} options.srcRest URL of image to use in 'rest' state
8142  * @param {String} options.srcGroup URL of image to use in 'up' state
8143  * @param {String} options.srcHover URL of image to use in 'hover' state
8144  * @param {String} options.srcDown URL of image to use in 'down' state
8145  * @param {Element} [options.element] Element to use as a container for the
8146  *  button.
8147  * @property {String} tooltip Provides context help for the button we the
8148  *  user hovers over it.
8149  * @property {String} srcRest URL of image to use in 'rest' state
8150  * @property {String} srcGroup URL of image to use in 'up' state
8151  * @property {String} srcHover URL of image to use in 'hover' state
8152  * @property {String} srcDown URL of image to use in 'down' state
8153  * @property {Object} config Configurable settings for this button. DEPRECATED.
8154  * @property {Element} [element] Element to use as a container for the
8155  *  button.
8156  * @property {Number} fadeDelay How long to wait before fading
8157  * @property {Number} fadeLength How long should it take to fade the button.
8158  * @property {Number} fadeBeginTime When the button last began to fade.
8159  * @property {Boolean} shouldFade Whether this button should fade after user
8160  *  stops interacting with the viewport.
8161     this.fadeDelay      = 0;      // begin fading immediately
8162     this.fadeLength     = 2000;   // fade over a period of 2 seconds
8163     this.fadeBeginTime  = null;
8164     this.shouldFade     = false;
8165  */
8166 $.Button = function( options ) {
8167 
8168     var _this = this;
8169 
8170     $.EventHandler.call( this );
8171 
8172     $.extend( true, this, {
8173 
8174         tooltip:            null,
8175         srcRest:            null,
8176         srcGroup:           null,
8177         srcHover:           null,
8178         srcDown:            null,
8179         clickTimeThreshold: $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.clickTimeThreshold,
8180         clickDistThreshold: $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.clickDistThreshold,
8181         // begin fading immediately
8182         fadeDelay:          0,
8183         // fade over a period of 2 seconds
8184         fadeLength:         2000,
8185         onPress:            null,
8186         onRelease:          null,
8187         onClick:            null,
8188         onEnter:            null,
8189         onExit:             null,
8190         onFocus:            null,
8191         onBlur:             null
8192 
8193     }, options );
8194 
8195     this.element        = options.element   || $.makeNeutralElement( "button" );
8196     this.element.href   = this.element.href || '#';
8197 
8198     //if the user has specified the element to bind the control to explicitly
8199     //then do not add the default control images
8200     if( !options.element ){
8201         this.imgRest      = $.makeTransparentImage( this.srcRest );
8202         this.imgGroup     = $.makeTransparentImage( this.srcGroup );
8203         this.imgHover     = $.makeTransparentImage( this.srcHover );
8204         this.imgDown      = $.makeTransparentImage( this.srcDown );
8205 
8206         this.element.appendChild( this.imgRest );
8207         this.element.appendChild( this.imgGroup );
8208         this.element.appendChild( this.imgHover );
8209         this.element.appendChild( this.imgDown );
8210 
8211         this.imgGroup.style.position =
8212         this.imgHover.style.position =
8213         this.imgDown.style.position  =
8214             "absolute";
8215 
8216         this.imgGroup.style.top =
8217         this.imgHover.style.top =
8218         this.imgDown.style.top  =
8219             "0px";
8220 
8221         this.imgGroup.style.left =
8222         this.imgHover.style.left =
8223         this.imgDown.style.left  =
8224             "0px";
8225 
8226         this.imgHover.style.visibility =
8227         this.imgDown.style.visibility  =
8228             "hidden";
8229 
8230         if ( $.Browser.vendor == $.BROWSERS.FIREFOX  && $.Browser.version < 3 ){
8231             this.imgGroup.style.top =
8232             this.imgHover.style.top =
8233             this.imgDown.style.top  =
8234                 "";
8235         }
8236     }
8237 
8238 
8239     this.addHandler( "onPress",     this.onPress );
8240     this.addHandler( "onRelease",   this.onRelease );
8241     this.addHandler( "onClick",     this.onClick );
8242     this.addHandler( "onEnter",     this.onEnter );
8243     this.addHandler( "onExit",      this.onExit );
8244     this.addHandler( "onFocus",     this.onFocus );
8245     this.addHandler( "onBlur",      this.onBlur );
8246 
8247     this.currentState = $.ButtonState.GROUP;
8248 
8249     this.fadeBeginTime  = null;
8250     this.shouldFade     = false;
8251 
8252     this.element.style.display  = "inline-block";
8253     this.element.style.position = "relative";
8254     this.element.title          = this.tooltip;
8255 
8256     this.tracker = new $.MouseTracker({
8257 
8258         element:            this.element,
8259         clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
8260         clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
8261 
8262         enterHandler: function( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny ) {
8263             if ( buttonDownElement ) {
8264                 inTo( _this, $.ButtonState.DOWN );
8265                 _this.raiseEvent( "onEnter", _this );
8266             } else if ( !buttonDownAny ) {
8267                 inTo( _this, $.ButtonState.HOVER );
8268             }
8269         },
8270 
8271         focusHandler: function( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny ) {
8272             this.enterHandler( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny );
8273             _this.raiseEvent( "onFocus", _this );
8274         },
8275 
8276         exitHandler: function( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny ) {
8277             outTo( _this, $.ButtonState.GROUP );
8278             if ( buttonDownElement ) {
8279                 _this.raiseEvent( "onExit", _this );
8280             }
8281         },
8282 
8283         blurHandler: function( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny ) {
8284             this.exitHandler( tracker, position, buttonDownElement, buttonDownAny );
8285             _this.raiseEvent( "onBlur", _this );
8286         },
8287 
8288         pressHandler: function( tracker, position ) {
8289             inTo( _this, $.ButtonState.DOWN );
8290             _this.raiseEvent( "onPress", _this );
8291         },
8292 
8293         releaseHandler: function( tracker, position, insideElementPress, insideElementRelease ) {
8294             if ( insideElementPress && insideElementRelease ) {
8295                 outTo( _this, $.ButtonState.HOVER );
8296                 _this.raiseEvent( "onRelease", _this );
8297             } else if ( insideElementPress ) {
8298                 outTo( _this, $.ButtonState.GROUP );
8299             } else {
8300                 inTo( _this, $.ButtonState.HOVER );
8301             }
8302         },
8303 
8304         clickHandler: function( tracker, position, quick, shift ) {
8305             if ( quick ) {
8306                 _this.raiseEvent("onClick", _this);
8307             }
8308         },
8309 
8310         keyHandler: function( tracker, key ){
8311             //console.log( "%s : handling key %s!", _this.tooltip, key);
8312             if( 13 === key ){
8313                 _this.raiseEvent( "onClick", _this );
8314                 _this.raiseEvent( "onRelease", _this );
8315                 return false;
8316             }
8317             return true;
8318         }
8319 
8320     }).setTracking( true );
8321 
8322     outTo( this, $.ButtonState.REST );
8323 };
8324 
8325 $.extend( $.Button.prototype, $.EventHandler.prototype, {
8326 
8327     /**
8328      * TODO: Determine what this function is intended to do and if it's actually
8329      * useful as an API point.
8330      * @function
8331      * @name OpenSeadragon.Button.prototype.notifyGroupEnter
8332      */
8333     notifyGroupEnter: function() {
8334         inTo( this, $.ButtonState.GROUP );
8335     },
8336 
8337     /**
8338      * TODO: Determine what this function is intended to do and if it's actually
8339      * useful as an API point.
8340      * @function
8341      * @name OpenSeadragon.Button.prototype.notifyGroupExit
8342      */
8343     notifyGroupExit: function() {
8344         outTo( this, $.ButtonState.REST );
8345     },
8346 
8347     disable: function(){
8348         this.notifyGroupExit();
8349         this.element.disabled = true;
8350         $.setElementOpacity( this.element, 0.2, true );
8351     },
8352 
8353     enable: function(){
8354         this.element.disabled = false;
8355         $.setElementOpacity( this.element, 1.0, true );
8356         this.notifyGroupEnter();
8357     }
8358 
8359 });
8360 
8361 
8362 function scheduleFade( button ) {
8363     $.requestAnimationFrame(function(){
8364         updateFade( button );
8365     });
8366 }
8367 
8368 function updateFade( button ) {
8369     var currentTime,
8370         deltaTime,
8371         opacity;
8372 
8373     if ( button.shouldFade ) {
8374         currentTime = $.now();
8375         deltaTime   = currentTime - button.fadeBeginTime;
8376         opacity     = 1.0 - deltaTime / button.fadeLength;
8377         opacity     = Math.min( 1.0, opacity );
8378         opacity     = Math.max( 0.0, opacity );
8379 
8380         if( button.imgGroup ){
8381             $.setElementOpacity( button.imgGroup, opacity, true );
8382         }
8383         if ( opacity > 0 ) {
8384             // fade again
8385             scheduleFade( button );
8386         }
8387     }
8388 }
8389 
8390 function beginFading( button ) {
8391     button.shouldFade = true;
8392     button.fadeBeginTime = $.now() + button.fadeDelay;
8393     window.setTimeout( function(){
8394         scheduleFade( button );
8395     }, button.fadeDelay );
8396 }
8397 
8398 function stopFading( button ) {
8399     button.shouldFade = false;
8400     if( button.imgGroup ){
8401         $.setElementOpacity( button.imgGroup, 1.0, true );
8402     }
8403 }
8404 
8405 function inTo( button, newState ) {
8406 
8407     if( button.element.disabled ){
8408         return;
8409     }
8410 
8411     if ( newState >= $.ButtonState.GROUP &&
8412          button.currentState == $.ButtonState.REST ) {
8413         stopFading( button );
8414         button.currentState = $.ButtonState.GROUP;
8415     }
8416 
8417     if ( newState >= $.ButtonState.HOVER &&
8418          button.currentState == $.ButtonState.GROUP ) {
8419         if( button.imgHover ){
8420             button.imgHover.style.visibility = "";
8421         }
8422         button.currentState = $.ButtonState.HOVER;
8423     }
8424 
8425     if ( newState >= $.ButtonState.DOWN &&
8426          button.currentState == $.ButtonState.HOVER ) {
8427         if( button.imgDown ){
8428             button.imgDown.style.visibility = "";
8429         }
8430         button.currentState = $.ButtonState.DOWN;
8431     }
8432 }
8433 
8434 
8435 function outTo( button, newState ) {
8436 
8437     if( button.element.disabled ){
8438         return;
8439     }
8440 
8441     if ( newState <= $.ButtonState.HOVER &&
8442          button.currentState == $.ButtonState.DOWN ) {
8443         if( button.imgDown ){
8444             button.imgDown.style.visibility = "hidden";
8445         }
8446         button.currentState = $.ButtonState.HOVER;
8447     }
8448 
8449     if ( newState <= $.ButtonState.GROUP &&
8450          button.currentState == $.ButtonState.HOVER ) {
8451         if( button.imgHover ){
8452             button.imgHover.style.visibility = "hidden";
8453         }
8454         button.currentState = $.ButtonState.GROUP;
8455     }
8456 
8457     if ( newState <= $.ButtonState.REST &&
8458          button.currentState == $.ButtonState.GROUP ) {
8459         beginFading( button );
8460         button.currentState = $.ButtonState.REST;
8461     }
8462 }
8463 
8464 
8465 
8466 }( OpenSeadragon ));
8467 
8468 /*
8469  * OpenSeadragon - ButtonGroup
8470  *
8471  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
8472  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
8473  *
8474  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
8475  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
8476  * met:
8477  *
8478  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
8479  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
8480  *
8481  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
8482  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
8483  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
8484  *
8485  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
8486  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
8487  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
8488  *
8489  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
8490  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
8491  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
8492  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
8493  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
8494  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
8495  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
8496  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
8497  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
8498  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
8499  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
8500  */
8501 
8502 (function( $ ){
8503 /**
8504  * Manages events on groups of buttons.
8505  * @class
8506  * @param {Object} options - a dictionary of settings applied against the entire
8507  * group of buttons
8508  * @param {Array}    options.buttons Array of buttons
8509  * @param {Element}  [options.group]   Element to use as the container,
8510  * @param {Object}   options.config  Object with Viewer settings ( TODO: is
8511  *  this actually used anywhere? )
8512  * @param {Function} [options.enter]   Function callback for when the mouse
8513  *  enters group
8514  * @param {Function} [options.exit]    Function callback for when mouse leaves
8515  *  the group
8516  * @param {Function} [options.release] Function callback for when mouse is
8517  *  released
8518  * @property {Array} buttons - An array containing the buttons themselves.
8519  * @property {Element} element - The shared container for the buttons.
8520  * @property {Object} config - Configurable settings for the group of buttons.
8521  * @property {OpenSeadragon.MouseTracker} tracker - Tracks mouse events accross
8522  *  the group of buttons.
8523  **/
8524 $.ButtonGroup = function( options ) {
8525 
8526     $.extend( true, this, {
8527         buttons:            [],
8528         clickTimeThreshold: $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.clickTimeThreshold,
8529         clickDistThreshold: $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.clickDistThreshold,
8530         labelText:          ""
8531     }, options );
8532 
8533     // copy the botton elements
8534     var buttons = this.buttons.concat([]),
8535         _this = this,
8536         i;
8537 
8538     this.element = options.element || $.makeNeutralElement( "fieldgroup" );
8539 
8540     if( !options.group ){
8541         this.label   = $.makeNeutralElement( "label" );
8542         //TODO: support labels for ButtonGroups
8543         //this.label.innerHTML = this.labelText;
8544         this.element.style.display = "inline-block";
8545         this.element.appendChild( this.label );
8546         for ( i = 0; i < buttons.length; i++ ) {
8547             this.element.appendChild( buttons[ i ].element );
8548         }
8549     }
8550 
8551     this.tracker = new $.MouseTracker({
8552         element:            this.element,
8553         clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
8554         clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
8555         enterHandler: function() {
8556             var i;
8557             for ( i = 0; i < _this.buttons.length; i++ ) {
8558                 _this.buttons[ i ].notifyGroupEnter();
8559             }
8560         },
8561         exitHandler: function() {
8562             var i,
8563                 buttonDownElement = arguments.length > 2 ?
8564                     arguments[ 2 ] :
8565                     null;
8566             if ( !buttonDownElement ) {
8567                 for ( i = 0; i < _this.buttons.length; i++ ) {
8568                     _this.buttons[ i ].notifyGroupExit();
8569                 }
8570             }
8571         },
8572         releaseHandler: function() {
8573             var i,
8574                 insideElementRelease = arguments.length > 3 ?
8575                     arguments[ 3 ] :
8576                     null;
8577             if ( !insideElementRelease ) {
8578                 for ( i = 0; i < _this.buttons.length; i++ ) {
8579                     _this.buttons[ i ].notifyGroupExit();
8580                 }
8581             }
8582         }
8583     }).setTracking( true );
8584 };
8585 
8586 $.ButtonGroup.prototype = {
8587 
8588     /**
8589      * TODO: Figure out why this is used on the public API and if a more useful
8590      * api can be created.
8591      * @function
8592      * @name OpenSeadragon.ButtonGroup.prototype.emulateEnter
8593      */
8594     emulateEnter: function() {
8595         this.tracker.enterHandler();
8596     },
8597 
8598     /**
8599      * TODO: Figure out why this is used on the public API and if a more useful
8600      * api can be created.
8601      * @function
8602      * @name OpenSeadragon.ButtonGroup.prototype.emulateExit
8603      */
8604     emulateExit: function() {
8605         this.tracker.exitHandler();
8606     }
8607 };
8608 
8609 
8610 }( OpenSeadragon ));
8611 
8612 /*
8613  * OpenSeadragon - Rect
8614  *
8615  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
8616  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
8617  *
8618  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
8619  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
8620  * met:
8621  *
8622  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
8623  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
8624  *
8625  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
8626  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
8627  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
8628  *
8629  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
8630  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
8631  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
8632  *
8633  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
8634  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
8635  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
8636  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
8637  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
8638  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
8639  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
8640  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
8641  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
8642  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
8643  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
8644  */
8645 
8646 (function( $ ){
8647 
8648 /**
8649  * A Rectangle really represents a 2x2 matrix where each row represents a
8650  * 2 dimensional vector component, the first is (x,y) and the second is
8651  * (width, height).  The latter component implies the equation of a simple
8652  * plane.
8653  *
8654  * @class
8655  * @param {Number} x The vector component 'x'.
8656  * @param {Number} y The vector component 'y'.
8657  * @param {Number} width The vector component 'height'.
8658  * @param {Number} height The vector component 'width'.
8659  * @property {Number} x The vector component 'x'.
8660  * @property {Number} y The vector component 'y'.
8661  * @property {Number} width The vector component 'width'.
8662  * @property {Number} height The vector component 'height'.
8663  */
8664 $.Rect = function( x, y, width, height ) {
8665     this.x = typeof ( x ) == "number" ? x : 0;
8666     this.y = typeof ( y ) == "number" ? y : 0;
8667     this.width  = typeof ( width )  == "number" ? width : 0;
8668     this.height = typeof ( height ) == "number" ? height : 0;
8669 };
8670 
8671 $.Rect.prototype = {
8672 
8673     /**
8674      * The aspect ratio is simply the ratio of width to height.
8675      * @function
8676      * @returns {Number} The ratio of width to height.
8677      */
8678     getAspectRatio: function() {
8679         return this.width / this.height;
8680     },
8681 
8682     /**
8683      * Provides the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle as a
8684      * point.
8685      * @function
8686      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} The coordinate of the upper-left corner of
8687      *  the rectangle.
8688      */
8689     getTopLeft: function() {
8690         return new $.Point(
8691             this.x,
8692             this.y
8693         );
8694     },
8695 
8696     /**
8697      * Provides the coordinates of the bottom-right corner of the rectangle as a
8698      * point.
8699      * @function
8700      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} The coordinate of the bottom-right corner of
8701      *  the rectangle.
8702      */
8703     getBottomRight: function() {
8704         return new $.Point(
8705             this.x + this.width,
8706             this.y + this.height
8707         );
8708     },
8709 
8710     /**
8711      * Provides the coordinates of the top-right corner of the rectangle as a
8712      * point.
8713      * @function
8714      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} The coordinate of the top-right corner of
8715      *  the rectangle.
8716      */
8717     getTopRight: function() {
8718         return new $.Point(
8719             this.x + this.width,
8720             this.y
8721         );
8722     },
8723 
8724     /**
8725      * Provides the coordinates of the bottom-left corner of the rectangle as a
8726      * point.
8727      * @function
8728      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} The coordinate of the bottom-left corner of
8729      *  the rectangle.
8730      */
8731     getBottomLeft: function() {
8732         return new $.Point(
8733             this.x,
8734             this.y + this.height
8735         );
8736     },
8737 
8738     /**
8739      * Computes the center of the rectangle.
8740      * @function
8741      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} The center of the rectangle as represented
8742      *  as represented by a 2-dimensional vector (x,y)
8743      */
8744     getCenter: function() {
8745         return new $.Point(
8746             this.x + this.width / 2.0,
8747             this.y + this.height / 2.0
8748         );
8749     },
8750 
8751     /**
8752      * Returns the width and height component as a vector OpenSeadragon.Point
8753      * @function
8754      * @returns {OpenSeadragon.Point} The 2 dimensional vector representing the
8755      *  the width and height of the rectangle.
8756      */
8757     getSize: function() {
8758         return new $.Point( this.width, this.height );
8759     },
8760 
8761     /**
8762      * Determines if two Rectangles have equivalent components.
8763      * @function
8764      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Rect} rectangle The Rectangle to compare to.
8765      * @return {Boolean} 'true' if all components are equal, otherwise 'false'.
8766      */
8767     equals: function( other ) {
8768         return ( other instanceof $.Rect ) &&
8769             ( this.x === other.x ) &&
8770             ( this.y === other.y ) &&
8771             ( this.width === other.width ) &&
8772             ( this.height === other.height );
8773     },
8774 
8775     /**
8776      * Rotates a rectangle around a point. Currently only 90, 180, and 270
8777      * degrees are supported.
8778      * @function
8779      * @param {Number} degrees The angle in degrees to rotate.
8780      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} pivot The point about which to rotate.
8781      * Defaults to the center of the rectangle.
8782      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Rect}
8783      */
8784     rotate: function( degrees, pivot ) {
8785         // TODO support arbitrary rotation
8786         var width = this.width,
8787             height = this.height,
8788             newTopLeft;
8789 
8790         degrees = ( degrees + 360 ) % 360;
8791         if( degrees % 90 !== 0 ) {
8792             throw new Error('Currently only 0, 90, 180, and 270 degrees are supported.');
8793         }
8794 
8795         if( degrees === 0 ){
8796             return new $.Rect(
8797                 this.x,
8798                 this.y,
8799                 this.width,
8800                 this.height
8801             );
8802         }
8803 
8804         pivot = pivot || this.getCenter();
8805 
8806         switch ( degrees ) {
8807             case 90:
8808                 newTopLeft = this.getBottomLeft();
8809                 width = this.height;
8810                 height = this.width;
8811                 break;
8812             case 180:
8813                 newTopLeft = this.getBottomRight();
8814                 break;
8815             case 270:
8816                 newTopLeft = this.getTopRight();
8817                 width = this.height;
8818                 height = this.width;
8819                 break;
8820             default:
8821                 newTopLeft = this.getTopLeft();
8822                 break;
8823         }
8824 
8825         newTopLeft = newTopLeft.rotate(degrees, pivot);
8826 
8827         return new $.Rect(newTopLeft.x, newTopLeft.y, width, height);
8828     },
8829 
8830     /**
8831      * Provides a string representation of the rectangle which is useful for
8832      * debugging.
8833      * @function
8834      * @returns {String} A string representation of the rectangle.
8835      */
8836     toString: function() {
8837         return "[" +
8838             Math.round(this.x*100) + "," +
8839             Math.round(this.y*100) + "," +
8840             Math.round(this.width*100) + "x" +
8841             Math.round(this.height*100) +
8842         "]";
8843     }
8844 };
8845 
8846 
8847 }( OpenSeadragon ));
8848 
8849 /*
8850  * OpenSeadragon - ReferenceStrip
8851  *
8852  * Copyright (C) 2009 CodePlex Foundation
8853  * Copyright (C) 2010-2013 OpenSeadragon contributors
8854  *
8855  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
8856  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
8857  * met:
8858  *
8859  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
8860  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
8861  *
8862  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
8863  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
8864  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
8865  *
8866  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
8867  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
8868  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
8869  *
8870  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
8871  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
8872  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
8873  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
8874  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
8875  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
8876  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
8877  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
8878  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
8879  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
8880  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
8881  */
8882 
8883 (function( $ ){
8884 
8885 // dictionary from id to private properties
8886 var THIS = {};
8887 
8888 /**
8889  *  The CollectionDrawer is a reimplementation if the Drawer API that
8890  *  focuses on allowing a viewport to be redefined as a collection
8891  *  of smaller viewports, defined by a clear number of rows and / or
8892  *  columns of which each item in the matrix of viewports has its own
8893  *  source.
8894  *
8895  *  This idea is a reexpression of the idea of dzi collections
8896  *  which allows a clearer algorithm to reuse the tile sources already
8897  *  supported by OpenSeadragon, in heterogenious or homogenious
8898  *  sequences just like mixed groups already supported by the viewer
8899  *  for the purpose of image sequnces.
8900  *
8901  *  TODO:   The difficult part of this feature is figuring out how to express
8902  *          this functionality as a combination of the functionality already
8903  *          provided by Drawer, Viewport, TileSource, and Navigator.  It may
8904  *          require better abstraction at those points in order to effeciently
8905  *          reuse those paradigms.
8906  */
8907 $.ReferenceStrip = function( options ){
8908 
8909     var _this       = this,
8910         viewer      = options.viewer,
8911         viewerSize  = $.getElementSize( viewer.element ),
8912         element,
8913         style,
8914         i;
8915 
8916     //We may need to create a new element and id if they did not
8917     //provide the id for the existing element
8918     if( !options.id ){
8919         options.id              = 'referencestrip-' + $.now();
8920         this.element            = $.makeNeutralElement( "div" );
8921         this.element.id         = options.id;
8922         this.element.className  = 'referencestrip';
8923     }
8924 
8925     options = $.extend( true, {
8926         sizeRatio:  $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.referenceStripSizeRatio,
8927         position:   $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.referenceStripPosition,
8928         scroll:     $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.referenceStripScroll,
8929         clickTimeThreshold:  $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.clickTimeThreshold
8930     }, options, {
8931         //required overrides
8932         element:                this.element,
8933         //These need to be overridden to prevent recursion since
8934         //the navigator is a viewer and a viewer has a navigator
8935         showNavigator:          false,
8936         mouseNavEnabled:        false,
8937         showNavigationControl:  false,
8938         showSequenceControl:    false
8939     });
8940 
8941     $.extend( this, options );
8942     //Private state properties
8943     THIS[ this.id ] = {
8944         "animating":         false
8945     };
8946 
8947     this.minPixelRatio = this.viewer.minPixelRatio;
8948 
8949     style               = this.element.style;
8950     style.marginTop     = '0px';
8951     style.marginRight   = '0px';
8952     style.marginBottom  = '0px';
8953     style.marginLeft    = '0px';
8954     style.left          = '0px';
8955     style.bottom        = '0px';
8956     style.border        = '0px';
8957     style.background    = '#000';
8958     style.position      = 'relative';
8959 
8960     $.setElementOpacity( this.element, 0.8 );
8961 
8962     this.viewer = viewer;
8963     this.innerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
8964         element:        this.element,
8965         dragHandler:    $.delegate( this, onStripDrag ),
8966         scrollHandler:  $.delegate( this, onStripScroll ),
8967         enterHandler:   $.delegate( this, onStripEnter ),
8968         exitHandler:    $.delegate( this, onStripExit ),
8969         keyHandler:     $.delegate( this, onKeyPress )
8970     }).setTracking( true );
8971 
8972     //Controls the position and orientation of the reference strip and sets the
8973     //appropriate width and height
8974     if( options.width && options.height ){
8975         this.element.style.width  = options.width + 'px';
8976         this.element.style.height = options.height + 'px';
8977         viewer.addControl(
8978             this.element,
8979             {anchor: $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_LEFT}
8980         );
8981     } else {
8982         if( "horizontal" == options.scroll ){
8983             this.element.style.width = (
8984                 viewerSize.x *
8985                 options.sizeRatio *
8986                 viewer.tileSources.length
8987             ) + ( 12 * viewer.tileSources.length ) + 'px';
8988 
8989             this.element.style.height  = (
8990                 viewerSize.y *
8991                 options.sizeRatio
8992             ) + 'px';
8993 
8994             viewer.addControl(
8995                 this.element,
8996                 {anchor: $.ControlAnchor.BOTTOM_LEFT}
8997             );
8998         }else {
8999             this.element.style.height = (
9000                 viewerSize.y *
9001                 options.sizeRatio *
9002                 viewer.tileSources.length
9003             ) + ( 12 * viewer.tileSources.length ) + 'px';
9004 
9005             this.element.style.width  = (
9006                 viewerSize.x *
9007                 options.sizeRatio
9008             ) + 'px';
9009 
9010             viewer.addControl(
9011                 this.element,
9012                 {anchor: $.ControlAnchor.TOP_LEFT}
9013             );
9014 
9015         }
9016     }
9017 
9018     this.panelWidth = ( viewerSize.x * this.sizeRatio ) + 8;
9019     this.panelHeight = ( viewerSize.y * this.sizeRatio ) + 8;
9020     this.panels = [];
9021 
9022     /*jshint loopfunc:true*/
9023     for( i = 0; i < viewer.tileSources.length; i++ ){
9024 
9025         element = $.makeNeutralElement('div');
9026         element.id = this.element.id + "-" + i;
9027 
9028         element.style.width         = _this.panelWidth + 'px';
9029         element.style.height        = _this.panelHeight + 'px';
9030         element.style.display       = 'inline';
9031         element.style.float         = 'left'; //Webkit
9032         element.style.cssFloat      = 'left'; //Firefox
9033         element.style.styleFloat    = 'left'; //IE
9034         element.style.padding       = '2px';
9035 
9036         element.innerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
9037             element:            element,
9038             clickTimeThreshold: this.clickTimeThreshold,
9039             clickDistThreshold: this.clickDistThreshold,
9040             pressHandler: function( tracker ){
9041                 tracker.dragging = $.now();
9042             },
9043             releaseHandler: function( tracker, position, insideElementPress, insideElementRelease ){
9044                 var id = tracker.element.id,
9045                     page = Number( id.split( '-' )[ 2 ] ),
9046                     now = $.now();
9047 
9048                 if ( insideElementPress &&
9049                      insideElementRelease &&
9050                      tracker.dragging &&
9051                      ( now - tracker.dragging ) < tracker.clickTimeThreshold ){
9052                     tracker.dragging = null;
9053                     viewer.goToPage( page );
9054                 }
9055             }
9056         }).setTracking( true );
9057 
9058         this.element.appendChild( element );
9059 
9060         element.activePanel = false;
9061 
9062         this.panels.push( element );
9063 
9064     }
9065     loadPanels( this, this.scroll == 'vertical' ? viewerSize.y : viewerSize.y, 0);
9066     this.setFocus( 0 );
9067 
9068 };
9069 
9070 $.extend( $.ReferenceStrip.prototype, $.EventHandler.prototype, $.Viewer.prototype, {
9071 
9072     setFocus: function( page ){
9073         var element = $.getElement( this.element.id + '-' + page ),
9074             viewerSize = $.getElementSize( this.viewer.canvas ),
9075             scrollWidth = Number(this.element.style.width.replace('px','')),
9076             scrollHeight = Number(this.element.style.height.replace('px','')),
9077             offsetLeft = -Number(this.element.style.marginLeft.replace('px','')),
9078             offsetTop = -Number(this.element.style.marginTop.replace('px','')),
9079             offset;
9080 
9081         if ( this.currentSelected !== element ){
9082             if( this.currentSelected ){
9083                 this.currentSelected.style.background = '#000';
9084             }
9085             this.currentSelected = element;
9086             this.currentSelected.style.background = '#999';
9087 
9088             if( 'horizontal' == this.scroll ){
9089                 //right left
9090                 offset = (Number(page)) * ( this.panelWidth + 3 );
9091                 if( offset > offsetLeft + viewerSize.x - this.panelWidth){
9092                     offset = Math.min(offset, (scrollWidth - viewerSize.x));
9093                     this.element.style.marginLeft = -offset + 'px';
9094                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.x, -offset );
9095                 }else if( offset < offsetLeft ){
9096                     offset = Math.max(0, offset - viewerSize.x / 2);
9097                     this.element.style.marginLeft = -offset + 'px';
9098                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.x, -offset );
9099                 }
9100             }else{
9101                 offset = (Number(page) ) * ( this.panelHeight + 3 );
9102                 if( offset > offsetTop + viewerSize.y - this.panelHeight){
9103                     offset = Math.min(offset, (scrollHeight - viewerSize.y));
9104                     this.element.style.marginTop = -offset + 'px';
9105                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.y, -offset );
9106                 }else if( offset < offsetTop ){
9107                     offset = Math.max(0, offset - viewerSize.y / 2);
9108                     this.element.style.marginTop = -offset + 'px';
9109                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.y, -offset );
9110                 }
9111             }
9112 
9113             this.currentPage = page;
9114             $.getElement( element.id + '-displayregion' ).focus();
9115             onStripEnter.call( this, this.innerTracker );
9116         }
9117     },
9118     /**
9119      * @function
9120      * @name OpenSeadragon.ReferenceStrip.prototype.update
9121      */
9122     update: function() {
9123         if ( THIS[ this.id ].animating ) {
9124             $.console.log('image reference strip update');
9125             return true;
9126         }
9127         return false;
9128     }
9129 
9130 });
9131 
9132 
9133 
9134 
9135 /**
9136  * @private
9137  * @inner
9138  * @function
9139  */
9140 function onStripDrag( tracker, position, delta, shift ) {
9141 
9142     var offsetLeft = Number(this.element.style.marginLeft.replace('px','')),
9143         offsetTop = Number(this.element.style.marginTop.replace('px','')),
9144         scrollWidth = Number(this.element.style.width.replace('px','')),
9145         scrollHeight = Number(this.element.style.height.replace('px','')),
9146         viewerSize = $.getElementSize( this.viewer.canvas );
9147     this.dragging = true;
9148     if ( this.element ) {
9149         if( 'horizontal' == this.scroll ){
9150             if ( -delta.x > 0 ) {
9151                 //forward
9152                 if( offsetLeft > -(scrollWidth - viewerSize.x)){
9153                     this.element.style.marginLeft = ( offsetLeft + (delta.x * 2) ) + 'px';
9154                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.x, offsetLeft + (delta.x * 2) );
9155                 }
9156             } else if ( -delta.x < 0 ) {
9157                 //reverse
9158                 if( offsetLeft < 0 ){
9159                     this.element.style.marginLeft = ( offsetLeft + (delta.x * 2) ) + 'px';
9160                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.x, offsetLeft + (delta.x * 2) );
9161                 }
9162             }
9163         }else{
9164             if ( -delta.y > 0 ) {
9165                 //forward
9166                 if( offsetTop > -(scrollHeight - viewerSize.y)){
9167                     this.element.style.marginTop = ( offsetTop + (delta.y * 2) ) + 'px';
9168                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.y, offsetTop + (delta.y * 2) );
9169                 }
9170             } else if ( -delta.y < 0 ) {
9171                 //reverse
9172                 if( offsetTop < 0 ){
9173                     this.element.style.marginTop = ( offsetTop + (delta.y * 2) ) + 'px';
9174                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.y, offsetTop + (delta.y * 2) );
9175                 }
9176             }
9177         }
9178     }
9179     return false;
9180 
9181 }
9182 
9183 
9184 
9185 /**
9186  * @private
9187  * @inner
9188  * @function
9189  */
9190 function onStripScroll( tracker, position, scroll, shift ) {
9191     var offsetLeft = Number(this.element.style.marginLeft.replace('px','')),
9192         offsetTop = Number(this.element.style.marginTop.replace('px','')),
9193         scrollWidth = Number(this.element.style.width.replace('px','')),
9194         scrollHeight = Number(this.element.style.height.replace('px','')),
9195         viewerSize = $.getElementSize( this.viewer.canvas );
9196     if ( this.element ) {
9197         if( 'horizontal' == this.scroll ){
9198             if ( scroll > 0 ) {
9199                 //forward
9200                 if( offsetLeft > -(scrollWidth - viewerSize.x)){
9201                     this.element.style.marginLeft = ( offsetLeft - (scroll * 60) ) + 'px';
9202                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.x, offsetLeft - (scroll * 60) );
9203                 }
9204             } else if ( scroll < 0 ) {
9205                 //reverse
9206                 if( offsetLeft < 0 ){
9207                     this.element.style.marginLeft = ( offsetLeft - (scroll * 60) ) + 'px';
9208                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.x, offsetLeft - (scroll * 60) );
9209                 }
9210             }
9211         }else{
9212             if ( scroll < 0 ) {
9213                 //scroll up
9214                 if( offsetTop > viewerSize.y - scrollHeight  ){
9215                     this.element.style.marginTop = ( offsetTop + (scroll * 60) ) + 'px';
9216                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.y, offsetTop + (scroll * 60) );
9217                 }
9218             } else if ( scroll > 0 ) {
9219                 //scroll dowm
9220                 if( offsetTop < 0 ){
9221                     this.element.style.marginTop = ( offsetTop + (scroll * 60) ) + 'px';
9222                     loadPanels( this, viewerSize.y, offsetTop + (scroll * 60) );
9223                 }
9224             }
9225         }
9226     }
9227     //cancels event
9228     return false;
9229 }
9230 
9231 
9232 function loadPanels(strip, viewerSize, scroll){
9233     var panelSize,
9234         activePanelsStart,
9235         activePanelsEnd,
9236         miniViewer,
9237         style,
9238         i,
9239         element;
9240     if( 'horizontal' == strip.scroll ){
9241         panelSize = strip.panelWidth;
9242     }else{
9243         panelSize = strip.panelHeight;
9244     }
9245     activePanelsStart = Math.ceil( viewerSize / panelSize ) + 5;
9246     activePanelsEnd = Math.ceil( (Math.abs(scroll) + viewerSize ) / panelSize ) + 1;
9247     activePanelsStart = activePanelsEnd - activePanelsStart;
9248     activePanelsStart = activePanelsStart < 0 ? 0 : activePanelsStart;
9249 
9250     for( i = activePanelsStart; i < activePanelsEnd && i < strip.panels.length; i++ ){
9251         element = strip.panels[ i ];
9252         if ( !element.activePanel ){
9253             miniViewer = new $.Viewer( {
9254                 id:                     element.id,
9255                 tileSources:            [ strip.viewer.tileSources[ i ] ],
9256                 element:                element,
9257                 navigatorSizeRatio:     strip.sizeRatio,
9258                 showNavigator:          false,
9259                 mouseNavEnabled:        false,
9260                 showNavigationControl:  false,
9261                 showSequenceControl:    false,
9262                 immediateRender:        true,
9263                 blendTime:              0,
9264                 animationTime:          0
9265             } );
9266 
9267             miniViewer.displayRegion           = $.makeNeutralElement( "textarea" );
9268             miniViewer.displayRegion.id        = element.id + '-displayregion';
9269             miniViewer.displayRegion.className = 'displayregion';
9270 
9271             style = miniViewer.displayRegion.style;
9272             style.position      = 'relative';
9273             style.top           = '0px';
9274             style.left          = '0px';
9275             style.fontSize      = '0px';
9276             style.overflow      = 'hidden';
9277             style.float         = 'left'; //Webkit
9278             style.cssFloat      = 'left'; //Firefox
9279             style.styleFloat    = 'left'; //IE
9280             style.zIndex        = 999999999;
9281             style.cursor        = 'default';
9282             style.width         = ( strip.panelWidth - 4 ) + 'px';
9283             style.height        = ( strip.panelHeight - 4 ) + 'px';
9284 
9285             miniViewer.displayRegion.innerTracker = new $.MouseTracker({
9286                 element:        miniViewer.displayRegion
9287             });
9288 
9289             element.getElementsByTagName('form')[ 0 ].appendChild(
9290                 miniViewer.displayRegion
9291             );
9292 
9293             element.activePanel = true;
9294         }
9295     }
9296 }
9297 
9298 
9299 /**
9300  * @private
9301  * @inner
9302  * @function
9303  */
9304 function onStripEnter( tracker ) {
9305 
9306     //$.setElementOpacity(tracker.element, 0.8);
9307 
9308     //tracker.element.style.border = '1px solid #555';
9309     //tracker.element.style.background = '#000';
9310 
9311     if( 'horizontal' == this.scroll ){
9312 
9313         //tracker.element.style.paddingTop = "0px";
9314         tracker.element.style.marginBottom = "0px";
9315 
9316     } else {
9317 
9318         //tracker.element.style.paddingRight = "0px";
9319         tracker.element.style.marginLeft = "0px";
9320 
9321     }
9322     return false;
9323 }
9324 
9325 
9326 /**
9327  * @private
9328  * @inner
9329  * @function
9330  */
9331 function onStripExit( tracker ) {
9332     if ( 'horizontal' == this.scroll ) {
9333 
9334         //tracker.element.style.paddingTop = "10px";
9335         tracker.element.style.marginBottom = "-" + ( $.getElementSize( tracker.element ).y / 2 ) + "px";
9336 
9337     } else {
9338 
9339         //tracker.element.style.paddingRight = "10px";
9340         tracker.element.style.marginLeft = "-" + ( $.getElementSize( tracker.element ).x / 2 )+ "px";
9341 
9342     }
9343     return false;
9344 }
9345 
9346 
9347 
9348 /**
9349  * @private
9350  * @inner
9351  * @function
9352  */
9353 function onKeyPress( tracker, keyCode, shiftKey ){
9354     //console.log( keyCode );
9355 
9356     switch( keyCode ){
9357         case 61://=|+
9358             onStripScroll.call(this, this.tracker, null, 1, null);
9359             return false;
9360         case 45://-|_
9361             onStripScroll.call(this, this.tracker, null, -1, null);
9362             return false;
9363         case 48://0|)
9364         case 119://w
9365         case 87://W
9366         case 38://up arrow
9367             onStripScroll.call(this, this.tracker, null, 1, null);
9368             return false;
9369         case 115://s
9370         case 83://S
9371         case 40://down arrow
9372             onStripScroll.call(this, this.tracker, null, -1, null);
9373             return false;
9374         case 97://a
9375         case 37://left arrow
9376             onStripScroll.call(this, this.tracker, null, -1, null);
9377             return false;
9378         case 100://d
9379         case 39://right arrow
9380             onStripScroll.call(this, this.tracker, null, 1, null);
9381             return false;
9382         default:
9383             //console.log( 'navigator keycode %s', keyCode );
9384             return true;
9385     }
9386 }
9387 
9388 
9389 
9390 }( OpenSeadragon ));
9391

9399  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
9400  * met:

9403  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
9404  *
9405  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
9406  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
9407  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
9408  *

9410  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
9411  *   this software without specific prior written permission.

9414  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
9415  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
9416  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
9417  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
9418  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
9419  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
9420  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
9421  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
