11447  * modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are
11448  * met:
11449  *
11450  * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
11451  *   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
11452  *
11453  * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
11454  *   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
11455  *   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
11456  *
11457  * - Neither the name of CodePlex Foundation nor the names of its
11458  *   contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
11459  *   this software without specific prior written permission.
11460  *
11461  * THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
11462  * "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
11463  * LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
11464  * A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
11465  * OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
11466  * SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED
11467  * TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR
11468  * PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF
11469  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING
11470  * NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
11471  * SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
11472  */
11473 
11474 (function( $ ){
11475 
11476 
11477 /**
11478  * @class
11479  */
11480 $.Viewport = function( options ) {
11481 
11482     //backward compatibility for positional args while prefering more
11483     //idiomatic javascript options object as the only argument
11484     var args = arguments;
11485     if(  args.length && args[ 0 ] instanceof $.Point ){
11486         options = {
11487             containerSize:  args[ 0 ],
11488             contentSize:    args[ 1 ],
11489             config:         args[ 2 ]
11490         };
11491     }
11492 
11493     //options.config and the general config argument are deprecated
11494     //in favor of the more direct specification of optional settings
11495     //being passed directly on the options object
11496     if ( options.config ){
11497         $.extend( true, options, options.config );
11498         delete options.config;
11499     }
11500 
11501     $.extend( true, this, {
11502 
11503         //required settings
11504         containerSize:      null,
11505         contentSize:        null,
11506 
11507         //internal state properties
11508         zoomPoint:          null,
11509         viewer:           null,
11510 
11511         //configurable options
11512         springStiffness:    $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.springStiffness,
11513         animationTime:      $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.animationTime,
11514         minZoomImageRatio:  $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.minZoomImageRatio,
11515         maxZoomPixelRatio:  $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.maxZoomPixelRatio,
11516         visibilityRatio:    $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.visibilityRatio,
11517         wrapHorizontal:     $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.wrapHorizontal,
11518         wrapVertical:       $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.wrapVertical,
11519         defaultZoomLevel:   $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.defaultZoomLevel,
11520         minZoomLevel:       $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.minZoomLevel,
11521         maxZoomLevel:       $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.maxZoomLevel,
11522         degrees:            $.DEFAULT_SETTINGS.degrees
11523 
11524     }, options );
11525 
11526     this.centerSpringX = new $.Spring({
11527         initial: 0,
11528         springStiffness: this.springStiffness,
11529         animationTime:   this.animationTime
11530     });
11531     this.centerSpringY = new $.Spring({
11532         initial: 0,
11533         springStiffness: this.springStiffness,
11534         animationTime:   this.animationTime
11535     });
11536     this.zoomSpring    = new $.Spring({
11537         initial: 1,
11538         springStiffness: this.springStiffness,
11539         animationTime:   this.animationTime
11540     });
11541 
11542     this.resetContentSize( this.contentSize );
11543     this.goHome( true );
11544     this.update();
11545 };
11546 
11547 $.Viewport.prototype = {
11548 
11549     /**
11550      * @function
11551      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11552      */
11553     resetContentSize: function( contentSize ){
11554         this.contentSize    = contentSize;
11555         this.contentAspectX = this.contentSize.x / this.contentSize.y;
11556         this.contentAspectY = this.contentSize.y / this.contentSize.x;
11557         this.fitWidthBounds = new $.Rect( 0, 0, 1, this.contentAspectY );
11558         this.fitHeightBounds = new $.Rect( 0, 0, this.contentAspectY, this.contentAspectY);
11559 
11560         this.homeBounds = new $.Rect( 0, 0, 1, this.contentAspectY );
11561 
11562         if( this.viewer ){
11563             this.viewer.raiseEvent( 'reset-size', {
11564                 contentSize: contentSize,
11565                 viewer: this.viewer
11566             });
11567         }
11568 
11569         return this;
11570     },
11571 
11572     /**
11573      * @function
11574      */
11575     getHomeZoom: function() {
11576         var aspectFactor =
11577             this.contentAspectX / this.getAspectRatio();
11578 
11579         if( this.defaultZoomLevel ){
11580             return this.defaultZoomLevel;
11581         } else {
11582             return ( aspectFactor >= 1 ) ?
11583                 1 :
11584                 aspectFactor;
11585         }
11586     },
11587 
11588     /**
11589      * @function
11590      */
11591     getHomeBounds: function() {
11592         var center = this.homeBounds.getCenter( ),
11593             width  = 1.0 / this.getHomeZoom( ),
11594             height = width / this.getAspectRatio();
11595 
11596         return new $.Rect(
11597             center.x - ( width / 2.0 ),
11598             center.y - ( height / 2.0 ),
11599             width,
11600             height
11601         );
11602     },
11603 
11604     /**
11605      * @function
11606      * @param {Boolean} immediately
11607      */
11608     goHome: function( immediately ) {
11609         if( this.viewer ){
11610             this.viewer.raiseEvent( 'home', {
11611                 immediately: immediately,
11612                 viewer: this.viewer
11613             });
11614         }
11615         return this.fitBounds( this.getHomeBounds(), immediately );
11616     },
11617 
11618     /**
11619      * @function
11620      */
11621     getMinZoom: function() {
11622         var homeZoom = this.getHomeZoom(),
11623             zoom = this.minZoomLevel ?
11624             this.minZoomLevel :
11625                 this.minZoomImageRatio * homeZoom;
11626 
11627         return Math.min( zoom, homeZoom );
11628     },
11629 
11630     /**
11631      * @function
11632      */
11633     getMaxZoom: function() {
11634         var zoom = this.maxZoomLevel ?
11635             this.maxZoomLevel :
11636                 ( this.contentSize.x * this.maxZoomPixelRatio / this.containerSize.x );
11637 
11638         return Math.max( zoom, this.getHomeZoom() );
11639     },
11640 
11641     /**
11642      * @function
11643      */
11644     getAspectRatio: function() {
11645         return this.containerSize.x / this.containerSize.y;
11646     },
11647 
11648     /**
11649      * @function
11650      */
11651     getContainerSize: function() {
11652         return new $.Point(
11653             this.containerSize.x,
11654             this.containerSize.y
11655         );
11656     },
11657 
11658     /**
11659      * @function
11660      * @param {Boolean} current - Pass true for the current location; defaults to false (target location).
11661      */
11662     getBounds: function( current ) {
11663         var center = this.getCenter( current ),
11664             width  = 1.0 / this.getZoom( current ),
11665             height = width / this.getAspectRatio();
11666 
11667         return new $.Rect(
11668             center.x - ( width / 2.0 ),
11669             center.y - ( height / 2.0 ),
11670             width,
11671             height
11672         );
11673     },
11674 
11675     /**
11676      * @function
11677      * @param {Boolean} current - Pass true for the current location; defaults to false (target location).
11678      */
11679     getCenter: function( current ) {
11680         var centerCurrent = new $.Point(
11681                 this.centerSpringX.current.value,
11682                 this.centerSpringY.current.value
11683             ),
11684             centerTarget = new $.Point(
11685                 this.centerSpringX.target.value,
11686                 this.centerSpringY.target.value
11687             ),
11688             oldZoomPixel,
11689             zoom,
11690             width,
11691             height,
11692             bounds,
11693             newZoomPixel,
11694             deltaZoomPixels,
11695             deltaZoomPoints;
11696 
11697         if ( current ) {
11698             return centerCurrent;
11699         } else if ( !this.zoomPoint ) {
11700             return centerTarget;
11701         }
11702 
11703         oldZoomPixel = this.pixelFromPoint(this.zoomPoint, true);
11704 
11705         zoom    = this.getZoom();
11706         width   = 1.0 / zoom;
11707         height  = width / this.getAspectRatio();
11708         bounds  = new $.Rect(
11709             centerCurrent.x - width / 2.0,
11710             centerCurrent.y - height / 2.0,
11711             width,
11712             height
11713         );
11714 
11715         newZoomPixel    = this.zoomPoint.minus(
11716             bounds.getTopLeft()
11717         ).times(
11718             this.containerSize.x / bounds.width
11719         );
11720         deltaZoomPixels = newZoomPixel.minus( oldZoomPixel );
11721         deltaZoomPoints = deltaZoomPixels.divide( this.containerSize.x * zoom );
11722 
11723         return centerTarget.plus( deltaZoomPoints );
11724     },
11725 
11726     /**
11727      * @function
11728      * @param {Boolean} current - Pass true for the current location; defaults to false (target location).
11729      */
11730     getZoom: function( current ) {
11731         if ( current ) {
11732             return this.zoomSpring.current.value;
11733         } else {
11734             return this.zoomSpring.target.value;
11735         }
11736     },
11737 
11738     /**
11739      * @function
11740      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11741      */
11742     applyConstraints: function( immediately ) {
11743         var actualZoom = this.getZoom(),
11744             constrainedZoom = Math.max(
11745                 Math.min( actualZoom, this.getMaxZoom() ),
11746                 this.getMinZoom()
11747             ),
11748             bounds,
11749             horizontalThreshold,
11750             verticalThreshold,
11751             left,
11752             right,
11753             top,
11754             bottom,
11755             dx = 0,
11756             dy = 0;
11757 
11758         if ( actualZoom != constrainedZoom ) {
11759             this.zoomTo( constrainedZoom, this.zoomPoint, immediately );
11760         }
11761 
11762         bounds = this.getBounds();
11763 
11764         horizontalThreshold = this.visibilityRatio * bounds.width;
11765         verticalThreshold   = this.visibilityRatio * bounds.height;
11766 
11767         left   = bounds.x + bounds.width;
11768         right  = 1 - bounds.x;
11769         top    = bounds.y + bounds.height;
11770         bottom = this.contentAspectY - bounds.y;
11771 
11772         if ( this.wrapHorizontal ) {
11773             //do nothing
11774         } else {
11775             if ( left < horizontalThreshold ) {
11776                 dx = horizontalThreshold - left;
11777             }
11778             if ( right < horizontalThreshold ) {
11779                 dx = dx ?
11780                     ( dx + right - horizontalThreshold ) / 2 :
11781                     ( right - horizontalThreshold );
11782             }
11783         }
11784 
11785         if ( this.wrapVertical ) {
11786             //do nothing
11787         } else {
11788             if ( top < verticalThreshold ) {
11789                 dy = ( verticalThreshold - top );
11790             }
11791             if ( bottom < verticalThreshold ) {
11792                 dy =  dy ?
11793                     ( dy + bottom - verticalThreshold ) / 2 :
11794                     ( bottom - verticalThreshold );
11795             }
11796         }
11797 
11798         if ( dx || dy || immediately ) {
11799             bounds.x += dx;
11800             bounds.y += dy;
11801             if( bounds.width > 1  ){
11802                 bounds.x = 0.5 - bounds.width/2;
11803             }
11804             if( bounds.height > this.contentAspectY ){
11805                 bounds.y = this.contentAspectY/2 - bounds.height/2;
11806             }
11807             this.fitBounds( bounds, immediately );
11808         }
11809 
11810         if( this.viewer ){
11811             this.viewer.raiseEvent( 'constrain', {
11812                 immediately: immediately,
11813                 viewer: this.viewer
11814             });
11815         }
11816 
11817         return this;
11818     },
11819 
11820     /**
11821      * @function
11822      * @param {Boolean} immediately
11823      */
11824     ensureVisible: function( immediately ) {
11825         return this.applyConstraints( immediately );
11826     },
11827 
11828     /**
11829      * @function
11830      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Rect} bounds
11831      * @param {Boolean} immediately
11832      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11833      */
11834     fitBounds: function( bounds, immediately ) {
11835         var aspect = this.getAspectRatio(),
11836             center = bounds.getCenter(),
11837             newBounds = new $.Rect(
11838                 bounds.x,
11839                 bounds.y,
11840                 bounds.width,
11841                 bounds.height
11842             ),
11843             oldBounds,
11844             oldZoom,
11845             newZoom,
11846             referencePoint;
11847 
11848         if ( newBounds.getAspectRatio() >= aspect ) {
11849             newBounds.height = bounds.width / aspect;
11850             newBounds.y      = center.y - newBounds.height / 2;
11851         } else {
11852             newBounds.width = bounds.height * aspect;
11853             newBounds.x     = center.x - newBounds.width / 2;
11854         }
11855 
11856         this.panTo( this.getCenter( true ), true );
11857         this.zoomTo( this.getZoom( true ), null, true );
11858 
11859         oldBounds = this.getBounds();
11860         oldZoom   = this.getZoom();
11861         newZoom   = 1.0 / newBounds.width;
11862         if ( newZoom == oldZoom || newBounds.width == oldBounds.width ) {
11863             return this.panTo( center, immediately );
11864         }
11865 
11866         referencePoint = oldBounds.getTopLeft().times(
11867             this.containerSize.x / oldBounds.width
11868         ).minus(
11869             newBounds.getTopLeft().times(
11870                 this.containerSize.x / newBounds.width
11871             )
11872         ).divide(
11873             this.containerSize.x / oldBounds.width -
11874             this.containerSize.x / newBounds.width
11875         );
11876 
11877         return this.zoomTo( newZoom, referencePoint, immediately );
11878     },
11879 
11880 
11881     /**
11882      * @function
11883      * @param {Boolean} immediately
11884      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11885      */
11886     fitVertically: function( immediately ) {
11887         var center = this.getCenter();
11888 
11889         if ( this.wrapHorizontal ) {
11890             center.x = ( 1 + ( center.x % 1 ) ) % 1;
11891             this.centerSpringX.resetTo( center.x );
11892             this.centerSpringX.update();
11893         }
11894 
11895         if ( this.wrapVertical ) {
11896             center.y = (
11897                 this.contentAspectY + ( center.y % this.contentAspectY )
11898             ) % this.contentAspectY;
11899             this.centerSpringY.resetTo( center.y );
11900             this.centerSpringY.update();
11901         }
11902 
11903         return this.fitBounds( this.fitHeightBounds, immediately );
11904     },
11905 
11906     /**
11907      * @function
11908      * @param {Boolean} immediately
11909      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11910      */
11911     fitHorizontally: function( immediately ) {
11912         var center = this.getCenter();
11913 
11914         if ( this.wrapHorizontal ) {
11915             center.x = (
11916                 this.contentAspectX + ( center.x % this.contentAspectX )
11917             ) % this.contentAspectX;
11918             this.centerSpringX.resetTo( center.x );
11919             this.centerSpringX.update();
11920         }
11921 
11922         if ( this.wrapVertical ) {
11923             center.y = ( 1 + ( center.y % 1 ) ) % 1;
11924             this.centerSpringY.resetTo( center.y );
11925             this.centerSpringY.update();
11926         }
11927 
11928         return this.fitBounds( this.fitWidthBounds, immediately );
11929     },
11930 
11931 
11932     /**
11933      * @function
11934      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} delta
11935      * @param {Boolean} immediately
11936      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11937      */
11938     panBy: function( delta, immediately ) {
11939         var center = new $.Point(
11940             this.centerSpringX.target.value,
11941             this.centerSpringY.target.value
11942         );
11943         delta = delta.rotate( -this.degrees, new $.Point( 0, 0 ) );
11944         return this.panTo( center.plus( delta ), immediately );
11945     },
11946 
11947     /**
11948      * @function
11949      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} center
11950      * @param {Boolean} immediately
11951      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11952      */
11953     panTo: function( center, immediately ) {
11954         if ( immediately ) {
11955             this.centerSpringX.resetTo( center.x );
11956             this.centerSpringY.resetTo( center.y );
11957         } else {
11958             this.centerSpringX.springTo( center.x );
11959             this.centerSpringY.springTo( center.y );
11960         }
11961 
11962         if( this.viewer ){
11963             this.viewer.raiseEvent( 'pan', {
11964                 center: center,
11965                 immediately: immediately,
11966                 viewer: this.viewer
11967             });
11968         }
11969 
11970         return this;
11971     },
11972 
11973     /**
11974      * @function
11975      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11976      */
11977     zoomBy: function( factor, refPoint, immediately ) {
11978         if( refPoint ) {
11979             refPoint = refPoint.rotate(
11980                 -this.degrees,
11981                 new $.Point( this.centerSpringX.target.value, this.centerSpringY.target.value )
11982             );
11983         }
11984         return this.zoomTo( this.zoomSpring.target.value * factor, refPoint, immediately );
11985     },
11986 
11987     /**
11988      * @function
11989      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
11990      */
11991     zoomTo: function( zoom, refPoint, immediately ) {
11992 
11993         this.zoomPoint = refPoint instanceof $.Point ?
11994             refPoint :
11995             null;
11996 
11997         if ( immediately ) {
11998             this.zoomSpring.resetTo( zoom );
11999         } else {
12000             this.zoomSpring.springTo( zoom );
12001         }
12002 
12003         if( this.viewer ){
12004             this.viewer.raiseEvent( 'zoom', {
12005                 zoom: zoom,
12006                 refPoint: refPoint,
12007                 immediately: immediately,
12008                 viewer: this.viewer
12009             });
12010         }
12011 
12012         return this;
12013     },
12014 
12015     /**
12016      * Currently only 90 degree rotation is supported and it only works
12017      * with the canvas. Additionally, the navigator does not rotate yet,
12018      * debug mode doesn't rotate yet, and overlay rotation is only
12019      * partially supported.
12020      * @function
12021      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewport.prototype.setRotation
12022      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
12023      */
12024     setRotation: function( degrees ) {
12025         if( !( this.viewer && this.viewer.drawer.canRotate() ) ) {
12026             return this;
12027         }
12028 
12029         degrees = ( degrees + 360 ) % 360;
12030         if( degrees % 90 !== 0 ) {
12031             throw new Error('Currently only 0, 90, 180, and 270 degrees are supported.');
12032         }
12033         this.degrees = degrees;
12034         this.viewer.drawer.update();
12035         
12036         return this;
12037     },
12038 
12039     /**
12040      * Gets the current rotation in degrees.
12041      * @function
12042      * @name OpenSeadragon.Viewport.prototype.setRotation
12043      * @return {Number} The current rotation in degrees.
12044      */
12045     getRotation: function() {
12046         return this.degrees;
12047     },
12048 
12049     /**
12050      * @function
12051      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Viewport} Chainable.
12052      */
12053     resize: function( newContainerSize, maintain ) {
12054         var oldBounds = this.getBounds(),
12055             newBounds = oldBounds,
12056             widthDeltaFactor = newContainerSize.x / this.containerSize.x;
12057 
12058         this.containerSize = new $.Point(
12059             newContainerSize.x,
12060             newContainerSize.y
12061         );
12062 
12063         if (maintain) {
12064             newBounds.width  = oldBounds.width * widthDeltaFactor;
12065             newBounds.height = newBounds.width / this.getAspectRatio();
12066         }
12067 
12068         if( this.viewer ){
12069             this.viewer.raiseEvent( 'resize', {
12070                 newContainerSize: newContainerSize,
12071                 maintain: maintain,
12072                 viewer: this.viewer
12073             });
12074         }
12075 
12076         return this.fitBounds( newBounds, true );
12077     },
12078 
12079     /**
12080      * @function
12081      */
12082     update: function() {
12083         var oldCenterX = this.centerSpringX.current.value,
12084             oldCenterY = this.centerSpringY.current.value,
12085             oldZoom    = this.zoomSpring.current.value,
12086             oldZoomPixel,
12087             newZoomPixel,
12088             deltaZoomPixels,
12089             deltaZoomPoints;
12090 
12091         if (this.zoomPoint) {
12092             oldZoomPixel = this.pixelFromPoint( this.zoomPoint, true );
12093         }
12094 
12095         this.zoomSpring.update();
12096 
12097         if (this.zoomPoint && this.zoomSpring.current.value != oldZoom) {
12098             newZoomPixel    = this.pixelFromPoint( this.zoomPoint, true );
12099             deltaZoomPixels = newZoomPixel.minus( oldZoomPixel );
12100             deltaZoomPoints = this.deltaPointsFromPixels( deltaZoomPixels, true );
12101 
12102             this.centerSpringX.shiftBy( deltaZoomPoints.x );
12103             this.centerSpringY.shiftBy( deltaZoomPoints.y );
12104         } else {
12105             this.zoomPoint = null;
12106         }
12107 
12108         this.centerSpringX.update();
12109         this.centerSpringY.update();
12110 
12111         return this.centerSpringX.current.value != oldCenterX ||
12112             this.centerSpringY.current.value != oldCenterY ||
12113             this.zoomSpring.current.value != oldZoom;
12114     },
12115 
12116 
12117     /**
12118      * @function
12119      * @param {Boolean} current - Pass true for the current location; defaults to false (target location).
12120      */
12121     deltaPixelsFromPoints: function( deltaPoints, current ) {
12122         return deltaPoints.times(
12123             this.containerSize.x * this.getZoom( current )
12124         );
12125     },
12126 
12127     /**
12128      * @function
12129      * @param {Boolean} current - Pass true for the current location; defaults to false (target location).
12130      */
12131     deltaPointsFromPixels: function( deltaPixels, current ) {
12132         return deltaPixels.divide(
12133             this.containerSize.x * this.getZoom( current )
12134         );
12135     },
12136 
12137     /**
12138      * @function
12139      * @param {Boolean} current - Pass true for the current location; defaults to false (target location).
12140      */
12141     pixelFromPoint: function( point, current ) {
12142         var bounds = this.getBounds( current );
12143         return point.minus(
12144             bounds.getTopLeft()
12145         ).times(
12146             this.containerSize.x / bounds.width
12147         );
12148     },
12149 
12150     /**
12151      * @function
12152      * @param {Boolean} current - Pass true for the current location; defaults to false (target location).
12153      */
12154     pointFromPixel: function( pixel, current ) {
12155         var bounds = this.getBounds( current );
12156         return pixel.divide(
12157             this.containerSize.x / bounds.width
12158         ).plus(
12159             bounds.getTopLeft()
12160         );
12161     },
12162 
12163     /**
12164      * Translates from OpenSeadragon viewer coordinate system to image coordinate system.
12165      * This method can be called either by passing X,Y coordinates or an
12166      * OpenSeadragon.Point
12167      * @function
12168      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} viewerX the point in viewport coordinate system.
12169      * @param {Number} viewerX X coordinate in viewport coordinate system.
12170      * @param {Number} viewerY Y coordinate in viewport coordinate system.
12171      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Point} a point representing the coordinates in the image.
12172      */
12173     viewportToImageCoordinates: function( viewerX, viewerY ) {
12174         if ( arguments.length == 1 ) {
12175             //they passed a point instead of individual components
12176             return this.viewportToImageCoordinates( viewerX.x, viewerX.y );
12177         }
12178         return new $.Point( viewerX * this.contentSize.x, viewerY * this.contentSize.y * this.contentAspectX );
12179     },
12180 
12181     /**
12182      * Translates from image coordinate system to OpenSeadragon viewer coordinate system
12183      * This method can be called either by passing X,Y coordinates or an
12184      * OpenSeadragon.Point
12185      * @function
12186      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Point} imageX the point in image coordinate system.
12187      * @param {Number} imageX X coordinate in image coordinate system.
12188      * @param {Number} imageY Y coordinate in image coordinate system.
12189      * @return {OpenSeadragon.Point} a point representing the coordinates in the viewport.
12190      */
12191     imageToViewportCoordinates: function( imageX, imageY ) {
12192         if ( arguments.length == 1 ) {
12193             //they passed a point instead of individual components
12194             return this.imageToViewportCoordinates( imageX.x, imageX.y );
12195         }
12196         return new $.Point( imageX / this.contentSize.x, imageY / this.contentSize.y / this.contentAspectX );
12197     },
12198 
12199     /**
12200      * Translates from a rectangle which describes a portion of the image in
12201      * pixel coordinates to OpenSeadragon viewport rectangle coordinates.
12202      * This method can be called either by passing X,Y,width,height or an
12203      * OpenSeadragon.Rect
12204      * @function
12205      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Rect} imageX the rectangle in image coordinate system.
12206      * @param {Number} imageX the X coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
12207      * in image coordinate system.
12208      * @param {Number} imageY the Y coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
12209      * in image coordinate system.
12210      * @param {Number} pixelWidth the width in pixel of the rectangle.
12211      * @param {Number} pixelHeight the height in pixel of the rectangle.
12212      */
12213     imageToViewportRectangle: function( imageX, imageY, pixelWidth, pixelHeight ) {
12214         var coordA,
12215             coordB,
12216             rect;
12217         if( arguments.length == 1 ) {
12218             //they passed a rectangle instead of individual components
12219             rect = imageX;
12220             return this.imageToViewportRectangle(
12221                 rect.x, rect.y, rect.width, rect.height
12222             );
12223         }
12224         coordA = this.imageToViewportCoordinates(
12225             imageX, imageY
12226         );
12227         coordB = this.imageToViewportCoordinates(
12228             pixelWidth, pixelHeight
12229         );
12230         return new $.Rect(
12231             coordA.x,
12232             coordA.y,
12233             coordB.x,
12234             coordB.y
12235         );
12236     },
12237 
12238     /**
12239      * Translates from a rectangle which describes a portion of
12240      * the viewport in point coordinates to image rectangle coordinates.
12241      * This method can be called either by passing X,Y,width,height or an
12242      * OpenSeadragon.Rect
12243      * @function
12244      * @param {OpenSeadragon.Rect} viewerX the rectangle in viewport coordinate system.
12245      * @param {Number} viewerX the X coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
12246      * in viewport coordinate system.
12247      * @param {Number} imageY the Y coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
12248      * in viewport coordinate system.
12249      * @param {Number} pointWidth the width of the rectangle in viewport coordinate system.
12250      * @param {Number} pointHeight the height of the rectangle in viewport coordinate system.
12251      */
12252     viewportToImageRectangle: function( viewerX, viewerY, pointWidth, pointHeight ) {
12253         var coordA,
12254             coordB,
12255             rect;
12256         if ( arguments.length == 1 ) {
12257             //they passed a rectangle instead of individual components
12258             rect = viewerX;
12259             return this.viewportToImageRectangle(
12260                 rect.x, rect.y, rect.width, rect.height
12261             );
12262         }
12263         coordA = this.viewportToImageCoordinates( viewerX, viewerY );
12264         coordB = this.viewportToImageCoordinates( pointWidth, pointHeight );
12265         return new $.Rect(
12266             coordA.x,
12267             coordA.y,
12268             coordB.x,
12269             coordB.y
12270         );
12271     }
12272 };
12273 
12274 }( OpenSeadragon ));
12275
